Bastards! They killed him! I'm gonna find them, and I'm gonna tear them a new one!
Fuckers killed a friend of mine!
That poor guy... Things didn't work out for him.
I knew the guy. I'm sorry for him.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace. I will get the fucker who did this to you.
He was a good man, and good men are hard to come by...
He was a good fella...
He was a friend of mine, bastards!
I'm gonna find whoever did this!
I'm gonna put that fucking asshole in a coffin!
I'm gonna tear those fuckers a new one after what they did to my friend!
I will find those scumbags and turn them inside out.
Let's have a drink later in his memory!
Man, we had a drink yesterday. Poor guy.
Poor bastard...
Poor guy...
Rest in peace, my friend.
Rest in peace. He was a good man...
Such a pity...
They killed him!
They killed that guy!
What an unlucky dude...
What the fuck...
What the hell, they killed such a nice guy...
You'll be remembered, my friend.
I haven't got to know the guy, but still, what a shame...
Look what those fuckers have done!
We were telling stories by the campfire, and now this happens...
Get the fucker who killed him!
What in hell?!
We were laughing like good fellas last night, I can't believe it...
Here we go again...
Can't believe he's gone... Just like that, snuffed out.
Who's next? You, me? This place spares no one.
Gone too soon... We'll make sure he didn't die in vain.
This is why we can't have nice things... because those bastards take everything away.
Every time someone dies, a part of me goes with them. How many more, huh?
And another one bites the dust... When will this madness end?
He might have been a pain, but he was our pain. Gonna miss that fool.
Didn't think he'd go out like this... Not him.
This Zone eats the best of us. He was one of the good ones.
I swear, this place... it's a meat grinder, turning good men into corpse fodder.
I'd toast to him, but I'm all out of booze. Hell, I'd drink to forget anyway.
Just talked to him yesterday... and now he's dead. This Zone doesn't care about our plans.
He used to say he'd leave the Zone one day. Guess he finally did, just not how he planned.
I'll take up his watch. Someone's gotta keep the bastards at bay.
Why do the best always go first? This ain't right, man.
We've lost another brother. This war just got personal.
They won't get away with this. We'll bring the fight to their doorstep.
I used to complain about his cooking... Now I'd give anything to taste that horrible stew one more time.
He always had the worst jokes... Wish I could hear just one more.
It's a cruel world, and today it just got a little crueler.
That was no way for a stalker to die. Not like that, not without a fight.
Rest easy, stalker. We'll take it from here.
We just lost one of our best. Damn this cursed place!
Who will drink with me now? He was the only one who laughed at my jokes.
This death won't be in vain. We'll strike back twice as hard.
Another empty bunk in the barracks tonight... This is getting too hard.
Each death is a reminder: In the Zone, every day could be your last.
Who does that to their own? We're supposed to be brothers!
He died because someone couldnt handle their shit. Fucking cowards.
Revenge is the only answer. We find them, we end them. No mercy.
So much for stalker's honor. Those fucks have none.
They took one of ours. Let's show them what a mistake that was.
Now there's blood on their hands that won't ever wash off. Theyll pay.
Another light goes out in the Zone, snuffed by a supposed brother.
Its a war now. They killed one of us; well kill ten of them.
Well raise hell for him. Rest easy, brother, we got this now.
Not just a stalker, he was family. Those bastards will regret this.
Can't trust anyone in this forsaken place, not even your shadow.
This one cuts deep. He was one of the good ones. Fuck those guys.
What's this Zone turning into? Since when do we kill our own?
We lost a brother to the madness of greed and fear. Damn them all.
Not the first, won't be the last. This place changes people, and not for the better.
Guess its back to watching our backs all night again. No rest for the wicked.

Trust gets you killed here. We'll avenge him, blood for blood.

One of ours got clipped by some scum. Time for some payback.
He's dead because someone's a coward. We'll tear the Zone apart to find them.
This is why I hate people. We're wiping his killer off the map.
Killed by a so-called human? That filth isn't human anymore, not to me.
Another friend lost to human greed and malice. Vengeance will be ours.
He was murdered? Damn, this place is rotten to the core. We'll cleanse it with fire.
Someone's going to die for this. Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth.
No mercy for his killer. We stalk the stalker until death does us part.
A life taken by another's hands? Unforgivable. The hunt is on.
He didn't deserve this. No one does. But someone's gonna pay all the same.
Another soul lost to pointless violence. We'll respond in kind.
Death by betrayal? Worst kind there is. We'll get those bastards.
Killed by one of our own... or so they say. Let's find the truth and end them.
Nothing colder than a stalker's vengeance. Time to get cold.
They made it personal. Let's show them what personal really feels like.
Died like he lived, pissing off the wrong people. Classic!
Got stabbed in the back? Should've seen it coming the fuckwit.
Someone offed him? Guess party invitations are gonna be easier now.
Who capped him? Owe them a drink for saving me the trouble.
He's dead? Well, shit, whos gonna annoy us now?
Finally dead? Took them long enough. We all saw it coming.
Someone actually did us all a favor. Guy was a walking disaster.
Shot dead? Karmas a bitch, and so was he.
They found him dead? Must've mistaken his head for the target again.
Oh, he's dead? Must've been his first time out without his mommy.
Good riddance, he was more trouble than he was worth.
Guess he talked shit to the wrong person this time. Not surprised.
He won't be missed. If anything, we might actually hit what we aim at now.
Dead? His ego probably got him killed. What a fucker.
I'd mourn him, but I only have so much bullshit left in me today.
One less idiot in the Zone. The airs cleaner already.
Another one bites the dust. Eh, he had it coming.

One less mouth to feed, one less idiot to deal with. I'm not crying over that.
That's what happens when you play hero in a lawless land. Idiot.
Ha! I always knew he'd end up dead in a ditch. The Zone's no place for the weak.
Another dead fool. Who's next on the list?
Look at that, another hero got himself killed. Shocking... not really.
He thought he was invincible. The Zone thought otherwise.
Dead? Good, more loot for the rest of us.
Another one bites the dust. This place just keeps getting better and better.
He got what was coming for him. The Zone doesn't take kindly to fools.
Should've watched his back. Now he's just another corpse rotting in the mud.
Thats what you get for messing with the big dogs. Hope he enjoyed the ride down.
Just another maggot food now. Bet he regrets coming here.
Good riddance. That bastard was nothing but trouble.
Hes out of the game. Zones harsh for the soft ones.
Guess he wasn't as smart as he thought. Dead's dead, idiot.
Wiped off the map. That's what happens when you can't keep up.
Ah, another stalker down. The Zone cleanses itself.
So he's dead? Bet he didn't see that coming. Moron.
That fool finally bit the dust. Wondered when he'd cash out.
No tears shed here. He was a dead man walking anyway.
Dust to dust, right? He won't be missed.
He's dead, and the Zone's a bit quieter. I'm not complaining.
Lifes cheap here. He learned the hard way.
One less rat in the race. Time to move up.
Survival of the fittest, and clearly, he didn't fit.
Just debris now. Another victim to the Zone's cruelty.
Died like he lived: stupidly. Good riddance.
A guy died, shit happens. We'll be following him sooner or later anyway.
Ah, the amount of lives the Zone has taken...
Another one gone as mutant food...
Another one waltzing into the Zone, are they ever going to learn? Everybody knows better than going there alone!
Are they infants? Can't even kill a mutant...
Can't take one step without stumbling upon those mutants!
Careful, stalkers! Looks like the mutants are getting all aggressive now that they've got a new den. Best stay away than go charging in like the fucking Superman!
Damn, lots of crows around. Must be corpses stinking somewhere. Take care.
Damn... That's what you get for looting. What a fate.
Fuck, another sod gone.
Fuck, guys, I knew him. We were drinking together just yesterday, and now this happens...
Mutant food?!
Guys! People are dropping like flies, and Duty still says they've cleaned up the territory! Ain't that a bitch?
He was a good man, took a lot of risks and lifted our spirits during hard times... Rest in peace, my stalker brother!
He was a good man...
I'd rip those monsters' balls out so they won't be breeding again!
I'm curious, what kind of creature did that?
I'm freaking out... He said it was safe here... I was lucky refusing to go with him at the last moment, otherwise I'd probably be lying there too...
I found a body! Nobody deserves a death like this.
It's never fun when a stalker gets taken by a mutant... even if he's an enemy.
I told everybody the place was off limits with those things about! Hasn't anybody shared that on the net?
I told him the place was crawling with those bastards! He wouldn't listen, and now this happens to him...
I was lucky to avoid that place!
Just killed a hell of a hog! Got ten kilos of just the hooves!
Killing those bastards left and right, and they only get stronger...
Loser...
Men, I'm fucking pissed at these things...
Men, take note: only a bullet in the head can stop a bloodsucker.
PM me! Let's raid some mutants.
Poor guy got ripped in half! I'd rather shoot myself in the head...
Seen a horde of hogs getting fat on radioactive treats...
Serves him right!
So horrible...
So sad...
That goof couldn't even fight off a hog!
That reminds me of a funny story...
The monster just mutilated him.
This really sucks, people. I hope the poor guy didn't suffer too much...
Those mutants are everywhere now!
Those mutants got downright nasty. I'll go ping Duty about the mess they made.
We cleared the place just yesterday, should have made a trail... Fuck...
Well, fuck that guy!
Well, let's drink to the soul of that man!
Well, that's another one gone. Let our guys know to watch out for mutants.
Well, where did he get mutilated? Gotta note the coordinates...
What's here to say... He was a sucker.
What's there to say? The Zone sure ain't the place for taking a stroll.
What a horrible death! Hope the guy didn't suffer a lot...
What the hell is going on...?
Woah, that man was out of luck!
Woo, check out these hogs! Anybody need a hoof?
You're saying a beast got him?
Better him than me.
He tripped over his own feet and fed himself to the mutants. Natural selection at its finest, folks.
Looks like the mutants have marked their territory with another idiot's guts. Stay sharp out there.
One less mouth to feed. The Zone cleans house in the most brutal way possible.
Watch your step, stalkers. Mutants don't care if you're a hero or a zero. To them, you're just another meal.
Just when you think you're the hunter, you become the hunted. RIP, stalker.
Another day, another stalker turned mutant snack. This Zone's appetite is insatiable.
Damn mutants! Now I need to find a new drinking buddy. Rest in pieces, pal.
A moment of silence for our fallen comrade. He fought bravely but forgot the first rule: never underestimate the Zone.
He died doing what he loved: getting too close to a bloodsucker's nest. Fool.
Why do the rookies always think they can go it alone? Another one down. When will they learn?
That's the third stalker this week who's ended up as mutant chow. We're thinning out here, people.
News flash: the mutants are not your friends. Don't try to pet them. RIP, you brave, stupid soul.
Guess who's not coming to dinner? Because he is dinner. Another stalker gone to the great anomaly in the sky.
Every time a stalker dies out there, a mutant gets its wings. Or whatever the hell those things sprout.
Bloodsuckers: 1, Stalkers: 0. Lets not keep score, huh?
If you're gonna go out, at least do it guns blazing, not screaming like a rookie. Damn shame.
So he thought he could outrun a chimera? I've seen milk turn faster than he ran.
So CHEEKI BREEKIIIIII.
Shit, just watched a newbie get torn the fuck apart. It's a dog-eat-dog world out here, and I ain't talking about the blind dogs.
Some poor bastard just became mutant shit. Guess he skipped the fucking safety brief.
Mutants ripped him a new one. Literally. His insides are all over the goddamn place now.
This guy's last words were 'I can take 'em'. No, you fucking can't, pal. Not alone.
Walked past what used to be a stalker. Now it's just a pile of chewed-up bones and regrets.
Another dumb fuck thought he could dance with a snork. Now he's lying face down in the mud with his guts hanging out.
Watch your asses, boys and girls. These mutants are getting hungrier, and stalkers are on the menu.
Just scooped up what's left of some idiot after the mutants had lunch. Wear your fucking armor next time.
He got fucked up good by a pack of flesh. Didn't even have time to scream. That's the Zone for ya.
Ran into a stalker's remains today. Poor bastard was probably delicious. Watch out for those bloodsuckers, they don't mess around.
A stalker's life ain't worth shit out here if you can't dodge a mutant. Remember that next time you go treasure hunting.
Some fucker tried to pet a pseudodog. Now he's half the man he used to be. Literally.
Zone rule #1: Don't fuck with mutants. Zone rule #2: Really, don't fuck with mutants.
His last words? 'Watch this!' Famous last words right before a chimera turned him inside out.
Heard some rookie got disemboweled by a mutant. Sucks to be him, better him than me.
If you plan on going out, maybe don't pick a fight with something that has more teeth than your ex-girlfriend.
Zombie chow walking on two legsthat's what he was. Now he's just chow.
Goddamn mutants tore him a new asshole. Another stalker lost to the Zone's meat grinder.
Why do the cute ones always die first? This one got his face rearranged by a boar. Total waste.
That bastard died as he livedscreaming and running from his problems. Except it was a bloodsucker this time.
Just saw a body that even the mutants wouldn't touch. He must've been a real asshole when he was alive.
The Zone took another one. This time a blind dog decided to play fetch with his legs. Fucking tragic.
News flash: If you can't run faster than the guy next to you, you're mutant food. RIP, slowpoke.
He died as he lived, pissing off things he shouldn't. This time a mutant got the last laugh.
Ran into a beast so ugly, even the mutants hesitated. Still ate him though. Zone's harsh, my friends.
His idea of 'stealth' was singing while drunk. Sneaking past mutants? Forget it. They had a feast.
Mutants pulled him apart like cheap bread. Guess who's not coming to the campfire tonight.
Tried to fight a mutant with a stick. You can imagine how that went... the Zone's no place for idiots.
Watched a stalker get munched on by something nasty. I'm no expert, but trying to hug a mutant? Bad fucking idea.
Looks like someone's day went to hell... and so did they, straight into a mutant's belly.
If you're gonna get killed by a mutant, at least make it a badass one, not some pansy-ass flesheater.
Poor sod thought he could outrun his fate. Joke's on him; mutants run faster when you're scared shitless.
This guys last act was to scream like a banshee. Didnt scare the mutant, but sure as hell entertained it.
They say don't poke the bear. Well, he poked something worse, and it poked back... right through his chest.
Mutant bait, thats what he was. Walked right into their lair singing folk songs. Even the Zone has its limits of tolerance.
Ever see a stalker get turned inside out? It's not pretty. Neither was he, especially after the mutants were done.
Lesson learned: don't try to pet the bloody mutants. This ain't a zoo, and you ain't a zookeeper.
Talk about bad lucktripped over a rock and fell into a mutant's mouth. At least he saved them the effort.
Another day, another stalker.
Did they actually die? ...Or just join the zombies?
Everybody's heading there sooner or later.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace.
Lost to the Zone...
Let's have a drink in their memory!
Poor guys...
Should've been more careful. Too late now.
You get used to this after every emission.
People keep getting caught in those storms, many just don't make it.
They didn't make it in time, poor guys...
That's why you should be fast and aware people.
They got fried...
Fried stalkers, everybody!
Tip of the day: mark some safe spots in every area. You never know when an emission is gonna hit.
The Zone is an unforgiving bitch.
Hey, I used to know that guy...
I don't like to think about what happened to them.
The real question is: is that the end for them? Or have they just changed a bit?
What a way to go.
I can't imagine what they were going through.
It's not fucking fair! Screw you, Zone!
We should have this figured out by now...
I'd rather get torn apart by dogs.
We should go bury them... if they're not still walking around.
That's the worst.
I hope it was quick, but I have my doubts.
That is all kinds of wrong.
Why do I even look? It's always bad news.
I told him not to go there! Look what happens!
Better him than me.
Watch the skies, stalkers. Emissions don't care if you're ready or not.
Nothing left but scorched gear and a bad smell. Damn surges are relentless.
Emissions: nature's way of telling you to fuck off from the Zone.
If you sleep through an alarm, it's a problem. If you sleep through an emission, it's fatal.
Got crispy? That's a rookie mistake!
Another light show, another stalker down. It's a fucking rave of death out here.
The Zone's disco inferno just claimed another life. Who's next?
They missed the warning, and the Zone didn't miss them. Fried to the core.
Running from emissions is like running from your ex. Sooner or later, they'll catch up to you.
That stalker thought he could outrun the storm. Nature had other plans.
Should've taken shelter, not shots. Liquor doesn't stop emissions, buddy.
When the sky lights up, you better start praying or running. Preferably both.
Some say the Zone reclaims its own. By 'reclaim,' I mean 'fry your ass.'
Emissions are like the Zone's reset button, except it only resets people... permanently.
He ran like hell, but the surge was faster. A shocking end, literally.
Missed the bunker by a minute. The Zone doesn't give second chances.
That surge didn't just fry him; it made a damn example out of him.
He thought he was a hotshot dodging mutants. Didn't dodge the surge though.
Fuck, that was brutal. The sky lit up and he just... vanished. Vaporized.
Zapped into oblivion. Another ghost for the Zone.
The last thing he heard was the sizzle of his own flesh. What a way to go.
Keep your eyes peeled and your shelter ready. Emissions wait for no one.
Died in a fucking light show. This Zone's a real bitch sometimes.
Fuck, not another one! These surges are cooking us faster than we can fucking run!
Goddamn surge roasted him like a pig. What a fucking waste.
Another fucker fried crispy. Should've paid attention to the warnings.
That's the Zone for you, zapping fuckers left and right.
Missed the shelter, got a lightning bolt up his ass. The Zone doesn't fuck around.
Shit, that was a nasty zap. Turned him into a walking lightbulb before he hit the ground.
If you're slow, you're a dead fuck. Simple as that with surges.
This emission shit fried another hopeful. Keep your asses covered, folks.
Surges are the Zone's way of flipping us the bird. Got one of our own today.
Turned into fucking charcoal. This surge wasnt playing.
Looks like the Zone's got a new torchlight. Poor bastard got lit up.
Fucking surges. Just lost a good man to the Zone's bullshit.
He's dust and memories now, thanks to that damn surge.
Imagine running from your life, only to get zapped into oblivion. Fuck this place.
Sky's cooking tonight! Another one bites the dust, and its crispy as fuck.
Didnt make it to the shelter. Now hes part of the Zones fried collection.
One less mouth to feed. These emissions are thinning the herd real quick.
Caught in the open, and bam! The Zones got no mercy for the slow.
He met his end glowing. Wouldnt wish that death on my worst enemy.
Yeah, they're crispy critters now. Damn surge didnt even blink.
Emissions: the ultimate judge, jury, and fucking executioner out here.
He zigged when he shouldve zagged. Emission made sure he paid for that mistake.
Zapped to the great beyond. Shit way to go out, all lit up and nowhere to run.
Sky turned red, and so did he. The Zones ruthless, folks.
That emission snatched him up quicker than a hooker on payday. Fucking tragic.
Emissions don't care who you are. Rich, poor, fuckers gonna fry you all the same.

Look at this beauty! A $what just sitting there, waiting for me!

A $what! And to think I almost walked right past it.

Found a $what. Can't believe my eyes. How much is this worth, anyway?
This $what's got a weird fucking glow. Hope it doesn't make my balls fall off.
Just picked up a $what. These damn things are freakier than a bloodsucker's kiss.
Found a $what! This thing better pay for my next trip out of this shithole.

Got a $what. Feels like carrying a ticking bomb.

A $what! Damn, this job has some perks after all.

Just unearthed a $what. These artifacts really are out of this world.
Managed to get my hands on a $what. This is the stuff legends are made of.

Holy shit, just snagged a $what. This thing is off the charts!

$what acquired. I feel like I just won the lottery.

Just got a $what. This shit is why I wake up in the morning.

Found a $what! Who says being a stalker doesn't have its perks?

What the hell is this? A $what? Damn thing might be cursed.
Just when I thought I was out, they pull me back in with a $what.
Worth the risk? Absolutely. Got my hands on a $what.

Im officially a $what thief. Hope it doesnt curse me or something.
Lucky bastard!
Lucky guy!
Mate, you're really lucky...
How come I can't find anything?
Not the best idea to announce it out of the blue.
Son of a bitch...
You just got yourself a big deal.
Congrats, my friend.
You serious?!
Meanwhile, I find nothing but rocks and rubbish.
Oh, poor me...
You probably just made yourself several enemies.
So is that it for you then? Leaving the Zone?
I've never seen one of those around here.
Good find! I might be interested in buying it...
Are you kidding?! I was just there and the place was totally empty!
Don't spend it all on booze.
You are on a roll, my man.
Ah! I've got a contract for one of those!
Hm, maybe there's more around...
Not bad.
My detector must be broken...
I'm going with him next time - he's got all the luck!
Careful, might be more of a target now...
There's going to be none left for us...
Good for you, found one of those last week.
Don't get too full of yourself.
Traders only give a shit when you come back with some swag...
Might want to keep it to yourself.
Why do people feel the need to announce such things?
It's a good start.
You've come a long way, stalker!
Let's hope it's not your last.
If I were you, I would trade it in as soon as possible. Otherwise, you're just asking for acute radiation poisoning or a bullet in the back.
I might have a job for you later if you're interested.
Which detector were you using?
Watch your back now, everyone knows you've struck gold.
Good thing I'm not the jealous type... much.
Bet its worth a small fortune if you dont get mugged first.
I'd keep that news to yourself next time. You never know who's listening.
Think you could find me one of those, too?
About time someone here found something worthwhile.
Wonder how long it'll take you to get jumped for it.
If I didnt know better, I'd say youre one lucky bastard.
Thatll get you a few rounds at the bar, at least.
Tell me you're not going to try and keep it all for yourself...
Now Im just pissed off. Wheres my luck?
Good catch! Just hope you dont glow in the dark by morning.
Mind sharing the spot you found it? Not like youll be back there...
Dont think that makes you better than us, though.
If you survive long enough to sell it, youre set.
Who did you bribe to get that luck?
Well, good for you... I guess.
Remember, no one likes a show-off.
Bet the traders are rubbing their hands in greed already.
If you disappear, well know what happened.
Better lock that up somewhere safe. Id sleep with one eye open.
With that, you might be able to leave this place... if youre smart about it.
You lucky bastard, what did you find?
Im gonna start following you around; maybe your luckll rub off.
Careful, friend. That kind of luck has a price.
Dont spend it all in one place, you hear?
Don't expect the Zone to let you off easy next time.
Look at you, swimming in luck. Just wait till it bites back.
Alright, where'd you find that? No need to keep it a secret.
Why don't I ever stumble upon stuff like that?
Thats great... unless the Zone has plans to take it back.
Good catch. Try to hold onto it, if you can.
And just like that, youre richer than the rest of us combined.
Tell me where you found it, or Ill be forced to follow you around.
Keep it close. Stuff like that makes you popular.
Dont get cocky. The Zone hates show-offs.
Hope it was worth the radiation exposure.
Lucky find. Just dont get too attached to it.
Seriously? How do you even get that lucky in this place?
If you dont want that, you know who to give it to.
Guess youll be the one buying drinks tonight.
Be careful who you tell. Word travels fast in the Zone.
Nice one, stalker. The Zone smiled on you today.
Think you could find another for me? Id owe you big.
Dont flash it around too much. Envys deadly here.
Watch it, people might start trailing you.
Well, you just became the Zone's latest target.
Now all you need is some courage to hang on to it.
Dont waste it; finds like that dont come often.
Nice. The Zone must be feeling generous.
Better get it to a trader before the Zone changes its mind.
Lucky you. Just be sure it doesnt blow up in your face.
Careful, someone might take it off your hands.
Looks like you hit the jackpot. Just dont expect it twice.

Whos up for some fun? This fuckers our new punching bag until his friends pay up.
We'll slice off a finger for every hour they're late. Hope they love you, prick.
Start cutting. They'll pay faster when they see the pieces.
Whats the matter, scared? You should be. This is going to hurt a hell of a lot more than it will hurt me.
Zip-tie his hands and feet. Let him squirm around like the rat he is.
This piece of shit thinks he's tough? Wait till he meets Mr. Blowtorch.
Someone gag this motherfucker before I pop him one and silence him for good.
Take a photo of this dickwad looking pathetic. Well send it to his buddies, with a price tag.
If you try anything funny, Ill skin you alive and use your hide as a rug, fuckface.
This cunts crying already? We havent even started the fun part.
Bind him up. Throw him in a hole. If hes smart, hell keep quiet and pray.
Duct tapes cheap, and this fuckers life is cheaper. Wrap him tight.
Oh, youre a tough guy, huh? Well see about that. Boys, get the pliers.
Dont kill him... yet. Lets make sure hes more valuable alive first.
Cover his head. No one wants to see his ugly mug while we wait for the ransom.
Strap him down, and let's remind him why he should fear the dark.
Let's strip him down and show him what real fear feels like.
No more games, asshole. Talk, or it's the last day you'll ever see.
No more games, asshole. Talk, or it's the last day you'll ever see.
running when they see him swinging in the wind.
Blindfold him. I don't want him seeing where we're taking him, the nosy prick.
Anyone wants to have a bit of 'fun' with this fucker before we cash him in?
Keep him alive, but make sure he's scared shitless.
This bastard won't be walking straight if he tries any funny business.
Get the tools; let's give this fucker a new smile from ear to ear.
What's the price on your head, huh? Bet it's not worth the bullet I'd save by killing you now.
Maybe we should cut off a toe for every hour they're late. Start with the little one.
I love it when they try to be heroes. Makes breaking them so much more satisfying.
Let's carve something pretty into his back, a message to his friends.
Don't kill him yet, use him as bait. If his friends want him, they can try and get him.
Stash him in the cellar. If he tries to scream, sew his fucking mouth shut.
This cunts good as dead if his mates dont pay up. Lets make his last hours hell.
If he pisses me off, I'm peeling the skin off his hands. Let's see him try to escape then.
Break a kneecap first. If he still wont talk, break the other.
Chain him up like the dog he is. Let him howl for a while.
Let's use this prick as a message. Kill him slow, make sure they all watch.
Shove a rag in his mouth. I can't stand hearing another fucking word.
Wrap him tight in barbed wire. Makes a nice present for his pals.
This rat's about to sing. Get the clamps and the battery; we're going for a chorus.
He's not dying fast enough. Anyone got some acid? Let's speed up the process.
Put this fucker in a cage and let everyone take a turn. He's our entertainment tonight.
Brand him so even if he runs, hell never escape what he is: marked.
Lock his ankles and leave him. Hunger makes a man talk, or it makes him die quiet.
Enough chit-chat. Hammer his teeth out; let's see him try to bite back then.
Guess you wont miss your gear, pal. Thanks for the donation.
His pack was a treasure trove!
Jackpot! This dead man's backpack was full of top-tier shit.
Hes dead, which makes this 'finders keepers'. Im taking it all.
Gonna pawn off his stuff for some quick cash.
You're dead and I'm not, so Ill be needing your stuff more than you.
Sorry mate, its survival of the fittest here, and your stuff is now mine.
Packed full! This dead stalker was loaded with good shit.
Thanks for the donation to the 'Keep Me Alive' fund, pal.
Shame you won't need these anymore, I'll make sure they're put to good use.
I'll take this off your hands, dead man. Feels wrong, but what can you do?
This guy had some prime gear on him, shame he couldn't use it to save his own skin.
Cheers for the gear, mate. Sorry about the dying part.
Good haul off this one. Sorry you wont need it anymore.
Your journey ends here, but your gear will keep marching on with me.
He died with a smile and a backpack full of goodies. What a way to go.
All this gear and no time left to enjoy it. I'll take it from here, buddy.
This poor sod was well-equipped. Pity good gear doesn't stop bullets.
Rest easy, mate. I'll make sure your gear keeps fighting the good fight.
Looks like I hit the jackpot with this one. Loaded with all sorts of essentials.
A bit bloody, but there are some quality bits and bobs here.
Dead men tell no tales, but their pockets might.
Lucky day for me, not so much for him. This gear will fetch a nice price.
You wont be needing these anymore. Ill honor your memory by not getting myself killed.
This guy had taste. And now, his exquisite gear is mine.
I'll say a prayer for you, mate. Your gear will help keep me alive.
A life's end is a scavenger's beginning. Sorry, but your gear is mine now.
Fresh loot! Nothing a little wipe can't clean off.
The dead dont need possessions. Ill just help myself.
Good finds on this one. It's a shame to let it go to waste.
Its a dirty job, but someone's gotta inherit this stuff.
Quick snatch before the mutants get here. This loot's too good to waste.
Everything considered, you had some decent gear. I'll make sure it's used well.
He's gone, and his stuff could save a lifemine. I'm taking it.
Your story ends here, but your gear will continue the journey with me.
Looting the dead might seem cold, but in the Zone, it's just survival.
Snagged some decent stuff off this corpse. Wonder what I can trade it for.
Creepy how he stared as I took his gear. But hey, survival first, right?
Cleaned him out. A couple of items might just save my skin.
I hate rifling through a dead mans pockets, but we all gotta eat.
This loot has seen more owners than a public toilet. Now it's my turn.
Bloody hell! This is my gear he nicked! Guess I'll be taking it back then.
Can't bury you properly, but I'll drink to your memory with the cash from your gear!
One day, someone might loot me like this. Until then, I'll use what I can.
Look at this! I know a guy who's been searching for one of these. Lucky me.
Alright, that's enough. The crows can have whatever's left.
Your gear will help keep me alive. It's the least I can do in your memory.
Hes got more loot than brains now! Sorry pal, I'm claiming this.
Look at this dumb fuck, died with all his goods. Finder's keepers!
This shithead wont be needing these goodies anymore. Yoink!
Looted a stiff today. He wont be missing this top-tier shit.
Whats this? Jackpot! This dead prick was loaded.
This guy's dead as dirt but his stash lives on with me. Thanks, chump.
Picked clean this poor bastard. Zone lifes a bitch, aint it?
Dead mans pockets aint sacred. Sorry, buddy, Im in need.
Goddamn, look at all this! This corpse was a walking goldmine!
Hey dead man, mind if I take this? Oh wait, you cant. Perfect.
This dead fuck left behind some prime loot. Sucks to be him, rocks to be me.
This guy thought he'd take it with him. Guess I relieved him of that burden.
What do we have here? This corpse is loaded! Guess it's my lucky day.
It's a harsh world; this dudes loss is my jackpot. Thanks for dying!
No use to a dead man, but definitely useful to me. Sorry, pal.
This stiff's loss is my gain. The Zone giveth, and I taketh away.
Just inherited a fortune from this corpse. Man, dying around here really pays off... for the living.
Stripped this dead sucker clean. Waste not, want not, right?
This unlucky bastard won't miss his gear. It's better off with me.
Harvesting the dead. Not proud, but hell, it's necessary.
Thanks for dying, mate. Your shit's in better hands now.
I'll make sure your gear doesn't go to waste. You're welcome, by the way.
This dude's death is my payday. Cheers to the fallen!
Score! This dead guy had all the good stuff.
Dead men tell no tales, but they sure can fill a backpack.
Jackpot! Found a stash of top-tier gear. Today is a good day.
This haul will keep me set for months. Thanks, you unlucky bastard.
Luck's on my side. Found a cache with everything I need.
Hit the mother lode! Gear, ammo, medsit's all here.
One man's misfortune is another's treasure. Loaded up good today.
Scored big time. This loot will fetch a pretty penny.
This stash was practically a gift from the Zone. Stocked up and ready.
Found a hidden stash with all the goodies. What a find!
Loaded up on prime gear. The Zone provides if you know where to look.
Todays haul: top-quality gear. Feels like Christmas in the Zone.
Looted a stash so good, I almost feel bad for the poor sod who lost it. Almost.
This find is a goldmine. Gear like this doesnt come around often.
Struck it rich with this stash. Gear, ammo, and supplies galore.
The Zone was kind today. Scored some primo loot.
Got my hands on a treasure trove of gear. The Zone delivers once again.
This stash was a real find. Gear up, folks, it's time to celebrate!
Hit the jackpot with this stash. The Zone's been generous today.
Loaded up on some serious loot. This is why we brave the Zone.
Struck gold with this find. Enough gear to last a lifetime.
Jackpot! Found enough supplies to last a while. The Zone's bounty is ours.
What a score! This stash is packed with top-notch gear.
Today's haul is a big one. Loaded up on quality loot.
Found a stash that'll keep us going for months. The Zone provides.
Hit the mother lode with this stash. Gear and supplies for days.
Scored some prime loot today. This will fetch a nice price.
Found a stash thats worth its weight in gold. Good day to be in the Zone.
This loot haul is one for the books. Loaded up and ready for anything.
Jackpot! This stash is a treasure trove. Stocked up and grinning ear to ear.
Struck it rich with this find. Enough gear and supplies to keep us going for a long time.
Today's haul is a big one. Found a stash packed with quality gear.
Loaded up on some serious loot. The Zone's been kind today.
This stash is a goldmine. Got enough gear to last a lifetime.
Scored a stash so good, I almost feel bad for the poor sod who lost it. Almost.
The Zone was generous today. Found some primo loot.
What a haul! This stash is packed with top-notch gear.
Struck gold with this find. Gear, ammo, and supplies galore.
Today's loot haul is a big one. Loaded up on quality gear.
Found a stash that'll keep us going for months. The Zone provides once again.
Hit the mother lode with this stash. Gear and supplies for days.
Scored some prime loot today. This will fetch a nice price on the market.
Jackpot! Found a stash that's worth its weight in gold. Good day to be in the Zone.
This loot haul is one for the books. Stocked up and ready for anything.
Struck it rich with this find. Enough gear and supplies to keep us going for a long time.
Jackpot! This stash is a treasure trove. Stocked up and grinning ear to ear.
Meh, nothing good, his pockets are empty.
He's got nothing special, no money in his pockets either.
Empty pockets... this guy was broke.
Didn't find anything useful, but it's better than nothing.
I found nothing but shit in his pockets. Man, I'm unlucky...
Dead bastard, what was he doing out here with empty pockets?
Guess what I found in his backpack, a Playboy.... not bad, eh?
His backpack is empty... damn it!
What the hell? This guy didn't own shit...
Nothing good on this one.
Someone must have gotten to this dude before I did.
Wow, nothing at all in his backpack. What were you doing out here?
Just a handful of junk, not even worth mentioning - and the pockets were totally empty.
This was one poor stalker.
Nothing on him at all... this guy must have a stash nearby.
Well, seems this man was robbed right before he kicked it.
Nothing on him but some letters, looks personal.
All that trouble, and his pack is totally empty!
Well, this guy had nothing to speak of. Only thing in his bag was a bunch of photographs.
Pack is completely torn open and the only thing in his pockets were some food wrappers.
Hm, no good. He had nothing on him at all.
Well, that's an end for you, my friend. Didn't even have anything with you.
This guy didn't have a rouble to his name! Well, your troubles are over.
And... he's got nothing. Man, everything is going wrong for me these days.
Pockets were full of small bones. Otherwise, he didn't have anything.
Well, rest in peace, brother. We're all the same in the end, rich or poor...
Wasn't even worth the look, the corpse had nothing of interest.
Not exactly the riches I was hoping for. Couldn't even find a PDA.
Things weren't going well for this chap. He could have left a little something for me though...
Hm, this stalker had some sort of book on him. I think I'll keep this for myself.
This sucker's pockets were as empty as his skull. Nothing worth a damn.
Checked his gear, and shit, its all crap. Literally had a broken compass and half a map.
All that sneaking around for nothing! This guy's pack was just full of junk and old rags.
What a waste of time, not even a rusty knife on this one. The Zone's playing tricks on us today.
His backpack's a black holenothing but worthless shit. My grandma has scarier stuff in her attic!
Great, another broke bastard. This guy didnt have two bullets to rub together.
This dead man's pockets? Ha! I've seen richer beggars in Pripyat.
Fuck all here, mates. Just some old photos and a mouldy sandwich. This zone's going to hell.
Looks like this guy gambled his last good item. Nothing left but buttons and lint.
Well, he died as he livedempty-handed and forgotten. No loot, no luck.
Who dies with just a pack of smokes and a lighter? At least leave me something to sell!
Searching him was a bigger disappointment than my last ammo trade. Absolutely nothing.
This guy's gear was trash. Not even a decent wire or a piece of scrap metal.
If poverty were riches, this fella would be a king. His pack was pitiful!
Bloody hell, this guy was packing more junk than a hoarder. Nothing useful.
I've found better loot in a garbage dump. This guy had zip, zilch, nada.
Thought I'd struck gold, but all I got was this lousy t-shirt. Literally, a fucking t-shirt.
His stash was a joke. A few rusty screws and a bent fork. Big haul!
What's this? An empty flask and some wire. Guess he was planning to fish or hang himself.
Rummaged through his things. Found nothing but a soggy map and a broken lighter. My luck's turned sour.
That bastard was carrying $what, I will keep it.
Found $what in his backpack. This will come in handy.
Would you look at this! He had $what. It's mine now.
Got $what! That's the best thing I found on his corpse. Won't even complain about it.
I needed $what. Thanks for saving me from spending money, my dead friend.
He was carrying $what. I'll make good use of it.
Anyone looking for $what? Well, guess I'll keep it....
The most interesting find was $what. Not too bad.
He had $what on him. Most of the other stuff was junk.
Well, return to the earth. Hey, $what. I'll hold on to this for you.
Alright, this one had $what. I think I know someone who could make us of this.
He had $what on him. Let's hope my luck keeps up.
I found $what on him. Thanks! Your death is not in vain.
Well, the good news is that he had $what. The bad news is that he won't be able to use it...
Damn it, I think I'm getting an infection. At least this guy had $what for me.
Cut down in his prime! He had $what and some other stuff - can't say he'll be missing it...
Found $what; hope that it will fetch a high price.
Know anyone who would want to buy $what? The original owner doesn't need it any longer...
Mostly junk in his bag, but he did have $what.
I feel sorry for this stalker, he had a rough time. Taking $what, hope it brings me luck.
Hey, nice! Look at this: $what!
Looks like $what. Again? I should start a collection.
This man had refined taste! He had $what on him.
Sad story: some hapless guy dies and leaves $what. I'll try to do him proud.
He had some items of interest, but the best find was $what.
Well, this poor fellow is all torn up, but I found $what! Pretty nice condition, too.
Hey, Borya was looking for $what. You can tell him I just found one on this corpse.
Ok, not bad - nothing wrong with $what.
Didn't Vadim have $what? Does this one look like his?
Interesting, $what. You can keep the rest, my friend.
Well, we've got a dead body here and he's got $what. What should we do with it?
This guy seemed to have put up quite a fight, and there's $what in his pack.
Well, this guy had his time and he's done for now. I'm grateful that he had $what, better than nothing.
Only $what? I bet this guy had a stash somewhere.
Junk... nothing special.... ooh, he had $what with him.
I don't feel right taking it, but times are tough and I could use $what.
Damn this guy had $what with him.
Who says there's never an upside to this job? Found $what.
Sleep now, stalker. You have nothing more to worry about. But I do, so I'll be taking $what from you.
That dead stalker had $what. Well, that's done with.
Oh, sweet! Found a $what on this dead fucker. Today's my lucky day!
All this way for a $what? This guy was as disappointing in death as he probably was in life.
I've picked cleaner shit off my boot, but hey, a $what's a $what.
This poor sod had nothing but a $what on him. Guess it's better than a kick in the teeth.
Well, I'll be damned, a $what? This chap might've died, but his taste in gear did him some favors.
Finally, something worth my timea $what. The rest of his shit was as useless as tits on a boar.
Who dies with a $what? Lucky me, I suppose. Thanks, dead guy.
A $what, eh? This bloke was holding out on us! Well, finders keepers.
Looting dead men ain't my style, but I'm not one to turn down a $what.
Bleeding hell, a $what! This stiff's loss is my gain.
Sorry mate, I'll be nicking that $what off ya. Can't let it go to waste.
Well, this is a first... found a $what in his coat. This zone gets weirder by the day.
Wouldn't you know it? The dead fella had a $what. It's mine now, no point in it going to the grave.
He had a $whatcan't believe my fucking luck! Better him than me, eh?
Among the garbage, a gem: $what. Who says looting corpses doesn't pay?
Poor bastard, died clutching a $what. Well, I'll put it to better use than he did.
Jackpot! Ripped a $what off this corpse. The Zone giveth, and I taketh away.
This corpse had a $what. I feel a bit like a vulture, but a survivor's gotta survive.
Luck be a lady tonight! This dead stalker had a $what.
Dead men tell no tales, but they sure can hold onto some fine $what!
Yoink! Snagged a $what from this dead motherfucker. Finder's keepers, losers weepers.
This idiot had a $what. What a waste... Well, it's mine now, dipshit.
Rifled through a dead man's pockets and what do you know? A fucking $what! Today's my day!
This poor fucker's dead, but his $what lives on with me. Thanks, asshole.
This guy was a walking goldmine, had a $what on him. Pity he won't be needing it where he's going.
Look what we have here, a $what! This dumbass didn't even get to use it.
Stripped this carcass clean and found a $what. Merry fucking Christmas to me!
Well, well, what have we here? A $what? Dont mind if I do, you wont be needing it, shithead.
Every cloud has a silver lining, like finding a $what on this dead prick.
What's this? A $what? Ha! This sucker's loss is my gain.
Robbing the dead ain't my usual style, but I'll make an exception for a $what.
Ha! This chump had a $what. Guess I hit the jackpot.
From his cold, dead hands, I take this $what. Rest in pieces, fucker.
This bloke was packing a $what. Shame he couldnt live long enough to enjoy it.
Just looted a $what from some dead fool. Guess his luck's run out but mine's just starting.
$what found on a stiff. His misfortune, my payday.
Scavenging through bodies isn't pretty, but snagging a $what sure as hell is sweet.
Dug up a $what from this corpse's backpack. Score one for the bad guys.
Corpse looting 101: Always take the $what. Thanks, dead dude.
This corpse was clutching a $what like it could save him. Newsflash: it didn't, but it might save me.
Found a $what on this body. Not the worst way to end a shitty day.
This dead bastard was sitting on a $what. Guess it's finders keepers now!
Turns out this guy had a $what. You snooze, you lose, pal.
Just nabbed a $what off some dead fuck's body. Easy come, easy go.
This guy's death brought one good thinga $what for me!
This stiff was packing a $what. Guess it's my lucky day.
Picked a $what off a corpse. Morbid, maybe, but profitable? Hell yes.
This poor sap died with a $what in his pack. It's mine nowsurvival of the fittest, buddy.
The dead don't need shit. That's why I'm taking this $what.
This fuckwit died with a $what. What a way to go out. I'll put it to good use.
WHO TOOK MY STASH?!!!
My stash....
HEY! LEAVE MY STUFF ALONE!
I got a signal from my stash... don't tell me someone has found it...
My PDA is beeping..... Whoever got his hands on my stash, you're gonna regret it. I promise.
Son of a bitch... They took my stash!
Goddamn it... Can't a man hide his stash in peace? I give up.
Some asshole raided my stash. Time to hunt them down.
Who the hell sniffs out my stash? You're dead meat if I find you!
Great, just great... My stash has been picked clean.
Looks like we've got a thief. My stash isn't safe anymore.
That was my stash, you thieving rat!
All that effort, and now someone's nicked my stash. Brilliant!
Alert the others! Someones been tampering with my stash.
My gears gone. Whoever took it is going to pay... heavily.
This is why we can't have nice things... because some jackass always takes them.
If you thought stealing my stash was a good idea, wait until you see what comes next.
Touch my stash again, and it'll be the last thing you ever do.
I'll find you, stash thief. And it won't be pretty when I do.
My stash has been hit. This means war.
Whoever fucking raided my stash is a dead man walking!
My stash's gone! Those thieving shits are gonna regret crossing me.
Fucking hell, not my stash! I'll tear apart this whole damn Zone to find the prick who took it.
All my shits gone! I swear Im gonna gut the bastard who stole it like a fish.
Just found my stash empty. Someones about to get their ass kicked.
Who the fuck thinks it's funny to steal my stash? I'll shove their smile up their ass.
Stash robbed! Whoever you are, I'm gonna enjoy making you suffer.
My stash was here, and now it's gone. Whoever took it, pray I don't find you.
Someone's fucked with the wrong stalker's stash. I'll hunt you down like the rat you are.
To the fucker who emptied my stash: I've got a bullet with your name on it.
What kind of lowlife steals a man's stash? Get ready for a world of hurt.
Great, my stash is missing! Time to break some legs and take names.
My stash has been looted! I'll rip the thief's head off their shoulders!
Found my stash pillaged. I'm gonna rip someone's nuts off for this.
They took my stash. Bad move. Im coming for you, and hells coming with me!
Missing stash! Whoever took it, your mother's a whore and your father's a thief!
Alert! My stash was compromised! Ill make the thieves eat their own hearts.
Hey! Who's the asshole that picked clean my stash? Gonna break your legs and use you as bait!
To the piece of shit who stole from me: I will fuck up your day so bad, youll wish you were never born.
Found out my stash was hit. Whoever you are, I hope you choke on it, you thieving cunt.
Goddammit, my stash is gone! Whoever took it, you're dead when I find you.
Stash gone. Im gonna tear this place apart to find the bastard responsible.
To the prick who stole my stash: sleep with one eye open.
Someone thought itd be a good idea to raid my stash. Theyre wrong.
My stash is missing, and Im out for blood.
Whoever took my stash, I hope you enjoy it. Its the last thing youll ever take.
Found my stash looted. Im gonna make the thief regret it.
Somebody's been messing with my stash. Time to crack some skulls.
My stash is gone. Someones about to have a very bad day.
If youre the one who took my stash, you better start running now.
To the stash thief: Im gonna find you and make you pay.
Stash raided! Time to show these bastards what happens when you steal from me.
My stash has been hit. No mercy for the thief.
Someone stole my stash. Im gonna hunt you down like a dog.
Found my stash empty. Whoever did this is going to regret it.
To the fucker who stole my stash: I hope you like pain, 'cause Im bringing plenty.
Stash thief, wherever you are, youre dead when I get my hands on you.
Someone cleaned out my stash. Im gonna find you and make you pay dearly.
My stash is gone! Whoever took it, your days are numbered.
To the asshole who stole my stash: you better hope I never find you.
My stash has been raided! Time to break some bones.
Someone took my stash. Now Im taking their life.
To the thief who stole my stash: pray I dont find you.
Stash robbed. Someones getting their head smashed in for this.
Found my stash looted. Whoever did this is gonna pay with blood.
My stash is gone, and so are your chances of surviving when I find you.
To the piece of shit who took my stash: Im coming for you.
Someone stole my stash. Now, someones gonna die.
Found my stash empty. Time to break some legs.
My stash is gone! Who's the dead man walking?
Whoever took my stash is gonna regret it for the rest of their short life.
Found my stash looted. The thief is about to meet their maker.
Stash missing! The bastard who took it is gonna wish they hadnt.
Who the fuck took my stash? Theyre a goner.
My stash is gone. Time to hunt down the thief.
Someone took my stash. That someones about to have a very bad day.
Stash gone. Time to crack some skulls and take it back.
Who the hell took my stash? Youre gonna regret it.
Someone looted my stash. Big mistake.
My stash is gone. Someones getting hurt for this.
To the thief who stole my stash: your life is over.
Stash missing! Someones about to pay with their blood.
Whoever took my stash is gonna wish they hadnt been born.
My stash was here, now its gone. The thiefs days are numbered.
Found my stash empty. Time to teach the thief a lesson they wont forget.
My stash is gone! Whoever took it, your end is near.
Someone took my stash. Theyre dead when I find them.
To the fucker who stole my stash: Im coming for you, and hells coming with me.
My stash has been raided. The thief is about to have a very bad day.
Someone looted my stash. Theyre dead meat now.
Found my stash gone. Time to break some bones.
My stash is gone! Whoever took it, your days are numbered.
To the asshole who stole my stash: hope you enjoy your last days.
Stash robbed! Time to hunt down the thief.
Whoever took my stash is a dead man walking.
My stash is gone. Someones about to meet their end.
To the thief who stole my stash: your time is up.
My stash is gone... How could this happen? I can't believe it.
No... My stash! It's all gone! What am I supposed to do now?
My stash was everything I had... I can't go on without it.
Who would do this? Who would take my stash? It's not fair...
I can't stop shaking... My stash is gone. Everything's gone...
Why does this always happen to me? My stash... gone...
I'm done. First the Zone takes my friends, now my stash. I give up.
This is a nightmare. My stash is gone. I don't know what to do...
Who took my stash? I just want it back... please...
I'm so tired of this. My stash is gone and so is my hope...
I can't handle this anymore. My stash is gone, my life is over...
Please, if you found my stash, just give it back. I need it...
I'm not even angry. Just... tired. Why did you take my stash?
My stash is gone... I don't have the strength to start over.

Last night, some drifters claimed that the legendary stalker who neutralized the Brain Scorcher has returned to the Zone.
Who exactly is this Strelok? His name's been buzzing around a lot lately.
Rumor has it Ukraine's chief scientific consultant, known in the zone as "Strelok," has fled back into the Zone. What's drawing him back this time?
Everyone says Strelok's deadhauled off by Spetsnaz. Keep it down, or you might be next.
Some yokel claims Strelok's back? Bullshit. My crew watched him go down.
This Strelok saga is getting wild. Has anyone here actually laid eyes on him?
Heres a theory: what if the Military snatched Strelok and cloned him? Wouldn't surprise me...
Hey Strelok, if you're out there, remember you owe me a bottle of vodka.
A buddy swore he saw Strelok kill a bloodsucker with nothing but a knife. Seems about right for him.
Caught a glimpse of a stalker in a helmetless SEVA suit around Agroprom. Reminded me of Strelok's setup. Coincidence?
Last night at the campfire, some old-timers whispered that the stalker who once silenced the Brain Scorcher is prowling the Zone again.
Strelok's name keeps popping up. What's the real story? Did anyone here actually run into him?
Word is that Ukraine's elusive scientific mind, known in the underbelly as "Strelok," has resurfaced in the Zone. What magnetic mystery pulls him back?
They say Strelok's been snatched up by Spetsnaz and is long gone. Talk too loud, and you might just follow his footsteps.
Bunch of rookies claiming they saw Strelok around? Nonsense. My mates and I saw what happened to him. He's no longer walking this earth.
All these tall tales about Strelokare any of them true? Has anyone here got a real story to share?
Think about itwhat if Strelok was captured and cloned by the Military? That would explain these recent sightings...
Strelok, buddy, if you're reading this, don't forget you owe me a vodka for that bet at Yanov station.
Heard from a reliable drunk that Strelok took down a bloodsucker single-handedly with just a shiv. If that doesn't scream 'legend', I don't know what does.
There's a rumor that Strelok was seen navigating the Red Forest, could the legends be true?
Rumours say that Strelok is hunting for something priceless in the heart of Chernobyl. What's he after this time?
Everyone's talking about the ghost of Strelok haunting the Zone. I'll believe it when I see it with my own two eyes.
Strelok's old crew's been spotted in the northern sectors. Maybe they're looking to finish what he started?
They say Strelok's trying to uncover the secrets of the Zone itself. Madman or genius?
Rumor has it Strelok's map to the center of the Zone has resurfaced. Treasure hunters are losing their minds!
Is Strelok assembling a new team? My sources say he's been recruiting for a deep dive into the Zone.
Word is Strelok found a way to the Monolith. If that's true, we're all in for a ride.
Strelok was always two steps ahead. Now, rumors suggest he's on the verge of the biggest discovery since the Zone's creation.
I heard a crazy story that Strelok's looking to shut down the Zone for good. Can you imagine?
New gossip is that Strelok isn't even human anymore; something in the Zone changed him, turned him into something else...
Streloks been spotted near the Yanov station again, either hes lost or onto something big.
Some say they've seen Strelok around Pripyat. Are the old legends about him and the Wish Granter true?
Keep your voice down, but Ive heard Streloks aiming to expose the truth behind the Zone's anomalies. Shocker if true.
If you believe the Zone's buzz, Streloks artifact hunts might just revolutionize the world. Or end it.
Ever wonder if Streloks ghost is just another anomaly of the Zone? Some nights, it feels all too real.
Old hunters claim Streloks gear was rigged with experimental tech. Could be why everyone's still chasing his shadow.
Watch out for Strelok imposters. Since the bounty went up, every wannabe in the Zone claims they're him.
Streloks journal was reportedly found near the Jupiter plant. Could lead to some valuable stashif its not a deathtrap.
Last I heard, Strelok's been trying to crack the code on Zone teleportation. Imagine the chaos if he pulls it off!
My friend came back from his trip yesterday. He told me about some creepy guy who preached his group about a new clan. Called "Sin" or something. Did someone contact him before?
Did you guys meet this man before? He asked me to join his clan. They call themselves the "dark stalkers"... What the fuck is going on?
"We are the harbingers of a new age". These are the words of some sick fuck I met a few hours ago. Who is this guy? What does this even mean?
It seems that someone is recruiting members for an unknown side. They call themselves "Sin". I can't tell if this is some bad joke, but keep an eye for any suspicious stalkers you see.
Anyone else been getting weird anonymous messages from "Sin" recently?
Some dumbass just sent me a threat, something about "Sin will claim me." Yeah, real scary, asshole.
Word's going round about a shady figure calling himself the "Prophet of Sin". Seems he's gathering a crew with promises of 'ascending the Zone'. Nutters, the lot of them.
I bumped into some odd fellow draped in black, rambling about joining "Sin" to cleanse the Zone. Sounds like a cult brewing to me.
Keep your eyes peeled, lads. Theres rumours of a group named "Sin" doing dark dealings in the shadows of the Zone. Dont fall for their tales.
Last night, some bloke tried to convince me to meet their leader of "Sin". Reckons theyve got the answers to the Zones mysteries. Smells like trouble.
Just overheard a heated exchange about "Sin". Something about them planning a big move soon. Could be nothing, but best stay sharp.
There's a new gang whispering promises of power and purpose. They call themselves "Sin". Watch your back if they approach you.
Met a stalker who claimed he escaped from "Sin". Said theyre not just a clan, theyre a bloody doomsday cult.
Rumor has it that "Sin" might be behind the recent disappearances. If you hear their call, best to just walk away.
We got some fucking work people. Unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. I need volunteers to investigate the fucking source. Details will be shared in the damn meeting.
Veterans, we need volunteers to investigate the fucking source of unidentified radio transmissions that have been detected recently. Details will be shared in the damn meeting.
Stalkers, we are looking for volunteers to investigate the fucking source of unidentified radio transmissions that have been detected recently by our scientists. Details will be shared in the damn meeting.
Guys, we were able to detect unidentified radio transmissions. I need brave warriors to investigate the fucking source. Meet me in the Warehouses for more damn details.
Unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. Our client wants to investigate the fucking source in exchange for a good payment. Details will be shared in the damn meeting.
Stalkers, unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. I'm looking for someone to investigate the fucking source. Meet me in the Bunker and I will share the damn details.
Now I've seen everything...
We made it guys, we survived the $what!
That was rough... are you okay, guys?!
Is everybody still alive?!
It's over, carry on people.
That was one hell of a $what...
It's over now... finally.
Shit, my teeth are still rattling! Everyone alright?
...oh man... my head...
All right, people. It's safe now.
Damn! I'll never get used to that!
Oh shit, was Sasha out there? Anybody know if he made it to a safe spot?
Great, now I've got a headache for the rest of the day.
Never thought it would end...
Are these things getting longer?
Alright! Back to business...
I hate $whats.
I guess he couldn't make it in time... rest in peace, stalker.
About time! How about a drink?
That one felt more angry than usual.
That wasn't so bad, was it?

The air always feels so thin after $whats.
And... we're good! Let's go.
One of these times the shelter won't hold.
Ok, break's over! We've got shit to do.
Sometimes it's nice to have a little break from everything.
Wow, look at the sky.
Probably more walking corpses to deal with...

I'm starting to wonder if we're cursed...
Just another day in paradise, eh?

We're still breathing! That's always a good sign, right?
The calm after the storm... Let's keep our guards up.
Its quiet... too quiet. Keep your eyes peeled, folks.

Well, if nothing else, $whats sure make life in the Zone interesting.
Guess it's back to scavenging and shooting. The $what's over, after all.
Time to see what the $what stirred up this time. I'm betting more mutants, less loot.

Seems like there's a new trader around Cordon behind the farm, he was set up there for a few days.
Move out squad!
Move out squad!
Ahah, shit, I've seen everything now. A Dutyer playing another's meat flute.
Motherfucker, who ate my sausage? Gonna find that knob and teach him a lesson.
Lads, there are lots of stalkers with artefacts coming from the North.
Brothers in Jupiter, got word that you have a rat from the SSU. I bet my ass it's the one with the good weapon.
A campfire, some kissel, and sweets! Haha.
Fucking fat asswipe. Did you lose the armoury keys again?
Crikey, it was more fun around the trenches than it is in the base.
I think we've got a rat in here. Every raid so far has been a complete fuck-up... Stalkers just start blasting us before we even know.
We just ran into a flying black smoke cloud. What the hell?
What now, you wankers? Come and get me if you dare!
Don't go bothering the boss in the next couple of hours.
We jumped a couple of bitches and are going back to base.
One of my dudes been shot, can anyone come find us and take us to the base? Guys at the perimeter, can you help us?!
feelin pretty shit. Who cares, Ima have myself a beer, HEHE.
Damn, I don't get it. Where's my shooter?
Ehh... I haven't seen my mother in a long while since I joined this business.
Fucking state. You don't get shit from them, you turn the other direction, and they ruin your life for nothing.
Olivius, we've got another rat. The hidden stuff was completely gone. Go break some heads for me.
I'm pouring one out for my good buddy, Andryushka! No more swag for you, pal.
What is this, a zoo? I want the poker table cleaned out of the armoury right fuckin now! Don't make me get Nikita!
Why do we give two shit whether you're drunk or not? Just do your job and get off the channel!
Organizing night raids - looking for a couple more dudes who can swing a gun. Meet us round back of the boss's place.
No, no, no, you dumbshits! This is the counterfeit - where did the real stuff go?
New batch of Kalashnikovs. Olivius is giving them away... for a price.
Girls is really what we need in here. Shit is so boring at night. Well, apparently they don't keep.
Ever miss the good ol' days? Well, those were shitty too, so don't kid yourself. But... the chumps weren't packing like they are now.
Is there enough brainpower in this entire place to get a secure signal from Dark Valley to Jupiter? I mean, what the hell? I thought Limpid had this figured out.
Spare a thought for those suckers in the Vehicle Graveyard. Sorry boys!
If I find you doing that again, it's going up to Sultan. The bosses decide what we make, so get that through your fat skull.
We got hit by the fucking army boys. I can't tell how many of us made it out, I'm on my own.
Too bad for him: he shouldn't have been swaggering around without looking and now he's paid for it. Just leave him - we can't carry him back.
Sweet! This guy was some sort of artefact collector! Get them while you can - I'm selling em cheap!
He's been gone a long time... something isn't right about this. I think he turned on us.
Niles! Get in the channel! Niles!
My old man would be proud of us, lads. We've really made it in here.
Happy boss, happy life. Just you remember that, you little piss-ants.
Hey pricks! Want some guards? We're looking for some work. You want some real men to watch over you?
I can confirm that our inside guy in you know where is done for. Either he lost his head, or they sniffed him out.
Hey, slacker assholes: I heard Sultan is coming down personally to check on things. So I would get your shit together.
If you keep stealing the medicinal liquor, don't expect anything pleasant when you come in for surgery. Bunch of fucking animals.
Lads, remember the old quarry? Some wanker thinks he can set up shop there. Let's teach him the rules.
Someone's been messing with my stash of goodies. Find them, and make them regret it.
Snitches get stitches, boys. Found another mole trying to rat us out to Duty. Let's close his file.
Look, if you're going to the center, keep your eyes peeled for the Military. They're not just on patrol; they're hunting.
Any of you idiots seen my lucky knife? Last I saw it, it was with that dimwit who went down to the tunnels.
Caught a Freedom scout nosing around our camp. He won't be reporting back, don't worry about that.
Just overheard some Ecologists talking about a big score. Might be worth "escorting" them for a bit, eh?
Why the hell are we running low on ammo again? Who's skimming off the top? Don't make me find out myself.
We're planning a little welcome party for some stalkers heading our way. Get your gear and be ready to party.
The stash in the derelict building has been pinched. It's an inside job, boys. Time to flush out the rat.
Hey fuckers, Sultan's got a new job. Meet at the pit. Bring your shittiest grin and a loaded gun.
Caught two Merc cunts too close to our stash. Time to introduce them to our kind of fun.
Who's the dumbfuck that left the gate open with mutants around? Next time I'll feed you to them myself.
The shit hit the fan. The deal's fucked. Got both goods and guns on our asses. Need some bloody help now.
That dickhead from Rostok's undercutting us. Time to cut him offpermanently.
Some loner's been dicking around near the stash. Time for a little target practice.
Eyes up, fuckwits. Stalkers trying to sneak through the north. Shoot first, strip 'em later.
We're out of fucking vodka again. Time to "borrow" some from those Duty pricks.
Newbie's acting up. Might need to take him out back and teach him some mannerspermanently.
Got some weird-ass chatter on the comms. Either we're haunted or someone's fucking with us.
Tell Grishka he owes me for the last job. No more credits till he pays up, the cheap bastard.
Stay the fuck away from the anomaly near the old church. Already lost two good men to that bitch.
Stash at the bridge is blown. Moved everything to Ivan's shit-hole. Watch your step there.
Some fucker thinks he can make peace with Freedom. Let's see how peaceful he feels with a shank in his ribs.
Need a few hard cocks for a smash-and-grab on the east road. Pay's good, loot's better.
There's a shiny new artifact calling our name. Sultan wants it, so get off your asses and fetch.
Our inside man with the pricks croaked. No more deals with those nerds till we figure this out.
Last raid was fucking poetry. Loot's sorted, come grab your share before I change my mind.
Last fight's got the Feds sniffing around. Time to go dark. Sell shit through your cousin or something.
Heard about a stash in Dead City. Big risk, big reward. Who's got the balls?
The Merc fucks are snooping again. Let's remind them whose ground they're crawling on.
Dawn raid on those stalker cunts. No mercy. They've fucked with us for the last time.
Fancy a bet? Loser runs naked through the minefield. Don't pussy out on me now.
Those Freedom pricks are up to something. Time to fuck up their day real good.
Some high-tech shit left in the old lab. Finder's fee's yours if you're not a total moron.
Who's man enough to raid the geek camp? They've got drugs that could even fix your dumb ass.
Check the fucking traps, you mongs. We're not letting another night of mutant feasting happen.
All fucks onboard: Sultan's lined up a winter-filler job. Don't cock it up.
Keep an eye on the fresh meat. Sultan's twitchy, and you should be too. Make 'em prove they're not feds.
Who's been fingering the supply cache? Setting a trap. Let's catch the thieving prick.
Stalkers sniffing around our shit again. Reinforce the message with lead. This is our fucking house.
Heading out to the zone? Keep your shit wired tight and your gun ready. It's about to get real messy.
New meat's not so bad. Pulled his weight on the last run. Might not have to kill him after all.
Duty's tightening their noose. Time to loosen it. Set up an ambush where they least expect.
Sultan's in a shit mood. Keep your head down and your ass tighter. You don't wanna be on his radar today.
Lost a whole fucking crate of ammo to those mutant bastards. Next time we're mining the field. Heavy.
Sultan needs a few good pricks for a quiet job. Keep it sleek, keep it brutal.
Picked clean a dead stalker. Got some fancy sights. First come, first serve, no holds.
Military's rolling a convoy through tomorrow. It's fat with gear. Who's down for a little party?
Watch for those Merc fucks. They're not here to sightsee. They're here for the goods. Let's surprise them.
Heard about some shiny new shit in the Red Forest. Sultan's got a hard-on for it. No dicking around, get it first.
Who the fuck parked their truck in the boss's spot? Move it or lose itand I mean lose something you'll miss.
Alright, lads, who's up for a game of chicken with the Duty patrols? Last one to flinch buys the drinks!
Need some muscle at the east gate. Some cheeky fucker's trying to offload our gear. Time to educate him on property rights.
This is Sultan speaking. Next one to nick stuff from my stash gets fed to the snorks. No fucking around.
If the shitter's full again, don't look at me. I'm not unblocking that mess you animals made. Sort it out yourselves.
Hey pricks, Sultan's throwing a bash tonight. Bring your own booze, and maybe stash some for the rest of us, eh?
Caught a stalker snooping around the stash. Tied him up for now. Ideas on how to make him talk? He looks soft.
Listen up! There's a party of Mercs headed towards the Valley. Let's show them how we welcome guests!
Someone's idea of a joke was to put a live grenade in the loot pile. Funny, right? Find this comedian before I do.
Just a heads up, we're low on filters for the gas masks. If you've got extras, I'll trade you for something nice. Or just bring 'em before we all choke.
The boys found some weird shit in the Dark Valley. Looks valuable. No touching till I check it out.
Anyone sees Dima, tell him he owes me 200 roubles and I'm not the patient type. Pay up or pay dearly.
Who's up for raiding some rookie camps tonight? Easy loot, and maybe some fun kicking around the newbs.
Got a deal going down at the old factory. Heavy creds on this one. Don't fuck it up.
Our lookout in the North Tower's drunk again. Someone get his ass down and sober him up before he falls off.
Lost three men to the mutants last night. Stop going out alone, you motherfuckers. Team up or die stupid.
There's a stash of gear from those dead Mercs up for grabs. First come, first served. And no, I don't feel bad about it.
If anyone wants to buy some slightly used weapons, meet me behind the bar. Cash only, no questions.
The Freedom guys are getting cocky again. Let's remind them who really runs the Bar.
Reminder: Don't shoot the Duty guys yet. We've got deals pending that pay better than their scalps.
Watch it with the grenades, asshats! You almost blew up the loot. Next one's going out strapped to you.
Seriously, who keeps eating all the damn food? Lock up your shit or starve.
That fancy tech we lifted? Turns out it's hot. Really hot. Like, glowing-in-the-dark hot. Any takers?
Saw some Duty patrol getting cozy with a Bloodsucker. Almost felt sorry for them. Almost.
Keep the noise down in the hideout. You want the mutants to join us for a drink or what?
Stashes are running low. Time to relieve those fat-cat Ecologists of their fancy gadgets.
Alright, who's the wise guy that sold our coords to those Merc dicks? I've got a special bullet with your name on it.
Stalkers, Duty, Mercs... they're all the same when you're lining them up in your sights. Just make sure you're not in theirs.
Oh, and for those of you betting on the next Duty vs. Freedom clash, put your money on chaos. It's the only winner here.
Hey shits, just torched a Duty camp. Roasted 'em like marshmallows. Who's up for looting some crispy corpses?
If you're not screwing someone over, you're not trying hard enough. Reminder: There's a bonus for whoever scams those Eco fucks out of their artifacts.
Caught a Freedom dickhead spray-painting dicks on our walls. He's tied up in the yard for public entertainment. Feel free to express your artistic side on him.
Snagged some fine ass gear off a dead stalker. Selling it cheap, 'cause I think he shit himself when he died. Adds character, right?
Rumor has it, some Duty twats are planning a 'moral cleansing'. Let's cleanse their clocks first. Gather your shit; we're going hunting.
Stole a crate of vodka from those Military assholes. Party at my shack. First come, first serve, and bring your own cup.
Anyone up for some target practice? There's a group of ecologists nearby. Heard they scream funny when you shoot 'em.
Some asshole tried to bribe us with gadgets to let him go. Joke's on him, took the stuff and his shoes. He's wandering barefoot now, ha!
Threw a grenade into a Duty meeting. It was like popping a zit. Splatter everywhere! Need more grenades though, so cough 'em up.
Freedom tried to negotiate peace. We negotiated their supplies right off their fucking truck. Thanks for the free shit, hippies!
Those Merc pricks think they can outsmart us? Set up a nice little explosive surprise under their asses. Waiting for the bang!
Who's the moron that lost our map to the mutants' lair? Get your ass over here, I've got a special beating just for you.
Just kidnapped a couple of Duty's finest. Ransom? Nah, we're betting on how long they last in a snork pit.
Looking for volunteers to raid some Freedom weed farms. Come for the fight, stay for the high.
We've got Duty spies crawling all over. Time to clean house. If you're not with us, you're against us. And if you're against us, well... good fucking luck.
Remember lads, shoot first, ask questions never. Especially if it's one of those Duty or Freedom fucks.
Caught a stalker trying to sneak through our turf. Stripped, whipped, and clipped. Keep an eye out, could be more the little rats around.
Our next raid's on some rich prick Ecologist. Heard he's hoarding artefacts like a dragon. Time to slay!
Pissed in the Duty commander's vodka. Let's see if they notice the extra flavor at their next toast.
Anyone else wants to complain about the chow? Keep it up, and you'll find yourself on the menu. Mutants gotta eat too.
Heard the Ecologists found a new artefact that cures stupidity. Guess we won't be seeing them get any smarter, eh?
Why do Freedom fighters smoke weed? So they can handle the reality of being the Zone's biggest losers.
Catching a Freedom stalker is easy. Just follow the cloud of smoke and the sound of bad reggae.
Mercs tried to buy us off with tech. Joke's on them, we took the tech and their pants. Winter's coming, boys!
Word's out the Mercs are as tight as their suits. Let's loosen 'em up with a few bullets, see what falls out.
Got the Ecologists paying us for protection now. Like stealing candy from a baby, except the baby is a grown man with a PhD.
If you see a Freedom stalker without a joint, watch out, it's probably a Duty spy.
Why do the Ecologists wear those big suits? To hide the fact they ain't got no balls!
Ran into some Mercs acting tough. Sent 'em packing with a few new air holes. Souvenirs from the Zone!
Those Freedom clowns held a peace rally. We held a grenade-throwing contest. Guess who had more fun?
Saw some Freedom dude lecturing a mutant on animal rights. Left him to discuss it over dinner. Guess who was the main course?
The only good thing about Duty is their gear. Easy to sell, even easier to shoot them in.
Those Merc jerks think they're playing chess in the Zone. We're playing checkers on their faces with our boots.
Stole a shipment headed for the Ecologists. Who knew you could trade a bunch of rocks for a case of vodka?
Freedom's all about choices. Like, choose to give us your stuff, or choose to find a grenade in your sleeping bag.
Every time a Merc dies, an angel gets its wings. And I get a new gun. Keep up the good work, heaven!
Knocked over an Ecologist camp. You should've seen them run! Like headless chickens, but with more PhDs.
Freedom says they're fighting for the Zone. We're just fighting for their stash. Way more profitable.
Mercs think they're so secretive. Found their stash with a map marked "Definitely Not a Stash." Idiots.
Sneaking up on Ecologists is the best. They're too busy hugging trees to hear us coming.
If you're not stealing from the Ecologists, you're doing it wrong. Those nerds are like walking loot bags.
Heard a Freedom dude tried to 'liberate' some artifacts from us. Liberated his boots instead. Walk on, comrade.
Why do we shoot Mercs on sight? Better them than us. Plus, their gear sells for good money.
Freedom's growing weed again. Let's go pull some weeds, boys. And by pull, I mean rob.
Caught an Ecologist measuring radiation. Told him the only rads he needs to worry about are the ones coming from my gun.
Nothing's funnier than a Duty guy asking for a truce. Like music to my ears... before the gunfire starts.
Who let the Mercs set up so close? Time to send them packing. Pack their heads, that is.
