Ecologists think they're safe because they're 'neutral'. Neutral this, pricks. We're coming for your gear.
Those Duty hard-asses think they're the Zone's cops. Let's show 'em how we deal with cops around here.
Freedom thinks they're hot shit with their ideals. Only thing hot will be their camp when we're done with it.
WHO THE FUCK TOOK MY VODKA CYKA BLYAT
Caught a Merc trying to be sneaky. Gave him a new hole to think about life through.
Sultan says it's time to up our game. Any Freedom or Duty caught on our turf gets a one-way ticket to the afterlife.
Just mugged some pricks from the Ecologist camp. Science the shit out of this, nerds.
Snuck into a Duty camp last night. It's like they want us to steal their stuff. Thanks for the donations, boys!
Anyone bored? There's a Freedom rally tonight. Think of it as a 'crash' party. Bring your own grenades.
Mercs keep trying to negotiate. The only talking we're doing is with our guns. Get ready to chat, fellas.
Freedom's getting too cozy. Time to remind them the Zone ain't their personal playground. Masks on, boys.
pricks are at it again with their "valuables". Let's go show them how valuable their heads are.
We're not just thieves; we're the goddamn owners. Everyone else is just squatting. Time to evict some Freedom hippies.
Who stole my stash? If I catch you, I'll make you wish you were never born.
Just ambushed a Duty patrol. Those idiots never saw it coming. Gonna be a good night, boys.
Someone's been skimming our loot. Better fess up before I start breaking fingers.
Hit a Freedom camp last night. Got some sweet gear and left a few surprises for them to find.
Remember to clean up your mess, boys. Last thing we need is mutants sniffing around our stash.
Hey, dipshits, we need more ammo. Who's volunteering to 'borrow' some from the Military?
Freedom fighters are such hypocrites. All that talk of peace and love while they stab you in the back.
Who let the Duty scum get so close to our camp? Heads are gonna roll for this screw-up.
Just swiped a crate of vodka from the Ecologists. Time to party, lads!
That new guy's been acting shady. Keep an eye on him, and if he steps out of line, you know what to do.
Heard some Duty grunts talking big. Let's show them who really runs this Zone.
Found some Freedom fucks trying to grow weed on our turf. Burned it all down and left a message in lead.
Spotted a group of Mercs snooping around. Time to teach them a lesson they won't forget.
Someone's been messing with our comms. If I find out who, they're getting a bullet to the brain.
Freedom's been getting bold lately. Let's put them back in their place with a few well-placed grenades.
Got a lead on a stash of artefacts. Time to gear up and pay those pricks a visit.
If you're too scared to pull the trigger, then you're no good to us. Man up or get out.
Someone's been talking to the Duty fucks. Sniff out the rat before I get real angry.
Just intercepted a Military convoy. Got some shiny new toys to play with.
Who keeps taking bites out of my rations? Next time, I'll take a bite out of you.
Freedom wants to negotiate peace. Told them to shove it and threw a grenade for good measure.
We caught a stalker spying on us. Let's see how he likes a little 'friendly' interrogation.
Raided an Ecologist camp and found some cool gadgets. They're probably missing a few fingers now.
Got a tip about a Duty supply run. Let's crash their party and take what's ours.
Just messed up a group of Freedom stalkers. Feels good to remind them who's boss.
Keep an eye out for Military patrols. We're not in the mood for visitors today.
If anyone sees that coward who ran during the last raid, let me know. Got a special 'reward' for him.
We need more booze. Who's up for a 'shopping' trip to the Ecologist's camp?
Just ambushed a stalker party. Took everything they had and left them to rot. Good haul today.
If you want to survive out here, you better grow a pair. No room for weaklings in our gang.
Freedom idiots tried to sabotage our stash. Now they're pushing up daisies.
Spotted a couple of Duty pricks near our camp. Time for a little target practice.
Heard some stalkers have been talking shit. Let's shut them up permanently.
If anyone sees that rat who sold us out, bring him to me. Alive or dead, I don't care.
Whoever keeps fucking with the generator better stop. Next time, I'll throw you into the Zone myself.
Just snatched a bunch of artefacts from some pricks. Easy pickings, boys!
Anyone up for a raid on Duty's main base? Heard they've got some sweet gear just waiting for us.
We've got a mole in our ranks. Find him and make an example out of him.
Freedom thinks they're so righteous. Let's knock them down a few pegs.
Found some Military gear just lying around. Looks like our lucky day.
Who keeps eating all the damn food? Lock up your rations or I'll lock you up instead.
If I catch anyone sleeping on the job, they're getting a boot to the face.
Keep the noise down, assholes. Don't want to attract any unwanted attention.
Just mugged a couple of stalkers. Got some nice loot to share. Come and get it.
Who let the Freedom scum get so close? Heads are gonna roll for this.
Just stole a truckload of booze from the Military. Party at my place!
Anyone got a problem with our new recruit? Speak now, or forever hold your peace.
Heard some Mercs are setting up camp nearby. Time to pay them a visit.
We've got a new stash spot. Make sure no one outside the gang knows about it.
If you're too scared to fight, then you're no use to us. Get lost.
Freedom fighters are nothing but a bunch of hypocrites. Let's show them what real power looks like.
We've got some new toys from the last raid. First come, first served.
Someone's been talking to the Military. Find the rat and take him out.
Just hit an Ecologist convoy. Got some fancy gadgets to play with now.
Whoever keeps messing with our gear better stop. Next time, I'm not gonna be so nice.
Freedom's been getting bold. Time to remind them who runs this Zone.
We've got a new target: Duty's main base. Gear up and get ready.
Found a stash of artefacts. Let's grab them before anyone else does.
If anyone sees that rat who sold us out, bring him to me. Alive or dead, I don't care.
Got a tip about a Military supply run. Let's intercept and take what's ours.
Heard some Duty grunts talking big. Let's show them who really runs this Zone.
Just raided an Ecologist camp. Got some nice loot to share.
Someone's been messing with our comms. If I find out who, they're getting a bullet to the brain.
Freedom thinks they're so righteous. Let's knock them down a few pegs.
Got some new recruits. Make sure they know the rules or they'll learn the hard way.
Who let the Duty scum get so close to our camp? Heads are gonna roll for this screw-up.
Just swiped a crate of vodka from the Ecologists. Time to party, lads!
Heard some stalkers have been talking shit. Let's shut them up permanently.
Anyone got a problem with our new recruit? Speak now, or forever hold your peace.
If you're not stealing from the Ecologists, you're doing it wrong. Those nerds are like walking loot bags.
Freedom says they're fighting for the Zone. We're just fighting for their stash. Way more profitable.
Mercs think they're so secretive. Found their stash with a map marked "Definitely Not a Stash." Idiots.
Sneaking up on Ecologists is the best. They're too busy hugging trees to hear us coming.
If you're too scared to pull the trigger, then you're no good to us. Man up or get out.
Someone's been talking to the Duty fucks. Sniff out the rat before I get real angry.
Just intercepted a Military convoy. Got some shiny new toys to play with.
If anyone sees that coward who ran during the last raid, let me know. Got a special 'reward' for him.
Heard some Freedom grunts talking big. Let's show them who really runs this Zone.
Freedom idiots tried to sabotage our stash. Now they're pushing up daisies.
If anyone sees that rat who sold us out, bring him to me. Alive or dead, I don't care.
Freedom's been getting bold. Time to remind them who runs this Zone.
Found some Military gear just lying around. Looks like our lucky day.
Got a tip about a Duty supply run. Let's crash their party and take what's ours.
Heard some Duty grunts talking big. Let's show them who really runs this Zone.
Just swiped a crate of vodka from the Ecologists. Time to party, lads!
Got a lead on a stash of artefacts. Time to gear up and pay those pricks a visit.
Someone's been messing with our comms. If I find out who, they're getting a bullet to the brain.
Freedom thinks they're so righteous. Let's knock them down a few pegs.
Got some new recruits. Make sure they know the rules or they'll learn the hard way.
If anyone sees that rat who sold us out, bring him to me. Alive or dead, I don't care.
Freedom's been getting bold. Time to remind them who runs this Zone.
Found some Military gear just lying around. Looks like our lucky day.
Keep an eye on the new recruits. Can't trust anyone these days.
Freedom thinks they're so righteous. Let's knock them down a few pegs.
Got a lead on a stash of artefacts. Time to gear up and pay those pricks a visit.
All Clear Sky personnel, remember to use the private channel. Update the security codes regularly. Otherwise, don't complain if bandits ambush you again.
All important information must go to the private channel.
People! Novikov needs urgent help, he needs spare parts for upgrades and repairs. Go find everything he asks for. If we don't help now, we'll be shooting from our fingers before long!
Requesting Fruit Punch samples, please report back to Professor Kalancha once you acquire enough.
A lot of stalkers make the same mistake. The water in the Swamp is highly radioactive, so keep your distance. Keep plenty of anti-rad pills on hand, you never know when you'll need them.
Church garrison, we've lost contact with a research team in your area. Move to their last known position and report.
We've received a new shipment of Veles detectors. The amount is limited, so sign your name up.
Librarian here. Take it easy on the rations, supply is limited and the next shipment won't arrive any time soon.
Hey Nimble, why don't you come back? Remember the good ol' days?
New Vortex anomalies have been spotted near the entrance, watch your step on your way back.
Clear Sky is recruiting new members, preferably stalkers with great knowledge in anomalous fields. Contact Cold for more info.
There are signs of bandits camping in the northern farms. Don't let them get comfortable.
This is the deep recon team: we're trying the public channel because we can't get a hold of anyone. If you hear this, please respond!
Any information on Jackal's team is being requested; we're not giving up, but it's not looking good.
Mutant hostility confirmed to be increasing for the fourth straight week.
Any researchers currently in the field: there's been reports of an unusual Electro anomaly in field U4. Please investigate with caution.
This is Librarian again: I'm putting out another request of stalkers with any culinary knowledge whatsoever. Extra rations and supplies to any volunteers.
Please keep private communications off the channel. Radio triangulation is not a joke.
We've found no evidence of rumors of a "super-Chimera" north of the pump station. Still, you might want to take caution over there.
Kalancha is putting out another request for equipment: CO2 incubators, spectrophotometers and propane tanks.
More sounds of engines to the north and west - seems like the military is up to something.
Clear Sky is now offering commissions to Free Stalkers for the procurement of artefacts, ammunition and medical supplies. Please inquire with Spore for more details.
Cold, this is one of the exploratory teams in Yantar. Sakharov just told us something very interesting about surge predictions - we're coming back now.
Requesting permission to head north: not many artefacts in the marked fields.
Testing the new encryption. Is it working?
Please send someone to help me carry this back to base. Got some good stuff today! I'm in field F1.
You are a master, Novikov! The new rupture-resistant armor is working as intended!
This is Kalancha, reminding all stalkers to check body and clothes radiation frequently. If you record above-average readings, come and see me immediately.
Looks like the army detachment is raiding the renegade camp. I tell you, my lads, there's not a better show in the world!
Surveillance team: stay alert. We have reports of hostiles moving in your direction.
We need medical supplies brought to L9! We can't risk moving him. Hurry!
Accepting volunteers for research guard duty. Good pay and a new mask are offered for anyone with proven dependability.
Attention to all field teams: thugs have set up an ambush near one of the anomaly fields. Stand by while we get better intel.
Clear Sky is willing to share research results in exchange for ammunition. There is a vetting process.
You can sound the all clear: apparently this kid couldn't tell the sound of a Flesh from a Chimera.
Somebody better fix this damn roof if they don't want rain getting in the equipment. I know we live in a swamp, but really!
Infiltration team: the anomaly maps you were issued were out of date! Either go slow, or return to get the updated maps.
Pack it in - this place is definitely empty. On to the next location.
Glacier, your transmission is completely garbled. Where are you contacting us from?
Spore, this is Gleb Indian. I found all of Professor's stuff just neatly stacked next to the train tracks. What the hell do you think happened?
Attention all squads: Keep an eye out for any signs of increased mutant activity in the Red Forest. We don't want any surprises.
Reminder to all newcomers: Respect the Zone, and the Zone will respect you. Don't go poking around where you shouldn't.
Attention researchers: We need volunteers for a comprehensive anomaly mapping expedition. Sign up if you're up for the challenge.
Clear Sky HQ reporting: We've intercepted chatter about a possible Monolith incursion into our territory. Stay vigilant, everyone.
Attention, all medics: We're running low on medical supplies. Prioritize critical cases and conserve where you can.
Clear Sky personnel, remember to maintain radio silence during stealth operations. We don't need the enemy picking up our transmissions.
Scavenging teams, be on the lookout for artifacts in the northern swamps. There have been reports of unusual energy signatures.
Attention all squads: Keep your geiger counters handy. There's been an increase in anomalous activity near the old radar array.
Clear Sky members, remember to check in with your squad leaders regularly. Communication is key to our survival out here.
Attention all field teams: We've received reports of mercenary activity in the vicinity. Stay alert and report any sightings immediately.
Attention all stalkers: If you encounter any artifacts you can't identify, bring them to the research wing for analysis. Safety first!
Clear Sky leadership is issuing a reminder: No unauthorized expeditions beyond the perimeter. We can't afford to lose any more people.
Attention all perimeter guards: We've detected movement along the western edge of our territory. Keep your eyes peeled for intruders.
Attention all scouts: We need detailed recon reports on the status of the northern anomaly fields. Don't take any unnecessary risks.
Clear Sky command, we've encountered unexpected resistance near the abandoned factory. Requesting backup ASAP!
Attention all artifact hunters: Don't forget to bring back any samples of strange flora or fauna you encounter. It could be valuable for research.
Clear Sky base, this is Echo team. We've found signs of recent Monolith activity near the old church. Investigating further.
Attention all personnel: We're initiating a full weapons check. Make sure your gear is clean and in working order.
Clear Sky medics, we're seeing an uptick in cases of radiation sickness. Make sure you're fully stocked on anti-rad supplies.
Attention all patrols: We've received reports of increased mutant aggression in the Dark Valley. Exercise caution and stick together.
Hey, anyone got an extra smoke? I'm running low and need something to take the edge off this Zone bullshit.
Yo, who's the genius that forgot to restock the vodka supply? We're gonna need it after dealing with these mutant bastards all day.
Did you hear about Vanya? Poor bastard got his ass kicked by a pseudodog yesterday. Should've brought a bigger gun!
Hey, if anyone finds a decent pair of boots out there, let me know. These ones are falling apart faster than a rookie's resolve.
Who's up for a game of cards tonight? I've got some fresh mutant parts to wager.
Man, this Zone weather is a real bitch. One minute it's sunny, the next it's pissing rain. Can't catch a break out here!
Forget about mutant hunting, I'm on a mission to find the best damn stash of vodka in the Zone. Who's with me?
Hey, has anyone seen my lucky bandana? I swear, if I lose it again, I'm gonna lose my shit!
Shit, did anyone remember to feed the dogs back at base? Last time I forgot, they chewed up my favorite boots!
Yo, I'm sick of eating canned meat. When are we gonna get some real food around here? I'd kill for a juicy steak!
Heard some rookie got caught pissing on a controller's lair. Hope he brought a clean pair of pants!
Hey, watch where you're pointing that thing! Last thing we need is friendly fire because you can't keep it in your pants!
Anyone else think HQ should invest in some better damn radios? Sick of these static-filled conversations!
Man, I swear these anomalies are getting more creative every day. Almost makes me miss the good old days of just dodging bullets!
Did you hear about Boris? Poor bastard got his foot stuck in a snork's mouth! Guess he won't be running any marathons soon.
Hey, keep an eye out for any decent loot out there. I'm running low on supplies and could use a boost to my stash!
Shit, I almost forgot it's my turn to clean out the latrine today. Anyone wanna trade chores for a bottle of moonshine?
Hey, who's been hogging all the damn medkits? I swear, if I see someone with a backpack full of them, I'm gonna have some words!
Anyone else think we should start charging tourists for guided tours of the Zone? We'd make a killing!
Man, I'm getting too old for this shit. Next time I see a chimera, I'm turning tail and running faster than you can say "zone mutant."
Did you hear about the time Ghost took down a bloodsucker with nothing but a pocket knife and a prayer? Legendary stuff, man!
Remember when we stumbled upon that underground lab in the Red Forest? I still have nightmares about those damn zombies!
Hey, whatever happened to that rookie, Alexei? Last I heard, he went off on some solo mission and never came back.
Man, I miss the old days when Strelok was still roaming these parts. He was like a goddamn legend come to life!
Who else thinks the Zone is getting weirder by the day? I swear, every time I close my eyes, I see those damn anomalies!
Remember when we thought we could actually control the Zone? Yeah, good times. Now it feels like it's controlling us!
Hey, did you know that Clear Sky was founded by a group of former military scientists? Explains why we're so damn smart!
They say the Great Swamps used to be a thriving ecosystem before the Zone hit. Hard to imagine with all this mutant crap everywhere.
Anyone ever wonder what's at the center of the Zone? Probably some messed up shit we're better off not knowing about!
I heard that the Monolith faction is just a bunch of brainwashed fanatics. Can't believe people actually buy into that crap!
Remember when Clear Sky used to have that badass base in the Cordon? Shame it got overrun by mutants.
They say Clear Sky's leader, Lebedev, has been in the Zone longer than anyone else. Must be tough as nails to survive this long!
Hey, I heard that the brain scorcher in the center of the Zone can turn you into a mindless zombie. No thanks, I'll pass!
They say Strelok made it all the way to the center of the Zone and lived to tell the tale. If that ain't badass, I don't know what is!
Remember when Clear Sky tried to establish a base in the Red Forest? Yeah, that didn't end well. Damn anomalies!
Hey, did you know that Clear Sky's main goal is to study and understand the Zone, not just survive in it? Pretty noble if you ask me.
I heard that Clear Sky has some kind of secret weapon they're developing to fight off mutants. Hope it's ready soon!
Anyone else think the military is just using us as cannon fodder? They send us into the Zone and then sit back and watch the show!
Remember when Clear Sky used to have that badass armored train? Shame it got blown to hell by the Monolith.
I heard that Clear Sky's base used to be an old research facility. Explains why we have so much high-tech gear lying around!
Enough with the gossip, people! We have serious work to do here. Focus on the mission and save the chit-chat for later!
Listen up, Clear Sky members! This channel is for operational communications only. Keep the chatter relevant or face disciplinary action!
I don't want to hear any more rumors or idle speculation. Stick to the facts and stay focused on our objectives, understood?
Attention all Clear Sky personnel: Loose lips sink ships. Keep sensitive information off the airwaves and maintain operational security!
Enough with the distractions, people! We're here to do a job, not engage in idle banter. Get back to work or face consequences!
This is not a social club, Clear Sky! Keep the communication channels clear for important updates and mission-critical information!
Let's keep it professional, folks. Save the jokes and personal conversations for off-duty hours. We have a reputation to uphold!
Remember your training, Clear Sky members. Discipline and focus are key to survival in the Zone. Cut out the nonsense and stay sharp!
I'm hearing too much chatter and not enough action, people! Get your heads in the game and stay on task. We have a mission to complete!
If I hear one more bit of irrelevant chatter on this channel, heads will roll. Clear Sky operates with precision and efficiency, not idle chatter!
Enough with the distractions, Clear Sky! We have a duty to fulfill and every moment wasted on idle chatter is a moment lost in the fight against the Zone!
Stay focused, people! The Zone doesn't wait for idle chatter. Keep your eyes on the mission and your mouths shut unless it's mission-critical!
I expect better from Clear Sky members. Cut out the nonsense and stick to the task at hand. We're professionals, not gossipmongers!
Let's maintain radio discipline, Clear Sky. Idle chatter only serves to distract us from our objectives. Keep the airwaves clear for important updates!
This is your final warning, Clear Sky members. Get back to work and cut out the chatter, or there will be consequences!
We're not here to socialize, people! Clear Sky operates with professionalism and focus. Cut out the distractions and stay on mission!
Enough with the backtalk, Clear Sky! We have a job to do and every moment wasted on idle chatter is a moment we lose in the fight against the Zone!
Keep it professional, people! We are known for our discipline and focus. Let's not tarnish that reputation with idle gossip and chatter!
I don't want to hear any more excuses. Cut out the chatter and get back to work! We have a mission to complete!
Attention all Clear Sky members: We have strict protocols in place for a reason. Disregard them at your own peril. Get back on task and stay focused!
Clear Sky members, remember to document any new anomaly types you encounter. Knowledge is our greatest weapon against the Zone.
We're low on technical supplies. If you come across any electronic components, bring them to the tech wing immediately.
Field teams, report any sightings of unusual mutant behavior. The Zone is unpredictable, and we need to stay ahead of it.
Attention all personnel: Any unauthorized use of equipment will result in disciplinary action. Maintain protocol at all times.
Clear Sky HQ to all units: Expect increased military presence near the outskirts. Proceed with caution and avoid confrontation.
Reminder: All Clear Sky members are to undergo weekly radiation checks. Report to the med bay for your scheduled appointment.
We've received intel about a potential artifact field in the southern swamps. Scouting teams, prepare for deployment at dawn.
Maintenance crews, prioritize repairs on the northern perimeter defenses. We've had reports of increased mutant activity in the area.
Attention all stalkers: The Zone's weather patterns are shifting rapidly. Stay alert and be prepared for sudden changes.
HQ to all Clear Sky personnel: Ensure all data on anomalies is backed up regularly. We can't afford to lose any research.
Attention all field operatives: Carry additional supplies of anti-radiation drugs and first aid kits. The Zone's dangers are ever-present.
We've detected a significant energy surge in the eastern sectors. Investigate the source but proceed with extreme caution.
To all units: Report any anomalies that exhibit unusual electromagnetic properties. This could be crucial to our research.
Field teams, we've lost contact with a squad near the abandoned factory. Initiate search and rescue protocols immediately.
Clear Sky medics, prepare for an influx of patients. A recent skirmish has resulted in multiple injuries.
Reminder to all Clear Sky members: The use of personal devices on missions is prohibited. Maintain focus and discipline.
Attention all personnel: Ensure that all protective gear is in optimal condition before heading out. Safety is our top priority.
We've received reports of new anomaly clusters forming near the railway tracks. Exercise caution and document all findings.
To all scouting teams: Any encounters with Monolith should be reported immediately. Avoid engagement if possible.
Attention researchers: A new shipment of lab equipment has arrived. Collect your requisitions from the supply depot.
All Clear Sky personnel, prepare for a base-wide drill tomorrow at 0600 hours. This is not a test. Your participation is mandatory.
We've intercepted encrypted communications suggesting a bandit raid. Strengthen perimeter defenses and stay alert.
Attention all squads: Report any sightings of new artifact types. Immediate analysis and collection are required.
Reminder: All Clear Sky members must log their mission details upon return. Accurate records are vital for our research.
To all Clear Sky personnel: Refrain from unnecessary chatter on the public channels. Operational security is critical.
Attention all units: There's been an uptick in mutant sightings in the northern territories. Proceed with caution and in groups.
Field operatives, ensure all collected samples are properly labeled and stored. Contamination can compromise our research.
Clear Sky command to all members: Prioritize the retrieval of any advanced technological devices found in the Zone.
Attention, all field teams: Be aware of the increasing number of anomalies in previously safe zones. Stay vigilant.
All personnel, be prepared for a scheduled power shutdown at 1800 hours for maintenance. Ensure all critical systems are backed up.
All squads, listen up! Upon arrival at base, report immediately to command for a briefing on our latest gear.
Urgent alert to squads near sector E15: Unverified reports of dangerous mutants. Confirm immediately and proceed with caution.
Attention squads in sector H23: Possible sightings of lethal mutants. Verify ASAPsource is unconfirmed.
All available squads, bandit activity is spiking in the Garbage. Time to clean up the area.
Stalkers, lend us a hand in securing the path to the Bar. Rewards await those who assist.
This is Sergeant Saykin, Fifth Squad. To those vandalizing in Rostok: If another bottle hits Petrenko's window, there will be serious consequences.
Duty seeks brave fighters to eliminate mutant threats. New recruits enjoy special Bar pricesexcept ex-bandits!
We're enlisting volunteers. Report to Rostok base with gear, weapons, and three days' provisions. No ID needed. Physical fitness required.
Final warning to anarchists: Stop sending insults to General Voronin's PDA, or we'll visit your base. We know who's responsible.
All units: Access the private channel to download the latest security update. Neglecting this will have serious consequences.
Route all raid and mutant intel through the private channel. Let's prevent any leaks.
New SVD rifles have arrived at the warehouse. Interested parties should act quickly.
Recon team here: Spotted a strange black flying entity in the Wild Territory. Awaiting orders. Over.
Seeking experienced stalkers for a mutant extermination raid. Fair compensation offered.
Skilled stalkers needed to raid mutant hideouts. Adequate payment guaranteed.
Calling all veteran stalkers for a snork elimination mission. Generous rewards await.
Petrenko here. Zhivoderov, Arnie can't take captives right nowno free cells. Hold them overnight, and he'll compensate you.
Petrenko, respond! Is the private channel down again?
Petrenko, are you receiving? My radio's busted, so I'm on the general channel. Sent someone with repair tools to our last boar-hunting spot.
Petrenko, Captain Sorokin from Garbage sector. What's the status on our ammunition supply?
Stalkers, join Duty! Let's cleanse our world of the Zone's deadly blight!
Stalkers, enlist with Duty. Defend our planet from the Zone's curse!
Remember, stalkers: Anarchy breeds chaos. Join Duty to uphold order in the Zone!
Stalkers, unite with us to purge the world of mutants and anomalies!
Heads up, everyone. Intel reports mercenaries lurking near Rostok's outskirts. Stay alert.
We've had equipment issues for the past two days. Connections to the database and squads are unstable.
Captain Simonov reporting: In sector B15, witnessed a peculiar bloodsucker annihilate a controller effortlessly. It didn't see us. Awaiting orders.
Petrenko reporting. Kolya, confirm if 10th Squad is missing from yesterday's mission. I think I've found their remains...
Don't clutter the channel. We don't need to hear about your lucky kills.
Northern checkpoint security, report ASAP. Noted spike in mutant activity overnight.
All units near the Bar, be vigilant. Reports indicate increased bandit movements nearby.
Emergency: All combat squads, proceed to sector G7 for immediate action. This is not a drill.
Intelligence reports anarchists assembling near the eastern ridge. Get ready to engage.
All squad leaders, assemble at command center at 0600 for anomaly fluctuation briefing.
From Commander Volkov: Increase security measures. Possible Freedom spies in the area.
Major alert: Convoy to Yantar encountering heavy resistance. All nearby units, provide support now.
Comms Officer: Update all PDAs with new security codes by 2200. Failure to comply will result in penalties.
Weapons inspection is mandatory tonight. Armory hours extended. Be prepared.
Attention: Sniper teams to western watchtowers. Priority targets are mutant leaders breaching the perimeter.
Anomaly spike detected in sector M3. Investigate with caution.
Dr. Ivanov announces a breakthrough on mutant biology. Mandatory lecture tomorrow for field squads.
All hands: Secure artifacts in containment. Reports of theft attemptsdouble security rounds.
Field Engineer Levchenko is missing since last patrol. Any info, report to Sgt. Petrenko immediately.
Last night's seismic activity was intense. Geologists, submit reports by noon.
Unauthorized entities spotted in the secure zone. Mobile units dispatched for interception.
Operation Iron Wall is a go. All units prepare for synchronized dawn strike to quell mutant surge.
Remember: Duty protects humanity from the Zone's dangers. Vigilance and strength are our pillars.
Scouts report a new mutant type in the Dark Valley. All intel suggests extreme caution.
Alert: Increased emissions predicted in next 24 hours. Non-essential personnel to underground shelters.
All units, update PDA maps with latest anomaly grids. Navigating without them is unacceptable.
Squad Bravo, report to Eastern Gate. You're reassigned to convoy escort duty.
Command authorizes lethal force against unauthorized personnel in restricted sectors.
Radiation spikes near southern ridge. Hazmat suits required beyond this point.
Maintenance crew: Power fluctuations are unacceptable. Resolve issues by 1900.
Medical team: Increase anti-radiation meds stock. Heavy exposure predicted.
Surveillance update: Enemy movements detected near northern boundary. Possible bandit camp.
All squads: Night patrols extended due to increased mutant activity. Stay alert.
Tech team: Urgent repair needed on sector K12's surveillance system.
Warning: Do not engage swamp bloodsuckers alone. They're exhibiting unusual pack behavior.
Commander's note: Keep comms concise. This channel is for operational use only.
All new recruits must complete anomaly safety training by week's end. No exceptions.
Urgent: Reactor area sees uptick in stalker activity. Deploy surveillance drones immediately.
Archival staff: Secure sensitive data. Possible insider threat detected.
All checkpoints: High alert. Intelligence suggests major bandit push by month's end.
Debrief for yesterday's encounter at 1400. All involved personnel must attend.
Reminder: Mess hall is for eating, not debriefing or gear exchange. Keep it tidy.
Duty officers: Full gear inspection due tomorrow. Non-compliance results in restricted leave.
Environmental team: Toxicity levels rising. Report findings to HQ by noon.
Security breach at outpost Delta. Nearby units respondpossible mutant incursion.
Emergency Protocol: Enforce blackout conditions tonight. High risk of emission event.
Patrol logs required after each shift. Incomplete logs will face disciplinary action.
All external missions suspended until emission clears. Safety first, Duty always.
Medical unit alert: Prepare for casualties from emission aftermath. Extra supplies en route.
Command directive: Training drills postponed. Focus on fortifying defenses.
Quartermaster's note: Ammo supply critical. Rationing enforced until further notice.
Communication techs: Resolve radio interference by tomorrow. Check all base antennas.
Helicopter patrol reports unusual activity in sector N9. Ground units, prepare to investigate.
Alert level raised due to suspected Freedom activity near the border. Stay alert.
Annual weapons servicing overdue. Schedule equipment maintenance with the armory.
Zone weather advisory: Storm approaching. Secure equipment and brace for impact.
Training battalion: Live-fire exercises at dawn. Attendance mandatory with full gear.
Reinforcements needed at front lines. All available units, this is your call to Duty.
Science team members: Update security clearance with HQ. Security clampdown in effect.
Inventory clerks: Finalize munitions count by 0900 tomorrow. Resolve discrepancies immediately.
Scout team Alpha: Report findings from southern sectors. Adjust routes due to rising anomalies.
Command issued new IDs to all Duty personnel. Old IDs invalid in 24 hours. See your supervisor.
All units: Drones show heavy mutant presence near derelict factory. Avoid or engage with caution.
Emergency muster at central square. This is not a drill. Repeat, not a drill.
Observation posts: Increased bloodsucker sightings at dusk. Double up, stay sharp, keep lights on.
Psych evaluations overdue for many. Contact Dr. Leshiy to schedule immediately.
All Duty members: Observe radio silence during upcoming operation. Use coded channels only.
Security protocol update: All passwords changed this morning. Check your emails.
Dangerous emissions forecasted. All patrols must wear radiation suits until further notice.
Command decrees patrol logs to be submitted within two hours of shift end. Late reports face review.
Operational alert: Increased Freedom scout sightings near checkpoint. High defensive alertreport any suspicious activity.
Maintenance Day reminder: All gear must be inspected and cleaned today. Readiness is essential.
All squads reminded: Use of force must be justified and documented. Unnecessary violence isn't the Duty way.
Surveillance drones upgraded with thermal imaging for night tracking. Effective immediately.
All units: Next full-scale drill on Thursday at 0300 hours. Participation mandatory. Show Duty's full strength.
Notice: Off-duty personnel must remain within base limits due to increased mutant activity. Your safety is paramount.
Command update: All units are to review the latest tactical manuals. Knowledge is our first line of defense.
Alert: Unidentified anomalies detected near sector P5. Approach with extreme caution.
Maintenance crews, double-check all perimeter defenses. We cannot afford any breaches.
Supply convoy arriving at 1800 hours. Ensure the loading zone is secure and clear of threats.
All units, be advised: Night vision equipment upgrades are now available. Coordinate with the armory.
Surveillance teams, monitor the airwaves for unusual communications. Intelligence is key.
Reminder: Regular hydration is essential. Dehydration leads to mistakes, and mistakes cost lives.
Field medics, prepare for increased patrols. Ensure medical kits are fully stocked.
Commander's note: Exemplary performance by Squad Echo in last night's operation. Let's all strive for such excellence.
Attention all squads: Unauthorized trading of artifacts is strictly prohibited. Violators will face severe consequences.
Environmental alert: Acid rain expected tonight. Protective gear is mandatory for all outdoor activities.
Training reminder: Close-quarters combat drills scheduled for tomorrow at 0700 hours.
Logistics update: Fuel reserves are low. Conserve usage until resupply is confirmed.
Intelligence briefing at 1500 hours. All squad leaders are required to attend.
All personnel, ensure your PDAs are encrypted. Data security is non-negotiable.
Scouts report strange lights in the western sky. Investigation teams, prepare for deployment.
Reminder: All ammunition must be accounted for. Report any discrepancies immediately.
Command is pleased with recent patrol efficiency. Keep up the good work.
Attention: Do not engage with unknown factions without direct orders. Diplomacy is a delicate matter.
Weather forecast indicates heavy fog tonight. Adjust patrol routes accordingly.
All units, prepare for equipment inspection at 0800 hours tomorrow. Clean and service all gear.
Medical notice: Vaccinations against new strains of infection are mandatory. Visit the infirmary ASAP.
Command update: Recon drones have identified potential resource caches. Extraction teams, stand by.
Reminder: Personal grievances should not interfere with duty. Resolve conflicts professionally.
Emergency drill scheduled for 0200 hours. Be prepared to mobilize on short notice.
Attention: Unauthorized use of explosives is strictly forbidden. Safety protocols must be followed.
Supply update: Fresh provisions have arrived. Rations will be distributed at 1600 hours.
All squads, report any sightings of unusual flora. The Zone is ever-changing.
Commander's commendation: Excellent teamwork observed during recent operations. Let's maintain this synergy.
Security alert: Increase patrols around storage facilities. Recent attempts at theft have been reported.
Reminder: Personal protective equipment is mandatory in all high-risk zones.
Communication officers, update encryption keys. Secure channels are our lifeline.
Attention: Leave requests are suspended until further notice due to heightened alert levels.
Maintenance teams, inspect all vehicles for wear and tear. We rely on mobility.
All units, familiarize yourselves with the new map updates. Terrain has shifted in several sectors.
Command directive: Limit use of open flames. Fire hazards are unacceptable risks.
Intelligence officers, compile reports on recent mutant behaviors. Patterns may be emerging.
Reminder: Respect and camaraderie strengthen our ranks. Uphold Duty's values.
Environmental team, monitor radiation levels hourly. Safety thresholds must not be crossed.
All hands, prepare for a base-wide drill at 1800 hours. Coordination is key.
Medical staff, conduct first aid refresher courses. Every member should be proficient.
Attention: Personal calls are restricted to off-duty hours. Maintain operational focus.
Surveillance alert: Unmanned aerial vehicles have detected movement near sector Q7. Investigate immediately.
Commander's note: Discipline is the backbone of Duty. Let's exemplify it in all actions.
All units, be aware of potential ambush points. The enemy adapts, and so must we.
Logistics reminder: Submit supply requests through proper channels. Improper requisitions will be denied.
Attention: High-frequency interference detected. Communications may be unstable.
Squad leaders, review escape and evasion tactics with your teams. Preparedness saves lives.
Reminder: Keep all passageways clear. Obstructions hinder rapid response.
Command update: New combat strategies will be introduced during next week's briefing.
All personnel, report any instances of equipment malfunction. Reliability is crucial.
Environmental advisory: Strong winds expected. Secure all loose items.
Medical notice: Report any symptoms of illness immediately. Early detection prevents outbreaks.
Attention: Unauthorized visitors spotted near our perimeter. Security teams, remain vigilant.
Logistics update: Spare parts for equipment are limited. Use resources wisely.
Reminder: All waste must be disposed of properly. Environmental hazards cannot be ignored.
Commander's commendation: Outstanding bravery shown by Patrol Delta. Your actions honor Duty.
All squads, update your mission logs. Accurate records are essential for operational success.
Attention: Mechanical failures must be reported immediately. Do not attempt unauthorized repairs.
Training announcement: Sniper proficiency tests will be held this weekend.
Supply notice: Water purification tablets are now available. Ensure your canteens are safe.
All units, refrain from using unencrypted channels. Security breaches are unacceptable.
Environmental team, collect soil samples from sector R3. Anomalous readings require analysis.
Reminder: Respect local wildlife. Unnecessary disturbances can provoke attacks.
Command directive: Prioritize recovery of lost equipment. Resources are scarce.
All personnel, attend the memorial service at 2000 hours. We honor our fallen comrades.
Attention: Increased seismic activity detected. Be prepared for possible ground instability.
Maintenance crews, check all air filtration systems. Contaminants must be kept out.
All squads, practice noise discipline during patrols. Silence is a tactical advantage.
Commander's note: Our unity is our strength. Stand together, succeed together.
Medical alert: Report any unusual symptoms after exposure to anomalies.
All units, maintain proper spacing during movements. Prevent clustering to reduce vulnerability.
Reminder: The chain of command exists for a reason. Follow protocols.
Attention: Improvised modifications to gear are prohibited. Use standard-issue equipment only.
Surveillance teams, monitor for any signs of enemy reconnaissance.
Command update: Additional reinforcements will arrive by week's end. Prepare accommodations.
All units, be cautious of potential traps in abandoned structures.
Logistics notice: Next supply drop is delayed. Ration current supplies accordingly.
Reminder: Keep personal areas clean. Hygiene is essential in close quarters.
Commander's commendation: Exceptional leadership displayed by Lieutenant Vasilyev.
Attention: Do not share operational details with unauthorized personnel.
All squads, ensure night-vision equipment is fully operational before dusk.
Medical team, conduct a health and wellness check on all units.
Environmental advisory: Possible chemical anomalies detected. Use appropriate gear.
Logistics update: Armory inventory is being audited. Return all borrowed equipment.
Reminder: Punctuality reflects discipline. Be on time for all duties.
Command directive: Increase reconnaissance patrols. Intel gathering is a priority.
Attention: Unauthorized use of vehicles is prohibited. Follow assignment protocols.
All units, verify the integrity of your protective gear. Repairs must be made immediately.
Commander's note: Courage and honor define us. Let's embody these virtues daily.
Medical alert: Increase in radiation sickness cases. Review safety procedures.
All squads, report any encounters with new mutant species. Documentation is vital.
Reminder: Stay hydrated and nourished. Physical fitness enhances performance.
Environmental team, investigate abnormal weather patterns affecting operations.
Attention: All field operations are to be logged in detail. Transparency is essential.
Command update: Negotiations with neutral factions are underway. Avoid conflicts.
All units, practice radio silence when necessary. Communication discipline is crucial.
Logistics reminder: Fuel consumption reports are due by end of day.
Maintenance crews, inspect all generators. Power stability is a priority.
Commander's commendation: Collective efforts have strengthened our position. Keep it up.
Attention: Report any sightings of unauthorized drones. Airspace security is vital.
All squads, update threat assessments based on latest intelligence.
Medical team, prepare for potential influx of casualties due to recent engagements.
Reminder: Personal biases must not affect mission objectives. Stay professional.
Environmental advisory: Dust storms expected. Limit outdoor activities.
All units, verify communication equipment functionality before deployment.
Command directive: Enhance perimeter surveillance. Early detection prevents surprises.
Attention: Unauthorized absence from duty will result in disciplinary action.
Logistics update: New supplies arriving. Inventory management is crucial.
All squads, adhere strictly to mission parameters. Deviations compromise success.
Reminder: Regular weapon maintenance prevents malfunctions in critical moments.
Environmental team, monitor air quality. Adjust filters as necessary.
Commander's note: Excellence is a habit. Strive for it in all endeavors.
All units, be cautious of misinformation. Verify sources before acting.
Medical alert: First aid kits must be restocked. Check expiration dates.
Attention: Unauthorized recordings within the base are prohibited.
Logistics reminder: Equipment requisitions must be approved by commanding officers.
All squads, report completion of assigned tasks promptly.
Reminder: Energy conservation measures are in effect. Power down non-essential systems.
Command update: Strategic objectives have been adjusted. Review new directives.
All units, maintain high morale. Our mission is critical, and your dedication is valued.
Attention: Any encounters with hostile forces must be reported immediately.
Environmental advisory: Flood warnings issued for low-lying areas. Evacuate if necessary.
Medical team, update vaccination records for all personnel.
Reminder: Chain of custody for sensitive materials must be documented.
Commander's note: Adaptability is our strength. Stay flexible in your tactics.
All units, report any structural damages observed during patrols.
Attention: Personal devices are subject to search for security purposes.
Logistics update: Shortage of certain calibers reported. Conserve ammunition.
All squads, practice emergency evacuation procedures. Drills will be unannounced.
Reminder: Team cohesion is vital. Support your fellow soldiers.
Command directive: Focus on intelligence gathering. Knowledge is power.
All units, verify identification before granting access to restricted areas.
Attention: Any signs of sabotage must be reported to security immediately.
Environmental team, assess the impact of recent anomalies on operational zones.
Medical alert: Increase in fatigue-related incidents. Ensure adequate rest periods.
Commander's note: Your commitment does not go unnoticed. Together, we will prevail.
All units, prepare for potential relocation. Stand by for further instructions.
Reminder: Keep sensitive discussions confined to secure areas.
Attention: Reports of counterfeit supplies circulating. Verify authenticity upon receipt.
Logistics update: Transportation schedules have changed. Check new timetables.
All squads, remain adaptable. The Zone is unpredictable, and so must we be.
Command directive: Increase collaboration with allied factions. Unity strengthens our cause.
Reminder: Update personal logs daily. Accurate records are invaluable.
Attention: Report any sightings of rare artifacts. Secure and notify command.
All units, exercise caution during night operations. Visibility is reduced.
Medical team, prepare for inoculations against new pathogens.
Commander's note: The path is challenging, but our resolve is unbreakable.
All squads, report equipment needs promptly. Delays hinder mission success.
Final reminder: Our duty is clear. Uphold our mission with honor and integrity.
Attention! An unknown gas leak in square b41 has just been detected. Take appropriate measures.
If you feel your body grow heavy as the world begins to lose its colours and a jaundiced veil appears before your eyes, try to leave that area as soon as possible. You are most likely falling under the direct influence of the alternating field of psy-emissions!
Requesting helicopter to the central mobile lab in square y6_4.
There has been a burst of variable psy-emissions in sector y2_4. Be extremely careful.
Militarised research groups remind military stalkers that a SEVA-class suit will not provide you with adequate protection against many anomalous effects. Use an SSP-class suit.
Militarised research groups remind all unregistered individuals in the territory of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone that you can approach one of our mobile bunkers and surrender. You will not be shot, you will be provided with all necessary medical assistance, and you will be consigned to the SSU at the earliest opportunity.
Any recruits among the military forces at Yantar should contact me, Professor Sakharov, immediately.
Professor Ozersky, please contact us immediately. This concerns your latest research.
Northern mobile lab, how long are we supposed to wait for those important anomalous samples from you? Enough with this absurdity!
Dear soldiers and undocumented individuals! Militarised research groups and the Scientific Research Institute of the Chernobyl Anomalous Zone would like to remind you that vodka does not contribute to the elimination of radionuclides. Use anti-radiation drugs instead.
Professor Hermann speaking. For the last two days, we have been waiting for the results of our psy-emission research from Professor Sakharov, however, he has been refusing to contact us. What is the meaning of this?
We need medical extraction immediately! One of our researchers fell into some Fruit Punch and he's not looking too good. Send someone to y7_1 now!
Field personnel: please stay attentive to the signs of an encroaching psy storms. Just because you checked the Emission schedule doesn't mean you can afford to be careless.
Substance analysis materials are on the way, but we do not have an exact time of arrival. In the meantime, consider checking your protective equipment into maintenance.
Expeditions must be authorized by the head of research for your sector. Without a special allowance, you must report all of your movements off-site. This procedure will be strictly enforced!
Professor Sakharov, we've just received the latest consignment of artefacts from the Duty team. Please have a storage chamber open for us.
I'm very sorry to say that we lost another research assistant today - he didn't realize he was standing in a psy field and... well, we put him down. If we can't get sensible volunteers, can we start hiring the mercenaries again?
This is a reminder that the supply helicopter only comes every two weeks and rarely on special occasions. If your research tour is coming to an end, make sure you don't miss the flight.
Ozersky, this is absolutely incredible! This unknown ring-like artefact is displaying exceptional responsiveness to stimuli - it's almost like it's a living organism!
The strange high-pitched ringing noise in the region of the Yantar facility seems to have stopped. We never located the source, but it was giving Professor Sakharov a migraine, so we're content that it's ceased.
This is the northern patrol detail, we need a biohazard quarantine set up immediately! We've come into contact with some sort of biological agent found in one of the old facilities here. We're making for the north of the base, so be ready for us.
Circumstances force me to remind all of you to be familiar with the functionality of your personal weapons. I know not all of you are well-trained in firearms, but you really need to know how to use them.
Professor Hermann speaking, the shipment from the southern lab arrived two days late and completely soaked through with rain. If I may ask, which trained monkey is responsible for this triumph of logistics?
This is Professor Sakharov, sending a general transmission to our colleagues near the Jupiter plant to remind them that special equipment requests go through me and not through Professor Hermann. If I hear any more rumors of locally-produced equipment being issued to field teams, I'm ordering an investigation.
This is Professor Hermann on the open channel, because Professor Sakharov refuses to answer my private messages, again requesting to know why Professor Koyev was reassigned from his project of the Ash Heap anomaly? This most irregular order was signed by our dear colleague in Yantar.
Professor Sakharov reminding all members the Ecological Research Personnel to not plagiarize any other research from either their own outpost or any other research facility. Professor Hermann would be wise to relay this to his own staff.
Professor Hermann here, reminding our field personnel that all equipment requests should be double-checked with the quartermaster before sending them out; this is especially true for requests made at Yantar station, as they are often burdened with so much work that they can't even get that right.
This is Professor Sakharov reminding all scientific personnel in the Zone that new research initiatives have to be approved by me and my staff. Failure to do this has often resulted in stupid and costly mistakes, especially in the more dangerous northern territories.
This is Professor Herman of the Jupiter Research Facility, and if anyone comes into personal contact with our colleague Professor Sakharov, I request that they ask him to his face why our electromagnetics research is being blocked by his transmissions department.
Professor Sakharov speaking, reminding our counterparts in Yanov that incident and observation reports have to conform to the document guidelines issued by the Institute. If we can't figure out what the hell you're trying to say, we doubt that anyone else can either.
I've run the test five times and I've calculated a different threshold every single time. What in the hell are we supposed to do now?
Hermann, Ozersky, anyone? We've just received reports of a Monolith force in the area and we're leaving. Leave these maniacs to the soldiers - I'd rather not get filled with lead today.
The perimeter warning system still isn't working. I know this because zombies just flooded into the camp and we had a pleasant time putting them down.
We appear to have a breach in a13 - we need a security team there, now!
Attention scientific personnel! A team is being assembled to explore reports of anomalous geological formations near Pripyat. If you have experience in that area of the Zone, please see the director.
Our stock of SSP-class suits is not due to be replaced for several weeks, so take good care of yours! Daily cleaning and disinfecting as well as weekly maintenance check-ins are required.
This is Professor Makarenko attempting to contact the northern bunker - our research was interrupted by the intrusion of a nearby skirmish. We couldn't tell who was fighting, but a very high volume of fire was observed, so we broke from our position.
This is an important reminder to all personnel in the Zone, legal or otherwise: Emissions have been known to alter the position of formerly fixed anomalies. This process is not yet fully understood by researchers, so please do exercise special caution after surges. Some anomaly fields, however, do not change position but have been known to increase or decrease in intensity.
I'll do this on the public channel for anonymity's sake, but I can no longer stay silent. This whole expedition is a madhouse run by egotistical monsters. The practices and conditions of this place are utter insanity, and I'll be doing all I can to expose this to the press when my tour is over. If I survive that long.
Apparently members of the Health Advisory Board are making the rounds today. Get things cleaned up and get all the research guards on duty.
Urgent: An increase in electromagnetic disturbances has been detected near the Brain Scorcher. All personnel are advised to avoid this area unless equipped with proper psi-protection.
To all field units: We've observed abnormal growth rates in the flora near the Red Forest. Collect samples with caution, and ensure they're contained properly.
Attention: A new type of radiation spike has been recorded in sector G-12. All personnel operating near this area must use upgraded dosimeters to monitor exposure levels closely.
Update: The toxic spill previously reported has been contained. However, the groundwater may still be affected. Please use provided water filters at all times.
Professor Kalancha requests immediate drone surveillance over the Burnt Farmstead due to suspected anomaly field migration. Delays in data submission will not be tolerated.
Warning: Increased sightings of Controller-class mutants have been reported near the Yanov station. Field teams are advised to engage with extreme caution and use of psychic protection gear.
All personnel, please note: The next supply drop is scheduled for Thursday unless adverse weather conditions or other unforeseen circumstances arise. Prepare your resupply requests by Wednesday noon.
Caution: The Psi-field generators have been malfunctioning intermittently. Do not rely solely on this equipment for protection against psy-attacks. Manual checks and balances are mandatory until further notice.
There is an ongoing need for volunteers to partake in the safe zone expansion project. This initiative aims to extend habitable areas within the Zone safely. Interested personnel should register with their immediate supervisors.
Notice: All research personnel are reminded to submit their anomaly interaction reports to the central database no later than 1900 hours every Friday. Failure to do so will result in administrative action.
To anyone near the Pripyat outskirts, please collect soil samples every two meters as per standard protocol. Remember, the correct data can save lives.
We are tracking a potentially dangerous surge in electrical anomalies across sector R-4. Please reroute all operations away from this sector until the flux subsides.
The Mobile Lab at Zaton is in need of repair technicians for maintenance of spectral analyzers and emission forecast equipment. Prior experience with high-sensitivity tools is preferred.
Reminder: The radiation fog predicted over the next few days requires enhanced protective measures. Ensure all external operations are conducted with full hazard gear.
Observation Alert: A new vortex anomaly formation was spotted forming near the Garbage. Researchers should use this opportunity to gather fresh data.
Ecological Update: The migration patterns of the mutants in the northern territories are undergoing unexpected changes. Possible environmental causes are being investigated.
Security Notice: Due to recent incursions by unidentified armed groups, all personnel are reminded to attend scheduled self-defense and firearms training.
Equipment Recall: All issued geiger counters must be recalibrated following a batch defect. Please return them to your depot officer for replacement.
Health Advisory: There has been an outbreak of radiation sickness at base camp. Medical personnel will be conducting screenings all week. Attendance is mandatory.
Professor Petrenko will be delivering a lecture on the ecological impact of anomalies on native flora and fauna. All interested personnel are encouraged to attend.
Coffee lovers rejoice! The new shipment has arrived, including that Guatemalan blend some of you were asking about. First come, first serve in the commissary.
Movie night is on again this Saturday at the central camp. We're showing some classic sci-fi. Popcorn and refreshments will be provided, so bring your own blankets!
Did anyone else hear those strange noises last night? Sounded like a snork, but with a musical talent. If you're playing pranks, keep it down!
Reminder: The community garden is strictly a collaborative project. Please contribute or at least stop 'borrowing' the carrots without asking.
Lose something? The lost and found box is overflowing again. Claim your items by Friday or theyre going to charity (or the nearest anomaly).
Professor Kravchenkos cat, Schrodinger, has gone missing again. Hes either in a superposition somewhere around the labs, or just hiding in the supply shed.
To whoever is leaving empty vodka bottles in the recycling bins: they go in the glass disposal, not mixed recycling. Let's keep it green, people!
Looking for partners for the Zone Chess Championship this weekend. Whether you play like a grandmaster or are still figuring out which way the knight moves, all are welcome.
The kitchen is closing early next Wednesday for a deep clean. If you have food in the fridge, label it or lose it!
If you've been using the spectral analyzers as a microwave... please stop. You're going to ruin both the equipment and your meals.
Outdoor yoga sessions start next week at dawn. Join us to align your chakras or just to see if you can still touch your toes.
We're low on medical supplies, particularly bandages and antiseptics. If you're heading into Rostok anytime soon, please pick up some supplies.
Any fans of gardening out there? Were trying to start a herb garden outside Lab X-16. Gardening experience not required, but a resistance to radiation might help!
To the person who solved the issue with the jammed printer in the communal areathank you! Youre a hero.
For those asking about the next supply drop, expect delays due to the recent emission. Keep an eye on the schedule board for updates.
Birthday Alert: We're planning a surprise party for Dr. Ivanov next Friday. Keep it under wraps, and if you're in, chip in for the gift!
Last call for contributions to the Zone Photography Contest! Submit your most eerie, beautiful, or downright bizarre snapshots by Monday.
Public Service Announcement: Please conserve water tomorrow between 8 and 10 AM due to maintenance. Your cooperation is appreciated!
Anyone interested in a pottery class? It's like making artifacts, but less hazardous and you actually get to keep what you make.
Heads up! We're organizing a clean-up for the area around the southern bunker. Join us to make our home a little more... educated.
Attention all personnel: The local wildlife seems to be agitated lately, possibly due to changes in anomaly activity. Exercise caution when venturing outside the perimeter.
Field report: Our team at Lake Yantar has discovered an unusual concentration of mutated fish. Samples are being collected for further analysis.
Reminder: The scheduled anomaly sweep in the Agroprom area has been postponed due to unexpected emission activity. Stay tuned for updates on the rescheduled operation.
Urgent message from Professor Kravchenko: We're experiencing power fluctuations in Lab X-18. All experiments should be halted until the issue is resolved.
To all field researchers: Don't forget to take regular breaks and stay hydrated. The Zone's harsh conditions can take a toll on both body and mind.
Public notice: The scheduled lecture on anomalous flora has been rescheduled to accommodate Professor Ivanov's field research. New time and date to be announced.
Request for assistance: Our team at the Jupiter plant requires additional manpower to repair damaged equipment. Volunteers are appreciated.
Special announcement: Due to recent discoveries, the Ecologist faction will be hosting a symposium on anomaly-induced mutations next month. Interested researchers are encouraged to submit papers.
Emergency protocol: A sudden spike in mutant activity has been detected near the Cordon. All patrols in the area are advised to proceed with caution.
Security update: Unauthorized access to restricted areas has been reported in Lab X-10. All personnel are reminded to keep their access cards secure at all times.
Attention all researchers: The annual inventory check will commence next week. Please ensure all equipment and supplies are properly accounted for.
Field observation: Anomaly activity near the Army Warehouses appears to be increasing. Field teams operating in the area should exercise extreme caution.
Update on expedition: Our team exploring the Wild Territory has encountered unexpected resistance from local bandits. Backup requested.
Resource allocation request: We're running low on anti-radiation medication. Any surplus supplies from other stations would be greatly appreciated.
Reminder: The Zone's wildlife can be unpredictable. Always maintain a safe distance from mutants and exercise caution when approaching unknown creatures.
Attention all personnel: Due to recent anomalies, the perimeter fence near the Dark Valley has been compromised. Security teams are working to repair the breach.
Field update: Our team at the Pripyat Underground has made a significant discovery. Details will be shared during the next research briefing.
Research announcement: Professor Voronin will be leading a study on artifact energy signatures. Interested researchers are invited to join the project.
Notice: The scheduled anomaly simulation in Lab X-9 has been postponed until further notice. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Security advisory: Reports of increased mutant activity near the Bar have prompted heightened patrols in the area. All travel to and from the location should be escorted.
Hey folks, just a reminder to clean up after yourselves in the mess hall. Nobody wants to deal with leftover experiments on their lunch break!
Has anyone seen my lucky wrench? I swear it was right here on the workbench yesterday.
Attention, night shift crew! I've stocked the fridge with energy drinks to help keep you going. Let's knock out those experiments!
Who's up for a game of Zoneopoly after dinner tonight? Bring your A-game, because I'm the reigning champion!
Just a heads up, there's a surprise birthday party planned for Professor Petrov tomorrow evening. Don't spill the beans!
Good news, everyone! The coffee machine in Lab X-7 is finally fixed. Swing by for a pick-me-up anytime.
Hey team, I'm organizing a hiking trip to the Great Swamp this weekend. Who's in for some fresh air and mutant spotting?
Just spotted a cute pseudo-dog wandering near the perimeter fence. If anyone's looking for a new pet, swing by and give him a pat!
Lost my lucky artifact detector somewhere near Lab X-12. If anyone stumbles upon it, there's a reward in it for you!
Hey gang, movie night is back on for Saturday! We're screening "Stalker" in the common room. Bring your popcorn and your existential questions!
Quick poll: who's team dog and who's team cat? Let's settle this once and for all.
Can someone grab me a sandwich from the mess hall? I'm knee-deep in anomaly research and don't have time to break for lunch.
Just heard a rumor about a hidden stash of artifacts near the old radar station. Anyone up for a treasure hunt this weekend?
Attention all coffee enthusiasts: we're running low on beans again. Time for another supply run to the nearest outpost!
Shoutout to whoever left the care package of chocolate bars in the break room. You're a lifesaver!
Just got back from the northern perimeter patrol. Saw some weird anomalies out there, but nothing we couldn't handle. Time for a hot shower and a cold beer!
Reminder: poker night is happening tomorrow in the rec room. Ante up and let's see who's got the best poker face!
Hey everyone, the communal garden could use some love. Swing by and help out if you've got a green thumb!
Word on the street is that someone's been sneaking into the supply closet and swiping snacks. Let's keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior.
Just finished calibrating the geiger counters. Time to kick back with a cold soda and enjoy the fruits of my labor!
Lost track of time in the lab again. Anyone up for a late-night snack run to the canteen?
Don't forget to sign up for the annual Zone scavenger hunt! Prizes include rare artifacts and bragging rights for the next year.
Hey team, I'm experimenting with a new recipe for anomaly-resistant fabric. If it works out, we'll never have to patch our suits again!
Just spotted a flock of mutant birds heading our way. Time to batten down the hatches and break out the bird repellent!
Does anyone else hear that strange humming noise coming from Lab X-5? I hope it's not another malfunctioning anomaly detector.
Lab X-14 is hosting a chili cook-off next Friday. Start perfecting your recipes now, because the competition is fierce!
Just got word that the supply helicopter is making a special delivery of pizza tonight. It's like they know exactly what we need!
Attention all board game enthusiasts: game night is happening in the common room this Saturday. Bring your favorite games and let's have some fun!
Who's up for a friendly game of Zoneball after work? We've got the equipment and the enthusiasm, now we just need some players!
Hey everyone, don't forget to stretch before heading out on your next expedition. We don't need anyone pulling a muscle in the field!
Unauthorized personnel were seen accessing the restricted zone near Lab X-10 last night. Security protocols exist for a reason. Respect them.
Enough with the pranks, people. We're all professionals here, and childish behavior reflects poorly on the entire faction.
Lab X-11 is not a cafeteria. If you're caught eating at your workstation again, you'll be on KP duty for a week.
To the individual who forgot to secure the specimen cages last night: you're lucky we didn't have a containment breach. Don't let it happen again.
If you're unable to meet your research deadlines, inform your supervisor immediately. Procrastination affects the entire team's productivity.
Enough with the loud music in the dormitories after lights out. Some of us are trying to sleep and don't appreciate the disturbance.
Repeated violations of safety protocols will result in disciplinary action. We take the safety of our personnel seriously.
If you're unable to handle your workload, speak to your supervisor. Ignoring your duties only creates problems for the entire faction.
To the individual who left the lab fridge open overnight: you're responsible for the spoiled samples. Learn from your mistake.
If you witness any unethical behavior within the faction, report it immediately. We have zero tolerance for misconduct.
Personal disputes should be resolved outside of working hours. Keep your conflicts away from the laboratory.
Lab X-15 is a restricted area. Access is strictly limited to authorized personnel. Anyone caught trespassing will face severe consequences.
Disregard for equipment maintenance protocols will not be tolerated. If you're unsure how to properly care for your equipment, ask for guidance.
If you're unable to work collaboratively with your colleagues, you may be reassigned to solo research projects until you learn to cooperate.
Lab X-17 is a contamination risk zone. Anyone entering without proper protective gear will be subject to quarantine.
If you suspect a security breach, report it immediately. Failure to do so compromises the safety and security of our entire operation.
To the individual who attempted to bypass security protocols to access restricted data: your actions are being investigated, and appropriate action will be taken.
If you're unable to follow basic instructions, you're in the wrong profession. Pay attention to training materials and ask for clarification if needed.
Lab X-19 is off-limits to all personnel without proper clearance. Anyone found trespassing will face immediate expulsion from the faction.
Repeated violations of faction regulations will result in termination of employment. We expect professionalism and adherence to protocol at all times.
Unauthorized experiments pose a risk to everyone in the facility. If you're unsure whether your research is permitted, consult with your supervisor.
To the individual who tampered with the anomaly containment field: your reckless behavior endangered the entire faction. Expect consequences.
If you're found guilty of sabotaging faction equipment, you will be immediately expelled from the Ecologist faction and blacklisted from all future research endeavors.
We have a zero-tolerance policy for insubordination. Follow orders from your superiors without question or face the consequences.
Unauthorized access to classified research materials will result in severe disciplinary action, including possible expulsion from the faction.
If you're unable to work within the parameters of our research protocols, you will be reassigned to a less critical role until you demonstrate compliance.
Failure to adhere to safety protocols puts everyone at risk. If you're caught violating safety regulations, you will face immediate consequences.
Lab X-24 is a controlled environment. Anyone found introducing contaminants will be held accountable for their actions.
To the individual who disrupted the experiment in Lab X-25: your actions jeopardized valuable research. Expect disciplinary action.
Personal disputes have no place in the workplace. Keep your conflicts private or face consequences for disrupting productivity.
All personnel are reminded that the storage of personal items in laboratory spaces is prohibited. Keep work areas clear.
Unauthorized modifications to equipment are strictly forbidden. If you have suggestions for improvements, submit them through proper channels.
Lab cleanliness is essential for our work. Leaving messes for others to clean up is unacceptable behavior.
Using faction resources for personal projects without authorization is a violation of our policies and will not be tolerated.
Any attempts to access restricted data will result in immediate suspension pending investigation.
All personnel must complete their safety training refresher courses by the end of the week. Non-compliance will result in loss of lab privileges.
Failure to report anomalies or incidents promptly undermines our mission. Immediate reporting is mandatory.
Any harassment or unprofessional conduct towards colleagues will be met with disciplinary action.
Remember that all external communications must be approved by the communications officer. Unauthorized contact with outside parties is prohibited.
Disposing of hazardous materials improperly endangers everyone. Follow established protocols without exception.
Attention all field teams: New anomaly mapping data has been uploaded to your PDAs. Ensure you download the latest updates before your next mission.
The upcoming seminar on Zone mutation patterns will be held on Friday at 1500 hours in the main conference room. All are welcome to attend.
Supply notice: A fresh batch of protective filters has arrived. Please collect replacements from the equipment room as needed.
Research update: Preliminary analysis suggests a correlation between emission cycles and anomaly intensity. Further studies are ongoing.
Security reminder: Ensure all access points are secured after use. Report any suspicious activity immediately.
Maintenance crews will be inspecting the ventilation systems tomorrow. Some areas may be temporarily inaccessible.
Congratulations to Dr. Smirnov and his team on their successful field expedition. Your efforts advance our understanding of the Zone.
Field teams are advised that a minor emission is predicted in the next 24 hours. Plan your activities accordingly.
Personnel interested in advanced first aid training should sign up with the medical department by end of day Friday.
Reminder: All research proposals must be submitted to the review board for approval before commencing experiments.
Attention: A training session on advanced anomaly detection equipment will be held on Monday at 1000 hours.
Attention: A training session on advanced anomaly detection equipment will be held on Monday at 1000 hours.
Attention: A training session on advanced anomaly detection equipment will be held on Monday at 1000 hours.
Anyone up for an artifact run deep west?
Congratulations to Dr. Smirnov and his team on their successful field expedition. Your efforts advance our understanding of the Zone.
Found a stray dog near the base. Seems friendly. Does anyone know if it's safe to keep it around?
Attention: A training session on advanced anomaly detection equipment will be held on Monday at 1000 hours.
Congratulations to Dr. Smirnov and his team on their successful field expedition. Your efforts advance our understanding of the Zone.
Reminder: Regular backups of your research data are crucial. Ensure your files are synced to the central server.
Reminder: Regular backups of your research data are crucial. Ensure your files are synced to the central server.
Attention: A training session on advanced anomaly detection equipment will be held on Monday at 1000 hours.
All personnel must update their medical records with the infirmary by the end of the month.
Reminder: Regular backups of your research data are crucial. Ensure your files are synced to the central server.
Security teams will conduct a drill tomorrow at 1400 hours. Please do not be alarmed by simulated alerts.
All field teams are required to submit daily activity logs. Timely reporting ensures mission success.
Maintenance notice: Power systems will undergo routine checks tonight from 2300 to 0100 hours. Expect brief outages.
Research funding proposals for next quarter are due by the 15th. Submit all necessary documentation to the finance department.
Important: A new communication encryption protocol is being implemented. Ensure your devices are updated.
Lab equipment audits will begin next week. Please prepare inventories and ensure all items are accounted for.
Reminder: The use of personal devices within secure areas is prohibited. Please adhere to all security guidelines.
All personnel are invited to attend the annual safety briefing next Tuesday. Attendance is mandatory.
Field researchers are requested to participate in a survey about Zone flora. Your input is valuable.
Due to recent weather patterns, expect increased fog and reduced visibility. Exercise caution during outdoor activities.
We are updating our emergency evacuation procedures. Training sessions will be scheduled soon.
The canteen will be serving a special menu this Friday in celebration of Researcher's Day. Enjoy!
IT department requests that all users reset their passwords as part of a security enhancement.
A reminder that all waste disposal must be done according to hazardous material protocols.
New environmental sensors have been installed around the perimeter. Do not tamper with equipment.
Attention: Reports of increased mutant activity in sector D-14. Field teams should avoid this area until further notice.
