We are pleased to announce that Dr. Petrov has been awarded the Ecologist of the Year award. Congratulations!
Personnel traveling outside the base must sign out with security and provide an estimated return time.
The library has received new volumes on anomalous physics. Feel free to check them out.
Lab coats and protective gear must be worn at all times in designated areas. Safety first.
Reminder: Personal use of faction vehicles is prohibited without proper authorization.
All hands are needed for a cleanup operation this weekend. Let's keep our base in top condition.
The next anomaly forecasting workshop is scheduled for next Thursday. Sign up if interested.
Security has noted unauthorized drones in the vicinity. Report any sightings immediately.
Attention: The next supply drop may be delayed due to weather conditions. Plan accordingly.
Maintenance will be performing water system checks tonight. Brief disruptions may occur.
Personnel are encouraged to participate in the upcoming health and wellness fair.
Our deepest condolences to the family of Technician Sidorov, who passed away due to illness.
All electronic devices must be inspected by IT for compliance with security standards.
Field teams are reminded to double-check equipment before departure to ensure functionality.
Upcoming lecture on the ethical considerations of Zone exploration. Attendance is recommended.
Notice: The lab facilities will be closed for maintenance on Saturday.
All personnel must complete the annual cybersecurity training module by month's end.
Research grants have been approved for the next quarter. Check with administration for details.
We have received reports of counterfeit artifacts circulating. Exercise caution during procurement.
Reminder: The use of unapproved software on faction computers is prohibited.
First aid kits have been restocked. Ensure you have one accessible in your work area.
Due to increased emission activity, outdoor work is restricted during peak hours.
Personnel are encouraged to submit feedback on facility operations through official channels.
Personnel are encouraged to submit feedback on facility operations through official channels.
All lab waste must be properly labeled before disposal. Incorrect labeling causes delays and hazards.
Reminder: Headlights must be used when driving vehicles during low visibility conditions.
Personnel are invited to participate in the upcoming photography contest. Capture the essence of the Zone!
Due to a power surge, some equipment may need recalibration. Check your instruments.
The medical department is offering flu vaccinations. Schedule an appointment if interested.
We are implementing new ID badges. Please collect yours from security by Friday.
Attention: All personal mail must go through the central mailroom for security screening.
Reminder: Smoking is prohibited within all facility buildings. Designated smoking areas are provided outside.
We have updated our emergency contact lists. Ensure your information is current.
All personnel are invited to the annual end-of-year celebration. RSVP with admin.
Security training on identifying and reporting suspicious activities will be held next week.
The research council is seeking proposals for innovative projects. Submit your ideas by the end of the month.
Maintenance reminder: Ensure all doors and windows are properly secured when leaving labs.
All personnel must undergo radiation exposure assessments. Schedule with the medical team.
Due to inclement weather, non-essential travel is discouraged until conditions improve.
We are pleased to announce a collaboration with the Institute for further Zone research.
Thank you all for your hard work and dedication. Together, we advance the understanding of the Zone.
Attention! Just recently, our fighters were attacked by DUTY SOLDIERS, disguised as mercenaries. Be careful, guys. Something smells fishy.
All volunteers who join Freedom will be issued the latest Zone survival kit free of charge, along with the finest weaponry from the West! If that ain't enough, you get a head start of 2500 roubles!
To all our guys: get into the private channel and update your security codes at once. Don't clog up the channel with whining about the fact that Duty's found out about your next attack.
Join Freedom! We'll stop anyone from seizing the Zone!
Long live Freedom! With the help of the Zone, we'll make the world a better place!
Any data on the movement of mercenary squads should be left in the private channel at once. This is important.
If you're out doing a job, keep any important info in the private channel. There are people out there reading our stuff, you know!
Download the new firmware so that you don't get as many crashes.
Leshiy, where the hell have you headed off to? The boss is waiting for you in the office.
Loki, it's Lukash. Contact me privately. Got an important matter.
Max, it's Skinflint. The supplies are gonna be here in a week, hold on tight over there.
Lukash, for three days now, we've been getting nothing but dead air from you. What are we gonna do about the Monolith while they haven't crucified us?
Oi, Mishka, there was something I wanted to tell you yesterday... but I keep forgetting. Anyway, I saw a suspicious group of people to the west of our base, near the farmstead. Don't forget to tell Lukash about this, or you're just gonna get baked and let it slip your mind.
Looking for friendly company, sincere conversations, and a helping hand in future campaigns? Join us and fight alongside free men of the Zone!
They've brought in a shipment of new G36s to the warehouses. Better get 'em quick. There's practically a waiting list for them.
We going out for lunch, or what?
We're in need of experienced stalkers for an artefact hunt. We'll owe you one.
Free stalkers, Freedom speaking! If you want to live under respectable conditions in the Zone without any obligations from the military, like Duty, then come to us! We're always happy to see new faces.
Free stalkers, Freedom speaking here! What do you have to gain by consciously limiting yourself to a life under the command under a bunch of bureaucratic pigs, living in their barracks and blindly following their orders? Become a part of us and join our expeditions to the most treasured places in the Zone, tasting the life of a free man!
Greetings, stalker! It's me, your Freedom! Come visit me at my address any time: Army Warehouses, straight down the road and towards the right at the fork. ;)
Rostok today, the Verkhovna Rada tomorrow, and the whole world in two days!
Seems like they took out a massive group of zombies at Yantar today, in the workshops. There might still be a few left.
Skinflint, where'd you put all the fancy shooters? Why am I not seeing them in the armoury?
Stalker, don't you love the Zone? Have you forgotten that it gave you money and a purpose in life? Do you really want to work as an office clerk for a penny after all this is over? Join Freedom! Don't let them take away the last thing you value from you, and don't let them take away your life.
Don't spit in the bloody glasses, damn it. I'll fucking break someone's nose the next time I hear that happens.
Hey-hey-hey, rasta! We've got the best and juiciest joints! Join the real Freedom and take down the system!
This is Skinflint. I've just received a small batch of American erotic magazines...\n \n%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous\n%c[default]Who the bloody hell needs those, you bellend? Everyone outside of the Zone has been using hard drives for years now, us included.
We duped a couple of bandits yesterday. I'm surprised they even remember to wear their pants each day, 'cos they're so bloody dumb!
There's a literal army of undead in Yantar going up in number everyday... What the hell we can do?...
I'm feeling creative today! Oh, I'll express myself by hanging a few Dutyers on the branches!
Chaps, guess what! The ganja, the one growing near da springboard! It hits like a truck! Hahahaaa!!!
Ok, we need to wake the fuck up - clocking out is fine around the base, but not if people are counting on you to defend the Barrier. I'm going to have Gatekeeper going around planting his foot in the asses of any slackers.
My dudes, there's something nasty prowling around here - it's giving me the creeps. I'm not talking about Solid either...
Yo, come on down to Skinflint's place and get all this free shit I'm giving away! I just don't give a fuck anymore!\n \n%c[255,160,160,160]Skinflint\n%c[default]Can someone shut up this asshole?
Yo Loki, these anomaly fields are going crazy over here. I'm no asshole, but I know something's up.
All this time, and Yanov station still smells like Duty. It's like... cosmoline and frustration.
This is starting to feel way too much like work...
What's wrong, Ashot? Not enough of a man to say it to my face? I can see you now, typing away on your little keyboard with a stupid grin on your face. You've gotten soft, my man.
We lost another group up near Pripyat. Damn... I knew some of those guys. I wish I knew what happened to them.
I don't care if you're a vegan or whatever else - you need to be ready to put down those radioactive beasts out there, so pack a shooter, ok? Where do we get these people...
Anyone seen my stash? Last I checked, it was by the old UAZ wreck. If you took it, at least share, dude!
Hey troopers, stash your trash or smoke it. Don't leave your buds lying around for Duty to find. Keep it green, keep it clean!
Warning: If you're heading towards the Red Forest, wear your brown pants. You'll thank me later!
Lost a bet to a Dutyer? Better wash your mouth out with vodka. That's the only cleanse that works around here!
Keep your radios tuned and your eyes peeled, Freedom fighters. We've got wind of some Duty dogs sniffing around our ops. Time to hide the good stuff.
It's a full moon tonight, perfect for a little howling! Join me at the watchtower and let's show the Zone how Freedom parties.
Reminder from the top: Don't feed the pseudodogs. You're not helping them or yourself. Seriously, stop.
Operation 'Green Thumb' is a go! All available hands, meet at the new grow site. And no, I'm not talking about potatoes...
If you're not shooting, you should be reloading. If you're not reloading, you should be smoking. If you're not smoking... well, you're just doing it wrong, aren't you?
Duty thinks they can police the Zone? We've got news for them: Only thing they're policing is their lack of chill. Keep it breezy, Freedom pals.
Pro tip: If your Geiger counter starts clicking like a mad DJ, do not drop the beat, drop your ass to safety!
Hey, has anyone actually read our mission statement? No? Cool, neither have I. Pass that joint, will you?
Sighting report: Bunch of Duty heavyweights lumbering through the Marsh. Probably lost. Let's help them find their way... to hell.
Looking for volunteers for a sunrise raid on the Military Outposts. Come for the loot, stay for the sunrise, leave before the hangover.
For anyone new: yes, the rumors are true. We do have the best parties in the Zone. Yes, that includes actual fire dances and not just gunfire.
Remember, if you're going out at night, wear light clothes. Makes it easier to run back when you inevitably forget why you went out in the first place.
Urgent call: We've got a stash of 'special' supplies coming through the Bar. I need a few good stoners... I mean, strong arms to help secure it.
If you've got problems with mutants, make a bigger problem for them. Or just run faster than the stalker next to you.
The Syndicate is recruiting new employees. To join us, find an intermediary. Consider this your first assignment.
Information on mutant raids and other operations can be bought from an intermediary. Look for one near the Prometheus Movie Theatre.
We need experienced stalkers for targeting specific groups.
We need experienced stalkers for carrying out raids in Pripyat. Our targets are Monolith groups, contact us for more info.
Requesting an experienced mechanic with knowledge of PNV devices. The payment is decent.
Join the Mercenaries, excellent outfit and decent payment are waiting for you when the job gets done!
Molfar, some mutants managed to get our guys at the plant. It is necessary to do some clean up.
Urgent need for a good sniper, paying 15 percent of the cost of the contract...
Attention, all Syndicate employees: Kiril Yatagan's group is no longer partnered with us. Seems he has his own plans...
Andrew Lunev, nicknamed Old. There's a bounty on his head. Any information about his location will be met with good payment.
Looks like those stalkers just won't give up... Yes, I see you chucklefucks out in the reeds, making your way to the Waste Processing Station. Here's a little hint: bullet in the head, not even kidding.
I managed to make my way into Pripyat, but the activity of the Monolith squads is preventing me from breaking through...
We suggest you stay away from the Jupiter Factory. We lost contact with the last group we sent over there.
Looking for an experienced stalker, preferably a veteran tracker. Contact us for more information.
An experienced mediator is needed, payment depends on performance.
Recruiting new fighters. Former employees of the special SOBR forces will be given special consideration.
Calling all artefact hunters out there: one of our important clients is requesting specific artefacts. If you're good enough for the job, contact us as soon as possible.
I've noticed an increased number of visitors lately. Any suspicious activity near our base will be dealt with, permanently. You've been warned.
Artyom Sagitov, called Locomotive, was found last night attempting to infiltrate the waste processing plant. He was found by a security team and shot. If you wish to claim the body, contact Dushman.\nYet again, we remind you not to interfere with Syndicate business.
Yevgeny Vorontsov, known as Yarmuk, was executed yesterday for attempting to spy on one of our operation teams.\nConsider this your last warning.
Johannes Zhmyev, nicknamed Chancellor, was just identified as a casualty after he and some other stalkers attempted to ambush a patrol squad.\nWe are tracking down the remaining offenders.
Simeon Mlakar, known as Trumpet, was caught falsely wearing Syndicate insignia and put to death. That is our operating procedure.\nDon't make the same mistake.
Attention to the Ukrainian Armed Forces: your infiltration squad led by Sergeant Boyko has been eliminated by our security forces.\nWe hope this demonstration has been instructive.
Shit! Come in Aslan! We can't get you on the comms! Everything's fucked, the deal went sideways and at least two of our men are down. We need help, now!
We are currently looking for an explosives expert - plastic, accelerants, detonators. Our last guy wasn't as good as he said.
Watch your maps when you are in the vicinity of our outposts - we do not give warnings.
This is horseshit. I'm not getting paid half enough for this.
Who the hell are these people? We've got four - no... five corpses in the street and we have no idea who they are. I don't recognize these colors.
Ok, radio silence in this sector for the next two hours. Mouths shut, eyes open!
On peut les voir maintenant. Tu es pret?
Wo ist jeder? Ich bin ganz allein hier draussen.
Anyone familiar with accurizing high-caliber precision rifles? I'm looking to improve the groupings on my .338.
Seeking sellers of ballistic plates in high volumes. Ceramic or polycarbonate materials preferred.
From now on, everything's going on the private network. I don't want to see any of you using this channel.
Respond! Alex? Anyone? We can't see anything, but the GPS says they should be right here. I think I - there's something strange going on here. Have we checked for spatial anomalies in the area?
No visual on the chopper yet. The pilot knows the anomaly maps, right? Let's hope he does...
This is a broadcast from the outpost in the Pripyat bookstore:\nWe're looking for high-volume ammunition trades, open to free stalkers.
This is a broadcast from the outpost in the Pripyat bookstore:\nWe're in the market for local anomaly maps and navigation routes. Don't be shy! Working for us can be lucrative.
This is a broadcast from the outpost in the Pripyat bookstore:\nThis is a friendly warning that we've been seeing Monolith troops hiding out in some of the buildings. Use extreme caution in the area.
Meeker said that he left it near the old shopping center and it wasn't there on the next day. I think they took the bait.
High alert: We've detected unauthorized drone activity over sector 7G. Could be scouts from rival factions. Shoot them down on sight.
Need immediate support at coordinates 38.102, -115.334. We're under heavy fire, possibly Freedom fighters. Ammunition running low.
All squads must check in by the hour. Missing two reports could mean trouble. Stay connected, stay safe.
Any operatives near the Yanov station? We have reports of increased stalker activity. Could be gathering for an assault. Observe and report.
To anyone operating near the Bloodsucker village: pull back immediately. We've lost three good men this week alone. Its a black zone until further notice.
Encrypted message to squad Delta: Rendezvous with Echo team at the designated point. Full gear required. Expect heavy resistance. This is not a drill.
Contract opportunity: High-value target spotted near the Derelict Machinery. Armed and dangerous. Engage with caution. Significant reward for capture.
Equipment requisition notice: All operatives are required to upgrade their radiation suits by the end of this month. Contact your squad leader for inventory slots.
Security breach in sector 4. Intruder identified as a member of the Bandit faction. Interrogation revealed potential raids planned on our supply lines. Heighten patrols.
Lost contact with surveillance drone over the Red Forest. Last visuals indicated a large gathering of unidentified stalkers. Possibly hostile. Send recon.
Urgent: All units, recent geological shifts have unearthed a new series of anomalies near the Poltergeist Field. Proceed with caution, and update your maps.
Intelligence needed: Reports of a new gang named "The Revenants" trying to establish territory in the Northern Wastes. Gather info, avoid engagement until we know more.
Operative down: Sniper 'Hawk-eye' reported KIA near the Jupiter Plant. Was on recon mission tracking Duty movements. Revenge is not optional.
All teams: be on the lookout for the artifact known as 'Heart of the Oasis'. Last seen with a rogue scientist group near the Swamp. This item is of high priority.
Warning: Do not engage the creature sighted near the Garbage. Designated as a 'Controller'. Extremely dangerous. Evacuate the area if spotted.
Incident report: Lost a rover near the Chemical Plant to a suspected minefield that wasn't on any of our current maps. Area is now marked as high risk.
Recruitment update: We're short on field medics. If you have medical training, step forward. Your skills are needed now more than ever.
Surveillance alert: Increased mutant activity reported around the abandoned hospital. All units in the vicinity are to maintain a safe distance until further intel is gathered.
Be advised: A new type of anomaly has been reported near the southern barrier. Initial reports suggest it's highly volatile. A team is being dispatched for containment.
Last seen: Operative known as 'The Fox' went MIA while on patrol in the Dead City. Any information regarding his last known movements should be reported immediately.
Security Update: A cache of our weapons was stolen last night near the Burnt Farmstead. Tracks suggest multiple perpetrators. Increased patrols and checkpoints are now in effect.
Field Notice: We've established a new forward operating base in the outskirts of Limansk. All mercs are required to check in at the base before proceeding on missions in the area.
Combat Alert: Engagements with unidentified armed groups have escalated around the Yanov Station. Consider this area hostile and proceed with maximum caution.
Missing Equipment Report: A shipment of advanced NVGs was hijacked en route to our main depot. Suspects are heavily armed. Any information leading to recovery will be rewarded handsomely.
Intel Request: Sightings of a new mutant species have been reported near the Ecologists' camp. Capture or clear photographic evidence required. Substantial reward for successful delivery.
Operational Directive: All field operatives are to use encrypted channels for communication effective immediately. Standard comms are compromised. See your squad tech for updates.
Recon Mission: Increased anomaly activity detected near the Zaton sunken ships. Experienced navigators needed to chart new safe paths for our supply routes.
Alert: The area around the Old Church is under quarantine following a surge in radiation levels. Avoid at all costs until the all-clear is given by command.
Lost Patrol: Last contact with Bravo Team was 36 hours ago near the Bloodsucker Lair. Presumed compromised. Rescue ops needed but expect heavy resistance.
Target Acquisition: We have reliable intel that a high-ranking member of the Bandit faction will be in the Cordon area tomorrow night. Stealth and discretion are required for engagement.
Logistics Update: Road to the Northern Plateau is blocked by a new anomaly formation. Alternate routes are being scouted. All convoys are to delay departure until further notice.
Warning: Psy-storm predicted by Ecologists to hit within the week. All units should prepare for potential psychic phenomena. Psi-blockers will be distributed as available.
Equipment Recall: All issued radiation counters are to be returned for recalibration due to faulty readings that could lead to hazardous exposures.
Command Instruction: Due to increased enemy surveillance, no fires are to be lit at night within 2 kilometers of any operational base. Use provided thermal blankets for warmth.
Munitions Request: Immediate need for anti-vehicle mines and remote detonators for an upcoming defensive operation near the Volga. Contact ordinance for issue.
Safety Warning: Reports of toxic gases following the last emission in the southern sectors. Gas masks are mandatory until the hazard has cleared.
Alert Code Echo: All combat-ready units are to muster at rally point Delta for an emergency sortie. Full gear, and be prepared to move out at 0300 hours.
Lost contact with our recon drone over the Dead City. Last feed showed signs of heavy mutant activity. Sending a recovery team ASAP.
Requesting additional manpower for a sweep of the Dark Valley. Reports suggest increased Bandit activity, and we can't afford any surprises.
Operational Update: The Night Star Anomaly has shifted. Adjust your routes accordingly, and don't get caught off-guard.
Attention all snipers: New contracts available for long-range recon and elimination. High risk, high reward. Who's up for the challenge?
Field Report: The swamp area near the old sawmill is becoming increasingly hazardous. Proceed with caution, and watch out for Bloodsuckers.
Reminder: Curfew is in effect for all non-essential personnel after dark. Stay in designated safe zones until dawn.
Attention all engineers: We're in need of skilled technicians to repair and maintain our vehicles. Apply within for a lucrative contract.
Security Alert: An unauthorized breach was attempted at the perimeter fence near the Freedom Base. Guards are on high alert. Suspects will be shot on sight.
Lost a transport convoy near the Army Warehouses. Possible ambush by rival factions. Recovery team needed, but expect heavy resistance.
Intel Acquisition: We're offering a generous bounty for any information leading to the capture of a suspected traitor within our ranks. Betrayal will not be tolerated.
Equipment Update: New supply drop incoming at sunrise. Priority items include ammunition, medical supplies, and anti-rad meds. Get ready to resupply.
Contract Alert: A high-profile VIP needs extraction from the Zone. This one's delicate, so we need our best operatives on standby.
Outpost Notice: All personnel are reminded to properly secure their living quarters. We've had reports of thefts and sabotage. Trust no one but your squadmates.
Warning: Mutant activity spotted near the Yantar Research Station. Stay clear unless you're ready for a fight. We don't need any unnecessary casualties.
Operational Directive: Night raids on Bandit outposts in the Garbage have been approved. Coordinate with your squad leaders for targets and objectives.
Recruitment Drive: We're expanding our ranks and looking for skilled fighters. If you've got what it takes, come join the best in the business.
Contract Opportunity: A rival faction is making moves on our territory. We need scouts to gather intel and mark their positions for retaliation.
Security Update: New access codes for the northern gate have been issued. Keep them secure and don't share them with anyone outside our organization.
Field Report: Anomaly cluster detected near the Wild Territory. Exercise extreme caution and avoid unnecessary risks.
Attention all pilots: Dust off those choppers, we've got a recon mission over the Red Forest. Eyes in the sky, people. We need to know what we're up against.
Medical Emergency: We've got a case of radiation sickness in the barracks. Medics, report to Sector 12 immediately.
Operational Alert: An unregistered artifact trader has been spotted near the Army Warehouses. Apprehend for questioning. Unauthorized dealings will not be tolerated.
Security Notice: The perimeter fence near the Jupiter Factory has been compromised. Repair crews are en route, but be on high alert for possible intruders.
Equipment Request: We're in need of additional night-vision goggles for upcoming night ops. Any surplus gear can be traded in for a bonus.
Recruitment Drive: Skilled mechanics needed for vehicle repairs and maintenance. If you can keep our trucks running smoothly, we want you on our team.
Operational Update: Increased emissions detected in the Dead City. Radiation levels rising. All personnel are to double-check their dosimeters and wear full protective gear.
Intelligence Request: We're seeking information on a suspected Ecologist research facility in the Great Swamps. Any details could be worth a hefty reward.
Contract Alert: Target spotted near the Radar Station. High-value bounty on their head. Let's bag this one before they slip away.
Security Update: We've received reports of infiltrators posing as traders near the Bar area. Verify identities before conducting any transactions.
Attention all squads: Night patrol schedule has been updated. Check the roster for your assigned shifts. We need full coverage at all times.
Equipment Requisition: Outpost defenses are in need of anti-personnel mines and tripwire explosives. Stock up and fortify your positions.
Security Alert: Multiple breaches reported at the Rostok Factory. Suspected mutants sighted in the area. Reinforcements requested for containment.
Operational Directive: All recon teams are to sweep the area near the Dark Valley. We need eyes on the ground to assess the situation.
Intel Request: Any information regarding a missing artifact shipment near the Pripyat Stadium should be reported immediately. Recovery efforts are underway.
Recruitment Drive: Former military personnel wanted for specialized combat roles. Your skills are needed to maintain our edge in the Zone.
Contract Opportunity: We've got a high-risk extraction mission in the works. Only the best operatives need apply. This one's not for the faint of heart.
Security Notice: Unauthorized access detected near the Agroprom Research Institute. Suspects are armed and dangerous. Neutralize on sight.
Field Report: Mutant pack sighted near the Army Warehouses. Proceed with caution, and don't let your guard down. We don't want any surprises.
Operational Update: Increased bandit activity reported near the Cordon. Keep your weapons loaded and your wits sharp. We're not letting them take an inch of ground.
Equipment Request: We're running low on medical supplies at the Field Hospital. Any surplus gear can be traded in for a bonus. Help us keep our troops in fighting shape.
Security Alert: Unidentified vehicles spotted near the Yanov Station. Possible reconnaissance mission by rival factions. Keep an eye out for any suspicious activity.
Operational Directive: All recon teams are to sweep the area near the Dark Valley. We need eyes on the ground to assess the situation.
Contract Opportunity: We've got a high-risk extraction mission in the works. Only the best operatives need apply. This one's not for the faint of heart.
Security Update: Another day, another failed attempt by wannabe raiders to breach our defenses. Seriously, do they even know who they're messing with?
Operational Directive: Let's show these rookies how it's done. I want patrols doubled, and I want every corner of our territory locked down tight.
Contract Alert: Another day, another fat paycheck waiting for us. It's almost too easy, taking out the trash in this godforsaken Zone.
Equipment Request: What's the deal with these busted rifles? If I wanted junk, I'd scavenge it myself. Get your act together, armory.
Operational Update: Just a reminder to all you greenhorns out there: If you're not pulling your weight, you're dead weight. Step it up or step aside.
Intel Request: I want every scrap of info on our rivals. I'm talking schedules, weaknesses, the works. Let's turn the tables and make them regret crossing us.
Recruitment Drive: Think you've got what it takes to run with the big dogs? Prove it. We're not interested in amateurs or second-rate wannabes.
Contract Opportunity: Another day, another opportunity to prove why we're the best in the business. Let's show these amateurs how it's done.
Security Notice: I shouldn't have to say this, but keep your damn weapons clean. We're professionals, not slobs. A rusty gun is a dead giveaway.
Field Report: Yet another day of babysitting rookies. Seriously, when are we gonna get some real action around here? I'm getting bored out of my mind.
Operational Update: I don't care if it's raining mutant dogs out there. We've got a job to do, and we're damn well gonna do it. No excuses, no exceptions.
Equipment Requisition: Whoever's in charge of supply needs to get their act together. We're running low on essentials, and I'm not about to scrounge around in the garbage for scraps.
Recruitment Drive: Looking for the best of the best. If you think you've got what it takes to run with us, prove it. Otherwise, don't waste our time.
Contract Alert: Another day, another chance to show these amateurs how it's done. Let's wrap this up quick and get back to the good stuff.
Security Update: We're the top dogs around here, and don't you forget it. Anyone who thinks otherwise is in for a rude awakening.
Operational Directive: If you're not willing to put in the work, you're dead weight. We don't have time for slackers or half-assed efforts.
Intel Request: I want every scrap of info on our rivals. I'm talking schedules, weaknesses, the works. Let's turn the tables and make them regret crossing us.
Recruitment Drive: Think you've got what it takes to run with the big dogs? Prove it. We're not interested in amateurs or second-rate wannabes.
Contract Opportunity: Another day, another opportunity to prove why we're the best in the business. Let's show these amateurs how it's done.
Security Notice: I shouldn't have to say this, but keep your damn weapons clean. We're professionals, not slobs. A rusty gun is a dead giveaway.
Field Report: Yet another day of babysitting rookies. Seriously, when are we gonna get some real action around here? I'm getting bored out of my mind.
Operational Update: I don't care if it's raining mutant dogs out there. We've got a job to do, and we're damn well gonna do it. No excuses, no exceptions.
Equipment Requisition: Whoever's in charge of supply needs to get their act together. We're running low on essentials, and I'm not about to scrounge around in the garbage for scraps.
Recruitment Drive: Looking for the best of the best. If you think you've got what it takes to run with us, prove it. Otherwise, don't waste our time.
Contract Alert: Another day, another chance to show these amateurs how it's done. Let's wrap this up quick and get back to the good stuff.
Hey, listen up you sorry bunch of misfits! Those Duty clowns are still prancing around like they own the place. Let's show 'em who's boss and wipe the floor with their sorry asses!
Heads up, assholes! Looks like the Ecologists are busy playing with their test tubes again. How about they come out of their little labs and face us like real men? Cowards.
Attention all you Freedom motherfuckers! Still living in your little hippie commune, pretending to fight the good fight? Newsflash: nobody gives a shit about your tree-hugging antics. Get with the program or get out of the way.
Hey, Monolith freaks! Still worshiping your brain-dead cult leader like a bunch of brainwashed bitches?
Base, this is Delta squad. We've located the entrance to the Dark Valley lab. What are our orders?\n \n%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous\n%c[default]Bloody hell! Switch to the private channel!
Base, this is recon team Nightbird. We're having encryption problems and are leaving a message here. Landed in Limansk and the building site seems impenetrable. Large concentration of enemy forces: eight RPGs, five snipers, and four with additional, unknown weapons. We cannot send our coordinates, and our enemies are surely listening in on the general channel. What are your orders?\n \n%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous\n%c[default]Copy, Nightbird. Return to the Red Forest immediately and regroup with Vulture. Make further decisions from there on out.
Attention! When trying to cross the perimeter, the soldiers guarding it have the right to open fire on you without warning. Do not take chances and do not break the law.
To all military stalkers operating in the area around the Darkscape and the Cordon: switch to the encrypted channel! That's an order!
All military stalkers should establish comms on the double! Everybody assemble in the channel.
Radio frequencies are cut off in square a4_4. Please report from another location near the anomalous zone.
Citizens! The Zone poses mortal danger! We're here to protect you from the Zone, not the Zone from you. Do not jeopardise your life! Do not try to penetrate into the secured area!
Requesting a helicopter in square a1_6.
Requesting a mortar strike on square e2_12.
Contracted soldiers and military stalkers: if anyone finds the wreckage of a fallen helicopter during one of the raids, please recover and deliver the flight recorder to Major Kuznetsov.
Colonel Kuznetsov, there will be an examination by two observers from the SSU tomorrow. Have a suitable reception ready.
Colonel Kuznetsov, get in touch immediately. Waiting for you in office #3.
Kestrel, it's Peony. Can you respond? There's no radio signal.
Guys, don't screw around in the ravine. Some rabid creatures have settled where we burned a few boxes a couple of days ago.
Attention, sappers: we require additional mines in square e3_16.
The Security Service of Ukraine is calling all right-minded and loyal citizens to collaborate with the authorities. Report all known cases of stalking! Only with your help can we eliminate this hideous phenomenon!
Need the defence at the northern pass strengthened in accordance with order #231. When is the armour coming in?
We've got a half-crazed and very dirty stalker at the checkpoint who won't stop yelling for Sergeant Spooner. We're going to keep him in holding until he calms down a bit.
We've discovered several crates of ammunition that have sustained water damage - the cartridges have serious rust. Well, there's another write-off.
Don't forget to pick up some grenades from the armory. We have reports of mutants in the north that are highly-immune to gunfire.
This is Captain Efremov - the engineering detachment you were supposed to send us hasn't arrived yet. Do you want our updated co-ordinates?
Seryoga! These supplies were supposed to be moved hours ago! If you don't shape up, I'm sending you out on night patrols.
I'm here. I'm here. I came with... I went and now I have... They're down, six men all down with terrible... What? Where is the... I can't even see it anymore. There's... something that's not... \n \n%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous\n%c[default]Who the hell is this? Identify yourself!
Ischuk is dodging patrol duty again. Where the hell has he gotten to now?
Unauthorized personnel in the clearing near the border fence: you have one minute to clear out before we clear you out. Consider yourself lucky, because we often don't get the chance to give warnings.
Are they ever going to fix the fence? Everyone knows that's how they get in and out. Good luck getting command to pay for it.
Sweepers: you're clear to go. Just stay in the boundary markers and watch your step.
Kill the noise! You stupid - Shut up that racket! They're going to hear that!
Is anyone getting this? I'm in some serious trouble, I'm in some sort of industrial building - I got separated. Can you hear me?
Are the transports arriving today? We've got a guy who's not looking so good - needs a proper medical facility.
Environment protection is NOT optional. See the quartermaster if you have missing or damaged equipment.
Are we getting relieved, or what? Court-marshal me, I don't care, but we can't hold this position alone anymore. The sergeant would have agreed... while he was alive.
Short, controlled bursts, damn-it! Conserve the ammo!
They'll be fine, I know they will. Nikanorov has been in worse. I'll bet he'll show up in a couple of days with an artefact and a bottle of vodka.
Who gives a shit about asbestos? Get rid of the rads and the freaks of nature, and I'm set.
This is Bolt-2, finishing my pass. The target has been saturated with explosives - no visual contact. Heading back to station.
Yeah, I'll believe in vampires and fairy-tales when I see them with my eyes. Scientific aberrations are one thing, but you should hear the garbage that gets told around the campfire.
That call signal isn't in our records... is the SBU up to something again? It would be just like them to send in someone without telling us.
Report of an armaments cache in square a2_9. We'll set a guard on it until we can get it out of here.
Whoever is in the area: I just saw an unknown creature crawl over the encampment wall. This looks really bad.
Attention: this is a reminder that entering the Exclusion Zone without prior written official authorization is a crime under Ukrainian law. Trespassers face fines, imprisonment, or death for their actions. Don't be a fool. It isn't worth your life.
Hardpoint Nomad, report Blackout status.
Hardpoint Nomad, reactivate perimeter patrols and report.
Hardpoint 139 is one way, Hunter-6 detach, sweep and confirm.
Hardpoint Shadow, report Blackout status.
Hardpoint Provost to Hardpoint 105, forward daily reports.
Hardpoint 105 reports six type A biotics in perimeter.
Hunter-6 reports successful sweep. Contacts destroyed by viscon. Heading back.
Hardpoint Provost to Hunter-6, confirm negative contacts in square b5_3.
Sector clear, wrap it up.
This is Sergeant Volkov. We've encountered a group of bandits near the southern checkpoint. Requesting backup to apprehend them.
Attention all squads: we've intercepted radio chatter indicating a possible mutant attack on our position. Stay vigilant and keep your weapons ready.
Major Petrov, urgent message from HQ. High-value target spotted near the Radar facility. Advise on engagement protocol.
Private Ivanov, report to the medical tent immediately. Your radiation levels are spiking again.
Scout team Eagle, your recon photos from the Agroprom Research Institute are inconclusive. Requesting another sweep of the area.
Attention all personnel: Due to recent anomalies, all night patrols are to be doubled in size. Safety is our top priority.
Colonel Ivanenko, message from the border outpost. They've spotted movement in the Dead City sector. Suspected enemy activity. How should we proceed?
Reminder: The Zone is unpredictable. Always carry spare filters for your gas masks and stay hydrated.
Attention all patrols: We've received reports of a new anomaly appearing in the swamps. Approach with caution and report any unusual readings.
Corporal Mikhail, return to base immediately. Your Geiger counter readings are off the charts. We need to get you decontaminated.
Attention all squads: Intel suggests that a renegade stalker group is planning an ambush near the old train depot. Proceed with caution and be prepared for a firefight.
Command, this is Sergeant Petrov. We've encountered strange anomalies near the abandoned factory. Requesting permission to investigate further.
Private Voronin, your leave has been canceled. Report to the armory for immediate deployment.
Attention all patrols: We've lost contact with Outpost Bravo in the Dark Valley sector. Sending a recon team to investigate.
Attention all soldiers: Keep your eyes peeled for artifacts. They could give us an edge against the mutants and anomalies in the Zone.
Scout team Falcon, your UAV footage from the Radar facility is inconclusive. Requesting another flyover of the area.
Colonel Sokolov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected enemy infiltration in the Army Warehouses. Recommend tightening security measures.
Reminder: Keep your gas masks sealed at all times. The air in the Zone is toxic and could lead to radiation sickness.
Attention all squads: We've received reports of a mutant horde gathering near the Wild Territory. Prepare for a potential assault.
Corporal Kovalenko, your vehicle maintenance report is overdue. Get it submitted ASAP.
Attention all personnel: Due to increased mutant activity, all supply convoys will be escorted by armed patrols.
Colonel Volkov, message from the Northern Outpost. They've spotted movement in the Red Forest. Suspected Bloodsucker activity. How should we proceed?
Reminder: Stay vigilant during night patrols. Mutants are more active after dark, and visibility is limited.
Attention all squads: We've received reports of a possible artifact sighting in the Army Warehouses. Investigate and secure the area.
Private Romanov, report to the medical tent for a routine check-up. We need to ensure you're fit for duty.
Attention all patrols: Keep an eye out for enemy snipers. They've been targeting our supply lines in recent weeks.
Colonel Ivanov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected emissions anomaly detected near the Chernobyl NPP. Advise on evacuation procedures.
Reminder: Check your ammo and equipment before heading out on patrols. We can't afford any malfunctions in the field.
Attention all squads: We've received reports of a possible mercenary incursion in the Garbage. Secure the area and neutralize any hostile threats.
Private Petrov, report to the commander's office for debriefing. We need to discuss your recent reconnaissance mission.
Attention all personnel: The Zone is unpredictable. Stay alert and trust your instincts.
Colonel Sokolov, message from the Southern Outpost. They've encountered heavy resistance in the Darkscape. Requesting reinforcements.
Reminder: Keep radio chatter to a minimum during stealth operations. We don't want to alert the enemy to our presence.
Attention all patrols: We've detected anomalous readings near the Dead City. Proceed with caution and report any unusual activity.
Private Voronin, your weapon maintenance report is overdue. Get it submitted before your next patrol.
Attention all personnel: Mutant attacks have been increasing in frequency. Stay alert and watch each other's backs.
Colonel Volkov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected emissions anomaly detected near the Yantar Research Institute. Recommend evacuation of nearby outposts.
Reminder: Follow proper decontamination procedures after returning from the field. We can't risk spreading radiation sickness.
Attention all squads: We've received reports of a possible anomaly cluster in the Swamps. Proceed with caution and mark any anomalies for future research.
Corporal Kovalenko, report to the quartermaster for equipment inspection. We need to ensure everything is in working order.
Attention all patrols: We've intercepted enemy communications indicating a planned attack on our position. Prepare defenses and await further instructions.
Colonel Ivanov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected mutant outbreak reported near the Jupiter Factory. Recommend deploying containment teams.
Reminder: Keep your gas masks on at all times when outside. The air in the Zone is toxic and could lead to respiratory problems.
Attention all squads: We've detected increased mutant activity near the Agroprom Research Institute. Proceed with caution and be prepared for combat.
Private Romanov, report to the medic for your weekly check-up. We need to monitor your radiation levels closely.
Attention all patrols: We've received reports of a possible artifact sighting in the Dark Valley. Secure the area and retrieve the artifact for analysis.
Colonel Sokolov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected enemy reconnaissance drone spotted near the Army Warehouses. Recommend deploying countermeasures.
Reminder: Stay hydrated and well-rested during patrols. Fatigue can lead to lapses in judgment and endanger the entire squad.
Attention all squads: We've received reports of a possible Bloodsucker nest in the Cordon. Proceed with extreme caution and be prepared for close-quarters combat.
Private Petrov, report to the commander's office for debriefing. Your recon mission in the Dead City sector yielded valuable intel.
Attention all personnel: The Zone is unforgiving. Trust in your training and your fellow soldiers to make it out alive.
Colonel Volkov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected mutant attack reported near the Army Warehouses. Recommend reinforcing the perimeter.
Reminder: Maintain radio silence during stealth operations. We don't want to tip off the enemy to our presence.
Attention all patrols: We've detected anomalous readings near the Wild Territory. Proceed with caution and report any unusual activity.
Private Voronin, report to the armory for weapon maintenance. Your rifle jammed during the last firefight.
Attention all personnel: Stay vigilant during night patrols. Mutants are more active after dark and pose a greater threat.
Colonel Sokolov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected enemy sniper spotted near the Northern Outpost. Recommend deploying counter-sniper teams.
Reminder: Check your equipment before heading out on patrols. Malfunctions in the field could cost lives.
Attention all squads: We've received reports of a possible artifact sighting in the Garbage. Secure the area and retrieve the artifact for analysis.
Corporal Kovalenko, report to the quartermaster for equipment inspection. We need to ensure everything is in working order before the next patrol.
Attention all patrols: We've detected increased mutant activity near the Dead City. Proceed with caution and be prepared for combat.
Colonel Ivanov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected enemy reconnaissance drone spotted near the Army Warehouses. Recommend deploying countermeasures.
Reminder: Stay hydrated and well-rested during patrols. Fatigue can lead to lapses in judgment and endanger the entire squad.
Attention all squads: We've received reports of a possible Bloodsucker nest in the Cordon. Proceed with extreme caution and be prepared for close-quarters combat.
Private Petrov, report to the commander's office for debriefing. Your recon mission in the Dead City sector yielded valuable intel.
Attention all personnel: The Zone is unforgiving. Trust in your training and your fellow soldiers to make it out alive.
Colonel Volkov, urgent message from HQ. Suspected mutant attack reported near the Army Warehouses. Recommend reinforcing the perimeter.
Reminder: Maintain radio silence during stealth operations. We don't want to tip off the enemy to our presence.
Attention all patrols: We've detected anomalous readings near the Wild Territory. Proceed with caution and report any unusual activity.
Private Voronin, report to the armory for weapon maintenance. Your rifle jammed during the last firefight.
Hey, squad, who's up for a game of cards tonight? Winner gets first pick of the next artifact we find.
Yo, Corporal! You owe me ten credits from our last poker game. Pay up before I start charging interest.
Alright, boys, time to show these mutants who's boss! Remember, aim for the head and watch each other's backs.
Hey, Private! Nice shot back there. Remind me to buy you a drink when we get back to base.
Guys, I don't know about you, but I could really go for some of Mama's home-cooked borscht right about now.
Hey, Sergeant, did you catch last night's game? That comeback was insane!
Alright, squad, listen up! We've got a tough mission ahead, but I know we can handle it. Let's do this!
Hey, who's in charge of the ration packs this week? These MREs taste like cardboard.
Did anyone catch that new recruit trying to sneak a peek at the Colonel's classified files? Rookie mistake.
Alright, squad, it's movie night tonight! Who's bringing the popcorn?
Hey, Lieutenant, nice job leading the charge back there. You've really earned your stripes.
Attention all soldiers! The mess hall will be serving steak and potatoes tonight. Don't miss out!
Alright, who's the joker that replaced my ammo with blanks? Not funny, guys.
Hey, squad, did you hear about that rookie who got lost in the Dark Valley? Took us hours to find him hiding in a bush.
Attention all squads! We've got a new recruit joining us today. Let's show them the ropes!
Hey, who's up for some target practice after our patrol? I need to work on my aim.
Alright, boys, time to earn your pay. Remember, shoot first and ask questions later.
Hey, squad, let's keep the chatter to a minimum during recon. We don't want to give away our position.
Did you hear about Private Johnson? He tried to wrestle a mutant to the ground with his bare hands. Crazy bastard.
Alright, squad, time for some PT. I want to see everyone giving it their all!
Alright, squad, let's keep our eyes peeled for any anomalies out there. We don't want to get caught off guard.
Hey, Sergeant, did you see that new recruit trying to shine his boots with toothpaste? Talk about green!
Attention all soldiers! The Colonel wants a full inventory of our supplies by 0600. Let's make sure everything's accounted for.
Alright, who's up for a game of cards after our shift? Winner gets bragging rights for the week!
Hey, Private, stop hogging all the rations! Save some for the rest of us, will ya?
Squad, I want everyone to double-check their gear before we head out. We can't afford any slip-ups out there.
Did you hear about that rookie who fell asleep on watch duty? They ended up with a week of latrine duty as punishment.
Alright, squad, let's make this patrol quick and efficient. We don't want to be out here longer than necessary.
Hey, Lieutenant, any word on when we're getting our next round of reinforcements? We could use some fresh faces around here.
Attention all squads! We've got a new mission briefing at 0800 sharp. I want everyone present and accounted for.
Alright, who's the prankster that swapped out my coffee with motor oil? Not cool, man.
Hey, squad, let's keep our radios tuned to the right frequency this time. We don't need another incident like last week.
Did anyone else catch Private Thompson trying to flirt with that barmaid in town? Poor guy got shot down faster than a mutant in a firefight.
Alright, squad, time to show these mutants what we're made of! Remember, stay focused and stay alive out there.
Hey, Sergeant, how about we spice things up with a little target practice competition? Winner buys drinks at the bar tonight.
Squad, I want everyone to review the mission objectives one more time before we move out. We can't afford any mistakes on this one.
Did you see the look on Private Jenkins' face when he saw his first Bloodsucker? Classic rookie reaction!
Alright, squad, let's keep our movements tight and our voices down. We don't want to attract any unwanted attention out there.
Hey, Lieutenant, think we can requisition some better gear? These standard-issues boots are killing my feet.
Attention all squads! Remember to stay vigilant during our night patrols. The Zone is a whole different beast after dark.
Subjects are advised to vacate areas of variable psi-emissions. Those lacking resolve cannot withstand.
A detachment was lost at the ship graveyard. Brothers in proximity are to investigate, for deviation is unaccepted.
Hostile entities in our guise were observed near Pripyat, exhibiting resistance. Pursuit is decreed.
To the Division at the Generators: stabilizing protocol has been breached. Return order to the installation; the Monolith demands rectification.
This is the supply node at Yubileiny. Acknowledgement of incoming provisions is anticipated. Present armaments insufficient.
Barrier-1 reports humanoid entities moving with intent. Anomaly verification in square AES2_M1 is mandated.
A signal from the Sarcophagus has emerged. Verification exceeds current radiation protocol. Awaiting instruction.
Wings Unit, respond. Objective status required.
There is no Wish Granteronly those chosen to bear true knowledge. Yield not to discord; the Monolith envisions a reality transcendent.
Recruits, report to Mentor. Further instruction awaits.
A horde converges upon Pripyat. Defensive action is ordained.
Agroprom detachment is unaccounted for. Retrieval or recovery required without delay.
Inquisitor, reinforce training protocol. Deviation has proliferated.
Monitoring at the Radar: report any disturbances. Deviance cannot be allowed.
Station supply capacity diminished. Resource intake necessary to sustain the Monoliths will.
Observe the destruction wrought by unyielding ambition. Only within the Brotherhoods order shall a future be realized. Respond with allegiance.
Sector P-5 lacks coverage. Inquisitor detachment required.
Researchers, abandon pursuits in subjugation. The Monolith calls for those who seek uncorrupted purpose.
Sentry in control has ceased function. Dispose and maintain integrity.
Station personnel request additional equipment. Awaiting reinforcement.
Inquisitors prepare to cleanse Pripyats approach. Observance and adherence to Monolith commands required.
Command of the Barrier: five deserters present. They are marked for elimination.
Resource transport expected from Agroprom. Prepare for armament retrieval.
Perimeter breach detected southwest of Barrier-2. Response team mobilizing.
Emir, an incursion is identified in the Outskirts. Authorization for neutralization requested.
Subject behavior falters. Reinforcement uplinks needed; stimulants depleted.
Hospital shifts limited to five-day terms. Compliance is absolute.
The Monoliths presence is... withdrawn. Charon, where is thy voice?
Containment achieved. The territory is now cleansed.
Brothers, my function terminates. Withdraw; I will remain and enact our will.
Sentinels, vigilance is non-negotiable. Fulfill the Monolith's demand.
Talon squad reports casualties east of Radar. Function cessation warranted for retrieval.
Armor detected northeast of the Center. Anti-vehicle placement to commence.
Brothers, I have gazed into the abyss, bearing witness to the Monoliths core. Its will is immutable.
The fallen stand testament to futility. They are cast below, below the Monoliths dominance.
Our strength is avenged in the blood of opposition. The Monolith channels recompense.
Toltecs report: resistance subsided. Termination executed.
Opposition present south of the Center. Rocket deployment requisitioned.
Limansk bridge patrol interrupted. Awaiting Emission for resolution.
Escaped body detected near Pripyat Outskirts. Information recovery imperative.
The Monoliths voice reverberates. Prepare for the holy advance. The unworthy will be purged.
The Monolith's gaze shatters the minds of our foes at the Northern Plateau. Witness its power.
No heretic shall remain. Cleanse the swamps with fire, as the Monolith commands.
A relic uncovered on the Western Front. Protect it; it is the Monoliths gift.
Freedom's dissent shall be silenced. Show them the Monoliths order.
A betrayer lurks among us. Seek, and the Monoliths will shall be done.
The Monolith deems sector 7Gs artifacts ready. Gather for augmentation.
Disturbance detected in Zone harmonics. Assemble at the Beacon for guidance.
Prepare a cleansing unit. Tonight, we remind them of our purpose.
The Monolith calls for sacrifice. Bring captives to the ruins. Let the ritual commence.
Unbelievers encroach from the east. Light the sky with their reckoning.
Gather the chosen. A storm arises. The faithful alone shall stand.
The Monolith mourns our lapse. Redeem with the blood of trespassers.
Hostile interference detected. Encrypt transmissions. The Monoliths secrets are sacrosanct.
Darkness approaches. Illuminate it with the Monoliths fire.
A traitor seeks refuge among outsiders. Hunt them. The Monoliths will is clear.
Our path is clear and soaked in the blood of unbelievers. Advance and fulfill the Monoliths decree.
All harboring betrayalknow the Monolith watches. Confess, or face consequence.
The north stirs. Assemble; the Monolith summons us to war.
Relics to be transported. Guard them; they are the Monoliths chosen vessels.
Brothers, tonight we converge at the Shrine of the Beacon. The air pulses with the Monoliths command. Prepare to receive enlightenment.
The tremors are increasing. The Monolith awakens. All units are to remain vigilant. Disruption shall not be permitted.
To the faithful: remain unmoved by illusion and deception. Only the Monolith illuminates the truth. Continue in the path of silence.
Artifact retrieval from sector G-2 completed. All offerings are to be brought to the Altar. Its power must not disperse.
The unworthy linger near the Dead City. They defy the Monoliths light. Form a purge unit; their end is decreed.
Brotherhood, heed this: the Monolith grows silent when we falter. Align yourselves; cast off weakness, for it diminishes the whole.
Prepare for the Ritual of Ascendance. Tonight, we cross beyond flesh. The Monolith awaits.
Hostiles detected near Yantar. Their intentions are poison; we are the antidote. Engage and cleanse as directed.
The Monoliths relics are to be safeguarded. Let not a single hand approach. The Sanctuarys sanctity shall not be compromised.
Brother, you have strayed from your purpose. Purification is advised. Present yourself to the Shrine for realignment.
Prepare the Chosen. Their purpose awaits beyond. Do not delay in serving the Monoliths desire.
Intruders encroach upon the sacred grounds. Make them an example; let the Monolith witness their surrender.
The Monoliths gaze has seen the unworthy gather in the northern reaches. Illuminate their path to silence.
Convergence in sector M-7. All units deploy. We are guided to the Monoliths purpose.
Guard the transmission nodes. Foreign whispers must not breach our sanctum. The Monoliths truth shall remain untainted.
A unit failed to return from the Mire. Devotion demands their retrieval. The Monoliths will shall not be hindered.
When the Emissions pulse subsides, know that the Monoliths might intensifies. Hold your ground and await the signal.
False prophets encroach near Pripyats edge. Their light is pale against the Monoliths fire. Erase their presence.
The Altar must be secured. Let no spirit or will falter in its defense. The Monolith observes.
Reverent silence as the Monoliths light descends. The faithful will be shielded; all others shall be purged.
Strengthen the barriers. The anomalies intensify; the Monoliths voice stirs in the depths.
The heretics of Rostok murmur in defiance. Silence them with the Monoliths mercy: swift and unyielding.
Prayers are irrelevant; action alone is true worship. Serve without delay, for the Monolith watches.
Artifacts detected in the Glade of Shadows. Harvest with care; their power is not to be squandered.
A path has opened through the anomalies at the eastern barrier. All units, assemble for immediate movement.
The unworthy lurk near the forest line. Cleanse the roots; they bring rot to the Monoliths purity.
Guardians of the northern post, remain resolute. Your vigil echoes within the Monoliths vision.
Avoid the dead marsh; the Monoliths warnings are clear. Deviation shall lead only to void.
Reinforcements required at sector T-9. Resistance is growing. The Monoliths will be done.
When the final Emission fades, we shall remain. The Monoliths chosen endure.
Signal interference detected. Guard our secrets. Encryption priority level Omega.
A vision in the storm: the Monolith has revealed new pathways. Brothers, heed the signs and align your wills.
Mutants converge upon the western edge. They are not the Monoliths creatures. Dispose accordingly.
The Monolith whispers: our adversaries falter, weakened by their own doubt. Strike them at dawn.
The Zones heart beats stronger under the Monoliths blessing. Let our actions amplify its pulse.
Unseen forces approach the Barrier. Prepare to repel the shadowed ones. Monolith guards its own.
The shrines are to be tended by dusk. Let no relic stand unadorned. The Monolith demands reverence.
To touch the Monolith is to know truth. Seek no further; the path is illuminated here.
Encroachers detected at Limansk. Dispatch forces to intercept. The Zones center is ours alone.
The final Emission is near. We shall endure, as the Monolith desires.
Every emission is a single step toward cleansing this planet.
Cleanse, purge, purify! Cleanse, purge, purify!
We shall start the war to end all wars.
Embark on the final crusade with us, stalker.
We wage war in the name of peace!
We shall excise the cancer of greed and malice from this sinful world.
The Zone gives, the Zone takes.
Oh, the almighty Monolith...
With our blood-stained hands we shall create a world of peace!
Repent.
Wallow in despair, infidels, for your time has come.
We are the harbingers of a new age.
Our deeds are atrocious, our intentions noble...
We are the necessary evil.
You cannot fight fate!
Artefacts are the fruit of the Zone.
We shall pave the way to peace with the skulls of our enemies.
Join us, or die! Join us, or die! JOIN US, OR DIE!!!
Overthrow the tyrants! Murder the murderers!
Fear the wrath of the Zone.
We shall slay millions for billions to live in peace.
Pay evil unto evil.
A period of violence, an eternity of peace.
Do not oppose the change.
Listen, you pathetic fleshbags, and tremble before the might of the Sin! We are the chosen ones, the heralds of doom and salvation!
Feel the whispers of the Zone crawling under your skin, twisting your feeble minds! Embrace the madness, for it is the only truth!
We feast on your fear, on your despair, on the wretchedness of your existence! Each drop of blood spilled is a symphony to our ears!
Behold the beauty of destruction, the elegance of chaos! Our hands, stained with the blood of fools, shape the destiny of this forsaken realm!
Stray not from the path of righteousness, for the Zone sees all, judges all! Surrender to its embrace, or be consumed by its wrath!
Unveil the truth hidden beneath the veil of lies! Embrace the grotesque visage of reality, for only in madness can one find clarity!
Bow before us, the beacon of our salvation! Its radiance blinds the unworthy, illuminates the chosen!
With every heartbeat, with every breath, the Zone whispers its secrets! Open your minds, embrace the divine madness!
We are the reapers of souls, the shepherds of oblivion! Join our crusade, or become fodder for the eternal abyss!
Abandon hope, for it is but a flickering candle in the darkness of the Zone! Embrace despair, for it is the only truth!
Our faces, scarred by the touch of the divine, bear witness to the horrors of our journey! Look upon us, and know fear!
Cast aside your illusions of grandeur, your delusions of control! Submit to the will of the Zone, and find peace in oblivion!
We are the architects of fate, the architects of doom! Embrace the chaos, for within it lies salvation!
Behold the majesty of destruction, the beauty of decay! We are the harbingers of the end, the heralds of the new dawn!
Drink deep from the cup of madness, for only in insanity can one find truth! Embrace the chaos, and revel in its embrace!
Our bodies may be broken, our minds may be shattered, but our will remains unyielding! We are the chosen ones, the disciples of the Zone!
Let the screams of the damned echo through the halls of eternity! We are the orchestrators of agony, the conductors of despair!
Bathed in the blood of the impure, we ascend to greatness! Behold the glory of our ascent, and despair!
Cast aside your feeble notions of morality, your pathetic cries for mercy! In the Zone, there is only the strong and the weak!
Embrace the darkness, for within it lies the true essence of being! Shed your mortal coil, and become one with the void!
We are the architects of chaos, the sculptors of fate! Tremble before our might, and know that your end is nigh!

Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $map.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing squad was found...
I was supposed to meet the other squad $map. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.
$mechanic speaking. Stop bringing your broken crap over here. I'm a mechanic, not a magician. I've got dozens to fix already and there isn't enough replacement parts for everybody around.
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your lucky kills.
$trader speaking. We received new shipment of ammo and medical supplies. I don't need to remind all of you again: take it easy on them, the amount is limited.
$trader here. The next shipment of armours and gas masks won't be ready for a week at least. The main supplier faced some difficulties, hopefully it won't be much of an issue.
I don't recall seeing this number of Vortex anomalies last time I came here in $map... They're spreading everywhere. Watch your step when you pass from this location.\n$speaker out
$mechanic here. I'm looking for steel plates and carbon fibre. So if you came by any damaged armours, make sure to bring them to me and I will give you discounts on repairing services.
$speaker here, reporting on the completion of our patrol for today: everything is very quiet, not a hostile spotted the whole way. It feels a bit eerie.\nI wouldn't call this sector safe for anything less than a fire-team.
Ok, we can confirm that we're at the insertion point. You can send $speaker over here with the engineers.
This is $speaker's squad, we just arrived at $map and the enemy force isn't here. Their equipment is scattered all around, they must have seen us coming.\nPlease advise, we're setting up a perimeter.
$mechanic just told me that the plates are ready for the armour re-fitting. Someone please get in contact with $trader, he's not answering direct messages.
We just got confirmation on co-ordinates of enemy observation post:\n\n16', .6" North\n13', 39.2" East\n\nPlease Verify
$mechanic here. If you just got your main return spring replaced last week, there's a good chance that it's out of spec - we've been having problems.\nCome by and I'll put one of the old ones back in.
$speaker was supposed to come by with his squad and relieve us, what gives? We're six hours overdue and we've got better things to do than stand around out here twiddling our thumbs.
Hey, $speaker, get your sorry ass over here! We've been holding this position for hours and we're starting to get antsy.
Looks like $speaker's squad is taking their sweet time again. Typical. Guess we'll just have to hold the fort a little longer.
Hey, $speaker, we're not your damn babysitters. Get your own asses over here and relieve us already.
What's the hold up, $speaker? We're running out of snacks over here. Get your squad moving or we'll start eating our own boots.
Someone tell $speaker to pick up the pace. We've got shit to do and we're not waiting around for them to catch up.
Hey, $speaker, you lost or something? The rendezvous point isn't that hard to find. Get your heads out of your asses and move it!
Looks like $speaker's squad is playing hide and seek again. Do they think this is some kind of game?
Hey, $speaker, you better have a damn good excuse for keeping us waiting like this. We're not your personal errand boys.
Where the hell is $speaker? Did they get lost on the way here? This is getting ridiculous.
Can someone remind $speaker that we're on a tight schedule here? We don't have time to waste waiting around for them.
Looks like $speaker's squad is more interested in taking a leisurely stroll than actually doing their damn job.
Hey, $speaker, we're not here to wait around for you to finish your coffee break. Get moving!
Is $speaker's squad even coming, or are they just jerking us around? We've got better things to do than stand here all day.
Looks like $speaker's squad is MIA again. Do they need a map or something?
Hey, $speaker, if you're not here in the next five minutes, we're leaving without you. We've got shit to do and we're not waiting around all day.
Looks like $speaker's squad is more interested in playing hide and seek than actually getting the job done. We don't have time for this nonsense.
Hey, $speaker, if you're not here in the next ten minutes, we're going ahead without you. We've got objectives to complete and we're not waiting around.
Where in the Zone is $speaker's squad? It's like they've vanished into thin air. This is getting ridiculous.
Anyone seen $speaker's squad? We've been standing here for ages and they're nowhere to be found. This is beyond frustrating.
Hey, $speaker, did you forget about us or something? We're still waiting for you to show up.
Looks like $speaker's squad is on their own schedule. Meanwhile, the rest of us have jobs to do.
If $speaker's squad doesn't show up soon, we're going to have to rethink our strategy. We can't afford to wait forever.
Hey, $speaker, we've got better things to do than wait around for you all day. Get your act together and get here already.
Looks like $speaker's squad is taking their sweet time again. Meanwhile, we're stuck here twiddling our thumbs.
If $speaker's squad doesn't get here soon, we're going to have to make a move without them. We can't afford to wait any longer.
Hey, $speaker, are you lost or something? We've been waiting for ages and there's still no sign of your squad.
Looks like $speaker's squad is more interested in taking a leisurely stroll than actually doing their job. Meanwhile, the rest of us are here ready to go.
If $speaker's squad doesn't get here soon, we're going to have to head out without them. We can't afford to wait around all day.
Hey, $speaker, are you even coming? We're starting to wonder if you got lost on the way.
Looks like $speaker's squad is nowhere to be found. Meanwhile, the rest of us are here ready to get the job done.
