This is $speaker... My squad has been attacked by $target several minutes ago $map. Requesting assistance immediately!
Help! We got jumped by $target $map.\nTwo of our squad are suffering from serious injury, we can't hold it any longer!
Attention! This is $leader. I got a report from one of the squads $map. Apparently they have been attacked by $target.\nTroops nearby must provide necessary assistance at once.
One of our squads went missing $map.\nThe last message I received from them was about spotting $target moving their way... Can any of our troops nearby check their location?
$speaker reporting in. A few minutes ago, I saw $target approaching our square. They are in big numbers, it's unusual...\nWe are $map. Send nearby troops over our location.
What's going on there? We lost contact with the squad $map?.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, I need more info about the situation there.
Attention! This is $speaker's team in the north of $map, we got hit by some sort of mutant attack a few minutes ago - we couldn't make positive ID.\nWe lost a man, requesting orders, urgent!
$leader, this is $speaker. We just fought off an attack by $target. We're running low on ammo and more mutants seem to be coming.\nPlease advise, we need support!
$speaker speaking. Tell $leader that we just saw $target in a massive herd going west. I would estimate 30 to 40 of them.\nCo-ordinates: \n\n14', .1" North\n\n10', 55.6" East
Attention all squads, this is $leader. I've been receiving multiple reports of $target from all around $map.\nAny teams near that sector, expect contact.
Attention $leader, this is $speaker's squad. We just lost contact with our forward element after we saw $target heading that way.\nWe're pairing up with the adjacent squad to go relieve them.
This is $leader. Any patrols in $map should pull back to a position $map immediately. We've received intel of hostile movement, probably $target.\nStart moving immediately; it may be nothing, but we need to take precautions.
$speaker here. We just encountered a pack of $target near the old factory. They're tearing through everything in sight. We need backup, ASAP!
This is $speaker. Requesting assistance immediately!\nMy squad in $map has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We took position $map, hurry up!
Help! We got attacked by $target in $map. Three men from our squad are suffering from serious injuries, we can't hold it any longer!
We have spotted $target approaching our location $map. $leader, what are your orders?
A few minutes ago, my squad engaged $target $map. They fell back after killing two of them. One of my men got a serious injury.
$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $map, they might be preparing for something.\nAll squads near the place should take caution, report any unusual movement.
One of my men spotted $target heading our way. We took position $map. If they try something funny, they will pay for it. $speaker out.
I got a report from unknown source about $target preparing for an ambush in $map. All squads at the location must take extreme caution.
We opened fire on $target in $map after ignoring our clear warnings.\nLooks like more of them are heading this way, so we'll fall back and take position $map for now. $speaker out.
I've received information about possible raid in $map. Looks like $target are looking for trouble. Eyes peeled.
$leader, this is $speaker. After a long battle with $target , we managed to hold two captives.\nWhat do you want to do with them?
$leader, come in! We were ambushed by $target $map! We got into a cross-fire and we lost half of the squad!\nMost of us are injured and we pulled back to a defensive position.\nWe need reinforcements immediately! They're still coming in!
$speaker here. The enemy incursion has been wiped out; all of the $target have been neutralized.\nMost of them fell $map but we pursued the rest to the south. Orders?
This is the second recon patrol, we're taking fire from a sniper $map! We haven't got a good look, but we're pretty sure it's $target.\nWe can't move from this position. If you have any nearby squads that can approach the hostile from behind, send them!
Third fire-team in $map reporting: we're holding $map, but it looks like they're regrouping for another assault.\nWe're good on ammo, but most of my men have injuries.\nThey're starting again!
Report on the situation in $map: we haven't been fired on for several minutes and we don't know where they went.\nWe can confirm that all of the $target are not accounted for and we can't move forward without separating.\nPlease send backup, we will hold this position.
$speaker to $leader: we're keeping up the attack on $target $map, but they're holding firm. We've only suffered one casualty.\nIn a few minutes, we'll try an assault from multiple angles, will update.
We've been skirmishing with $target for several hours now. No casualties to report and we think we've killed two of them.\nRight now, it looks like they're holing up $map. Do you want us to stay on them?
$speaker here. We just encountered $target in $map. They're dug in pretty deep, and we're taking heavy fire. Send backup, pronto!
This is $speaker. We met $target $map. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI marked the location of our base for them. Make sure to provide them with medical assistance.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\n They have extra medical supplies. You can allow them to get into our base.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $map. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.
I saw $target roaming $map. They are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, has found two at least. What do you think $leader? Sounds like a good deal.
I was talking to $target we met $map. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nMy squad took position and they agreed to provide necessary assistance. Waiting for orders.
Just found dead bodies of $target here in $map, or what's left of them... Seems like some wild mutants got those poor guys.\nI'm about to reach my destination $map. $speaker out.
$speaker here. The hostiles we were tracking turned out to be $target.\nWe asked them if they had seen any activity and they hadn't. We're leaving them $map and finishing our patrol.
We just ran across $target when they were under attack by mutants $map. Together, we managed to fight them off.\nOne of their men is in critical condition. Requesting permission to take them back to our outpost for treatment.
$leader: we were looking for our lost man and we found him with $target $map. They had found him and patched him up.\nWe're giving them some ammo because they're low. $speaker out.
This is $speaker's team reporting! After a whole day without comms or navigation, we were found by $target and they took us back to their camp.\nWe should be able to head out in a few hours thanks to their help.
We just found those missing $target wandering around in $map. They appear to be suffering from some sort of mental condition, maybe psy damage.\nOrders? We'll keep a close eye on them.
Fourth assault squad: We arrived $map and found $target already there. They're willing to help us out. We'll contact you as soon as we set up a perimeter.
We came by $target on our way back. They're preparing for a raid on mutants spotted $map.\nWe'll join them and split the meat.
$speaker here. We encountered $target while scouting $map. They offered us some spare ammo and medical supplies, which we gladly accepted.
Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $map.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing group was found... I wonder what happened.
I was supposed to meet the rest of my group $map. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.
$mechanic speaking. Stop bringing broken shit to me. What I'm supposed to do with an gun missing half the parts?!
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your amazing adventures.
$trader speaking. We received new shipment of ammo and medical supplies. I don't need to remind all of you again: take it easy on them, the amount is limited.
$trader here. Don't expect the next outfit shipment to arrive any time soon. We lost contact with our local supplier.
It's $speaker. Something is not right... Electro anomalies are spreading $map.\nJust watch your step when you want to pass by.
$mechanic here. I'm missing steel plates and carbon fibre.\nIf you came by any damaged armours, make sure to bring them to me and I will give you discounts on repairing services.
$trader, can you get in contact with $speaker and his group? They're moving way too far north past the safety markers and we can't get them on the radio.\nHave you heard from them?
This is $trader, reminding you that theft is not tolerated. If you know who swiped the stimpacks from the last shipment, contact me immediately.\nIf we find out later, then you will receive the same punishment as the thief.
This is $mechanic back at the camp. If anyone comes across replacement parts for night-vision optics, we are desperately short of them.\nThat means that you can make quite a bit of cash if you bring some in.
Hey, $trader, you're never going to guess what we found. Just fifty yards from camp we discovered an observation outpost with some monitoring equipment someone left behind. It was covered pretty well in foliage and we literally tripped over it.\nWho do you think we can thank for this?
Shit, somebody better get a hold of $mechanic; our secondary power grid went down - completely dead, we don't know what to do.\nWhy can he never just pick up his damn radio?
$trader here, checking in on the situation $map. It's been over an hour since we've had a report, what gives?
Hey, $speaker, there's no change with that developing anomaly. It hasn't moved closer to the ground, but it does appear to be increasing in intensity.\nI think it's probably some sort of space anomaly, but others are saying it looks like a gravity concentrate. I don't think it will impede our business.
This is $speaker... My group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago $map. Is there anyone nearby!
Help! We got jumped by $target $map. I lost two of my men already, we can't hold it any more...
$leader here. I got a report from the group $map.\nApparently they have been attacked by $target. I'm not sure if they made it, is there any group nearby who can assist them?
$speaker speaking. One of our groups went missing $map.\nThe last message I received from them was about spotting $target moving their way... I'm gonna check out their location, any volunteers around?
Hey! it's $speaker. A few minutes ago, I saw $target heading our way. They are in big numbers, it doesn't seem good at all...\nWe are $map. Wish us some luck.
What's going on? We lost contact with the group $map.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, is there anyone around who can give us more info about the situation?
Uh, $leader, it's $speaker. We're moving east in $map because we're being shadowed by some sort of mutant pack, $target maybe.\nWe're not equipped to handle this many, what should we do?
This is $speaker speaking. My guys haven't been able to move out from their position $map for several hours because of $target. We're holding fine, but there's no way we're going out there.\nPlease send someone to help as soon as you can.
Hello, come in! $speaker is dead, but we managed to kill the $target that ambushed us. We're $map and we have no other casualties.\nWe're heading back to base as soon as possible.
Hey, this is the group $map reporting in. We attacked those mutants as ordered, but they seem to have run off.\nWe're looking now, if we can get a spot on them, we'll let you know.
$leader, are you there? This is $speaker! The entire team is fucking dead! They got killed by $target.\nI'm holding $map, but they might come back. Orders?
This is $leader to all of our guys in $map. We just had $speaker and his squad go check out some noises $map and we lost contact with them.\nAnyone in the area: I want some eyes on that location; don't go charging in, just watch it for a while.
This is $speaker. We're pinned down by a mutant ambush $map. We need immediate extraction!
Help! We're under heavy attack by $target $map. We can't hold them off much longer!
$leader here. One of our groups encountered a mutant horde $map. They're outnumbered and need reinforcements. Any nearby units, move in and provide support!
This is $speaker reporting. We've sustained heavy casualties from a mutant ambush $map. We're retreating to regroup and lick our wounds.
$speaker here. We've managed to repel a mutant attack $map, but we're low on ammo and supplies. Requesting immediate resupply and medical assistance.
Attention all units. We've received reports of a large mutant pack roaming $map. Exercise extreme caution and be prepared for potential engagements.
$leader speaking. Our scouts have spotted a mutant nest $map. We need a strike team to neutralize the threat before it becomes a larger problem.
This is $speaker. We've encountered a mutant ambush $map. We're holding our ground, but we need reinforcements to push them back.
Hey, it's $speaker. We stumbled upon a mutant lair $map. It's heavily guarded, but we believe it may contain valuable resources. Requesting permission to investigate further.
$leader here. One of our groups has gone silent $map after encountering a mutant patrol. We need a rescue team to locate them and bring them back safely.
$speaker speaking. We're surrounded by mutants $map. We're making a last stand, but we could use some backup. Any assistance would be appreciated!
This is $leader. We've lost contact with $speaker's group after they reported a mutant sighting $map. We need to find them and assess the situation.
$speaker here. We're in a desperate situation. Mutants are closing in on our position $map. We need immediate evac!
Attention all units. A mutant horde is approaching $map. We need all available firepower to repel the attack.
$speaker reporting. We've encountered a mutant scouting party $map. We managed to evade them, but they're likely reporting our position to the main pack.
This is $leader. Our recon team has encountered heavy resistance from mutants $map. We need reinforcements to complete our mission.
$speaker here. We're low on ammo and surrounded by mutants $map. If anyone can hear this, we need immediate assistance!
Help! We're being overrun by mutants $map. We can't hold them off much longer!
This is $speaker. We need backup!\nMy group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We're taking cover $map, hurry up!
Shit.... Help! We got attacked by $target in $map. I lost two guys already, we can't hold it any longer!
We just saw $target heading over here, $map. $leader, what's going on???
A few minutes ago, my group opened fire at $target $map. They fell back after killing two of them at least.\nWe can't stay here, I'm moving somewhere else...
$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $map, they might be preparing for something.\nGroups near that place should take extra caution.
One of my men spotted $target heading our way $map. If they tried something stupid, they're gonna pay for it. $speaker out.
Guess what? I just heard that $target are preparing for an ambush in $map.\nDon't take a walk in there, get your ass out.
We opened fire on $target, those idiots were pointing their guns toward us.\nLooks like more of them are coming this way.... Shit, we'll fall back and wait for them $map for now. $speaker out.
What's the deal? Just got some info about possible raid in $map. Looks like $target are looking for trouble. Watch out guys.
$leader, this is $speaker. We had a big gunfight with $target $map. We made it alive, and we have two captives right here.\nWhat should we do with them?
Ok, this is $speaker. $target in the area have been taking potshots at us for half an hour.\nWe're not sure what they're up to - we don't want to start a firefight.
This is the garrison $map and we just caught some sort of spy in our camp, can't say who he is yet.\nWhat should we do with him? You should probably send someone to pick him up.
$leader, come in! We've been noticing $target in large numbers around $map.\nThe last info we got said that it was safe to move. We're staying put.
Anyone made contact with $speaker or his guys? They said they were going silent because of $target in the area.\nIt's been too long, they should have reported by now.
Ok, this is $speaker and we just received an unprovoked attack by $target.\nThey got wiped out, no idea what they were thinking.
Shit! We were just about to set up $map when we found out that this place is crawling with $target.\nWe need $leader to send help!
$speaker here. We managed to push those $target out of their position $map.\nWe're worried that they might get support and counterattack.
This is $leader. Our scouts have spotted a large group of $target mobilizing near $map. Prepare for possible confrontation.
$speaker here. We've encountered a heavily armed group of $target $map. They seem to be fortifying their position. Advise caution.
Attention all units. $target have set up an ambush $map. Exercise extreme caution when moving through the area.
This is $speaker. We engaged $target in a firefight $map. They've retreated for now, but we expect them to regroup and counterattack.
$leader speaking. Our group encountered hostile activity $map. We're holding our ground, but we need reinforcements to secure the area.
Hey, it's $speaker. We stumbled upon a fortified position manned by $target $map. They're heavily armed and hostile. Requesting backup.
This is $leader. Our group has engaged $target $map. We're holding them off for now, but we need support to maintain our position.
$speaker here. We've spotted a patrol of $target moving towards our location $map. We're preparing to defend our position.
Attention all units. We've intercepted radio chatter indicating $target are planning a coordinated attack $map. Prepare for combat.
This is $leader. Our group has been ambushed by $target $map. We're taking heavy casualties and require immediate assistance!
$speaker speaking. We've encountered resistance from $target while on patrol $map. We're holding our ground, but the situation is tense.
Hey, this is $speaker. We've been under fire from $target snipers $map. We're pinned down and need support to neutralize the threat.
$leader here. Our group has encountered hostile activity $map. We're engaging the enemy, but we need reinforcements to secure the area.
This is $speaker. We met $target $map. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI'm gonna point out our hideout for them, you can give them some medkits.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\nThey're nice people, we got some extra medical supplies from them as well. We will stick with them for a while until we reach our destination.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $map. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.
Hey guys, check this out. $target are roaming $map. Looks like they are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, has found two at least.\nGoddamn it... I wish I didn't forget my Bear detector.
I was talking to $target we met $map. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned an unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nLooks like those guys are gonna help us out. We will take cover and prepare our guns.
Damn... Just found dead bodies of $target here in $map, or what's left of them at least... Seems like some freaking mutant ate those poor guys.\nI'm about to reach my destination $map. $speaker out.
So we came by $target on our way back. They're preparing for a big raid on mutants $map.\nWe'll join them and split the meat... hehe...
Well, thanks to $target, we avoided walking into an ambush.\nWe're going to wait with them for awhile until we continue our journey to $map.
$speaker here. We found a group of $target holding a position $map.\nApparently, they've been fighting off a mutant attack since last night. We're going to team up and make sure the threat is over.
Hey, we just received a visitor $map.\nHe said that he and his team of $target were searching for artefacts when they got ambushed. He's pretty sure that he's the last survivor.\nWe're going to let him stay with us.
$speaker never showed up and we can't wait around any longer.\nWe teamed-up with $target that were hanging around and they're going to help us search the place.
Alright, this is $speaker. We just ran into a group of $target and they told us that they saw the missing squad $map just a few hours ago.\nShould we take a look?
This is $speaker. We stumbled upon $target while scouting $map.\nThey're gearing up for a mutant hunt and offered us some extra ammo. We're sticking with them for now.
We encountered $target in $map. They're friendly and offered us medical supplies. We'll stick with them until we reach our destination.
$speaker here. We came across $target in $map. They're preparing for a raid on mutant territory and invited us to join them. We're helping them out.
Hey, it's $speaker. We met $target $map. One of their members is injured. We're directing them to our hideout and providing medical assistance.
We encountered $target in $map. They're heading our way and offered us assistance. We're accepting their help and sticking together for safety.
$speaker speaking. We met $target $map. They mentioned an impending mutant attack and offered to team up. We're pooling our resources and preparing for defense.
Attention all units. $target encountered us while on patrol. They've offered assistance against a potential mutant threat. We're coordinating with them for mutual defense.
This is $speaker. We found a group of $target holding a defensive position $map. They're under attack by mutants. We're joining forces to repel the threat.
$speaker here. We encountered $target $map. They're preparing for a scavenging mission and offered to share any findings. We're cooperating with them.
We encountered $target in $map. They're preparing for an expedition and offered us support. We're teaming up for safety and mutual benefit.
Hey, it's $speaker. We ran into $target while investigating $map. They're dealing with a mutant threat and asked for our assistance. We're lending our support.
This is $speaker. We met $target $map. They're low on supplies and requested aid. We're sharing our resources and traveling together for protection.
Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $map.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing group was found...
This is $speaker. We are supposed to meet the other scientists $map. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.
$mechanic speaking. I've noticed a lot of people bring me broken Bear detectors to fix. Keep in mind that those devices are limited, I don't have the necessary parts for every detector out there. Take care of your detectors guys.
It seems that the last emission has completely ruined the psi-reader I planted $map. Sad... This one was quite expensive.
$trader speaking. We received new supply of gas masks.\nDon't worry, there is enough for everybody around.
$trader here. I need Fruit Punch samples, head to the anomalous fields nearby and bring as much as you can.
I don't recall seeing this number of Gas anomalies last time I came here in $map... The anomalous activity is unusual. We need to take necessary precautions, this could mean something's about to happen. $speaker out.
$mechanic here. I'm looking for samples from gravitational anomalies. It's for an experimental outfit upgrade I'm currently working on.\nMake sure to bring me what you can find.
Someone let $mechanic know that his experimental shock absorber that he installed on my suit works pretty well.\nWithout it, I wouldn't be sending this message.
This is the third scout team in $map.\nLet $trader know that we just found a small anomaly field that hasn't been registered yet.
This is $trader, reminding all personnel that the sample gathering for canine eye-tissue is nearly completed.\nJust go easy and don't be risky out there, better to lose a sample and save a research team.
This is $speaker and the technical team reporting that the new sensors are now active in $map.\nIf anyone has any problems, I would talk to $mechanic first - it's probably on his end.
This is $speaker. We're encountering unexpected fluctuations in the electromagnetic field $map.\nWe're deploying sensors to gather data. Stay alert for any anomalies.
We just detected a spike in radiation levels near $map.\nStay clear of that area until we investigate further. $speaker out.
This is $mechanic. I'm in urgent need of thermal insulation materials for the experimental suit upgrades.\nIf anyone finds suitable materials, bring them to me immediately.
$trader speaking. We're running low on anti-radiation medication.\nIf anyone comes across any, prioritize its acquisition and bring it to me for distribution.
This is $speaker. We've encountered a previously unknown anomaly $map.\nProceed with caution, and report any unusual readings immediately.
$mechanic here. I'm working on a prototype detector upgrade, but I need more data.\nIf anyone can gather readings from anomalies, it would greatly aid our research.
$speaker here. I've identified a potential artifact hotspot in $map.\nScout teams, prioritize exploration of this area and report any findings promptly.
This is $trader. We've received reports of unusual creature sightings in the vicinity of $map.\nExercise caution and be prepared for potential encounters.
We've deployed monitoring drones to assess the anomaly activity in $map.\nStay vigilant and report any abnormal behavior or readings.
$speaker here. We're experiencing interference with our communications equipment $map.\nTroubleshoot and report any issues to the technical team immediately.
This is $mechanic. I've developed a new prototype gadget for anomaly detection.\nSeek me out if you're interested in testing it in the field.
$trader speaking. We're compiling data on anomalous flora and fauna for research purposes.\nIf you encounter any unique specimens, collect samples and bring them to our lab.
This is $speaker... My group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago $map. Requesting assistance immediately!
Help! we got jumped by $target $map. Two of my science group are suffering from serious injury, we can't afford more casualties!
This is $leader speaking. I received a report from our group $map.\nApparently they have been attacked by $target. They need immediate assistance!
One of our scientists went missing $map.\nThe last message I received from him was about spotting $target moving his way... Is there anyone nearby who can check out his location?
$speaker reporting in. A few minutes ago, I saw $target approaching our square. They are in big numbers, that seems really bad...\nWe are $map. Send some backup to our location.
What's going on? We lost contact with the group $map.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, I need more info about the situation there.
This is the rescue team sent to find the missing expedition $map.\nSorry to say that we found the remains of $speaker and five of his men.\nLooks like they were overrun by $target.
Please come in! This is $speaker and my research group has just fought off an attack of $target.\nWe're intact, but we're dangerously low on ammunition. Please advise!
Can anyone hear this? This is $speaker and I got cut-off from my team.\nWe were fighting off $target when I got separated and had to fight my way out.\nAny news from them?
$leader, I can hear heavy gunfire, sounds like it's from our colleagues $map.\nI think they may have run into those $target after all. We're on our way to support them.
This is $speaker. Requesting assistance immediately!\nMy group been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We took position $map, hurry up!
Help us! we got attacked by $target in $map. Three researchers are suffering from serious injuries, we can't hold it any longer!
We have spotted $target approaching our location $map.\n$leader, is there any group nearby who can provide assassination?
A few minutes ago, my group engaged $target $map.\nThey fell back after killing two of them. One of the scientists got a serious injury.
$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $map, they might be preparing for something. All groups near the place should leave at once.
One of my group spotted $target heading our way. We took position $map. If they try something nasty, they will pay for it. $speaker out.
I got a report from unknown source about $target preparing for an ambush in $map. All groups at the location must take extreme caution.
We opened fire on $target after ignoring our clear warnings.\nLooks like more of them are heading this way, so we'll fall back and take position $map for now. $speaker out.
I've received information about possible raid in $map. Seems like $target are looking for trouble. Stay safe.
$leader, we're abandoning our mission after we spotted a large group of $target headed our way.\nThey might still be after us. We're not armed for this kind of thing!
This is $speaker with the observation post $map.\nWe've just witnessed a large firefight between $target and someone else. It's died down and we're hoping they don't come our way.
Attention field teams: this is $leader.\n$speaker and his group have been attacked in $map.\nIf there is anyone near by who is willing to help, I can assure extraordinary compensation.
This is $speaker. We met $target $map. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI marked the location of our base for them. Make sure to provide them with medical assistance.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\n They have extra medical supplies. You can allow them to get into our base.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $map. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.
I saw $target roaming $map. They are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, was asking us for extra Bear detectors. $leader, what do you think?
I was talking to $target we met $map. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned an unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nMy group took position and they agreed to provide necessary assistance.
We found dead bodies of $target here in $map, everything is messy... Seems like they got killed by unusual mutants.\nI'm about to reach my destination $map. $speaker out.
We came by $target on our way to the anomaly field. They're preparing for a raid on mutants spotted $map.\nWe'll join them for now, the research will be continued later.
This is the research team in $map.\nWe met some $target searching for artefacts and we decided to share the information we had about updated anomaly maps.\nHopefully $leader will permit this sort of thing.
After fleeing from hostile activity, we came to shelter $map and found a force of $target already there.\nRight now we're just waiting to see what happens. $speaker out.
Please inform $leader that the squad of $target who were kind enough to provide security for our sampling activities has now left.\nWe're headed back, it's too exposed here.
This is $speaker with the second observation team.\nWe came across a group of $target and nearly all of them are injured, some sort of mutant attack.\nWe're going to give them first aid.
After staying $map for awhile, we noticed some passing $target and they've agreed to guide us.\nWe're starting off now, wish us luck!
Received aid in the Dark Valley. They have surplus medical supplies. Grant them access to our base for resupply.
Encountered friendlies, requesting extra ammo near the Great Swamp. Appears they're gearing up for a hunting expedition.
Spotted a Loner exploring the Cordon for artifacts. They mentioned needing more Bear detectors. Shall we assist?
Engaged with Moroski's team near the Dark Valley. They warned of increased mutant activity. Taking defensive measures.
Discovered deceased members of Egor's group in Zaton. Likely mutant attack. Heading to rendezvous point. Stay cautious.
Joined forces with ikolai's squad for a mutant raid near the Army Warehouses. Research on hold for now.
Research team stationed in Jupiter. Shared anomaly maps with Pavel's group during artifact hunt. Requesting approval from command.
Seeking refuge at Lena's shelter after hostile encounter. Yuri's team already present. Monitoring situation.
Informing Grigori that adik_Trap's security detail has departed after assisting with sampling. Returning to base for safety.
Encountered injured members of Balalaika's team near Yanov. Providing immediate medical aid. Stay vigilant.
Met Aedaen's group while stationed at the Red Forest. They've agreed to guide us through the area. Initiating journey now.
$clr_1Alkash Programmer\n$clr_2I need access to the internet. Is there any in the Bar, or perhaps over at Sidorovich's place?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I have to say, that guard in 100 Rads is such a nice fella. I wish those Duty pricks treated me like that.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Deals on sausage and bread have been real shitty as of late.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You guys heard that some transport in the Zone still works? Such a thing can be found in the Truck Cemetery, and it doesn't even need any gasoline! What a miracle.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Ha-ha-ha, the military have got themselves a real shit show right now. They were on some kind of raid and their helicopter got shot at... got ordered to return to base immediately.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Man, again Yantar is full of zombies. Careful there, people!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I keep hearing people mentioning someone called Strelok... Strelok this, Strelok that, Strelok whatever... what's the big deal, huh?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Don't head into any basements, they're full of mutants! Go around the top!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Get to cover, now. There's a helicopter around the old church.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Saw a group of shady guys, presumably Freedom. They're heading toward the Bar.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Saw a group of shady guys, presumably Duty. They're heading toward the Army Warehouses.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The military's pinned down in Agroprom, in the central complex!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Wish I had a house for four million! And how many artefacts am I going to have to collect for that?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Bored... I feel like putting holes in somebody.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Join the Monolith in order to avoid your collective and inevitable fates!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Yesterday I met an old friend of mine that had been missing. He didn't even recognise me, instead he immediately opened fire! Had to take him out... People, be careful around psy-emissions. Shooting former brothers of yours is not a simple task. At all.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2There was heavy fog in Yantar yesterday, made zombies impossible to spot from a distance.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Garik, get me out of Jupiter. I'm on the road right now, will be at Yanov Station in a second.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I hear Sakharov's got some new detectors!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A group of five people are moving toward the Barrier, in all likelihood, Monolith. Take measures.
$clr_1Unknown source:\n$clr_2Heard sidrovich is paying double for locked PDAs.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Haha, loser. Why'd you leave your farm? And we've already cashed in.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Two-Three-Seven, we're heading back. Regroup.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Tired... I'm tired of everything... Creatures... Damn stalkers, damn anomalies!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2If any other stalker tries to enter the Agroprom, I'm gonna get Duty to lock him up in the arena cages.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Zhurov, we're out of free hands. We need you and a few other guys to prepare a burial for a couple of bodies. They'll be sent to the south as Cargo 200 in a couple of days.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Fuck this weather. It goes from clear, to rain, to a fucking blowout in just a couple of hours!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Together we shall protect the Monolith!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The mutants have increased in number, leaving us with no fucking breathing room. What is Duty even up to?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Know, infidels, that we are strong and you are weak. Run, and we will catch you. Hide, and we will find you.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2What fucker snatched all the loot from my stash? The one in the Wild Territory. I know you're reading this... Prepare your sorry ass.
$clr_1Unknown source:\n$clr_2Peregrine Falcon, watching a shootout. A group of stalkers are fighting a large mutant... can't make out... I'm going to withdraw. Yes, switch the channel to a different frequency, this one is bugged...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2What's the point, to be dragged somewhere. Uh, there'd better be a bar in the Cordon.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We'll track the crashed helicopter in the Swamps while no-one's there.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Who the hell trashed my vodka stash?... For whoever did this, wish you'd have choked on it, scumbag!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The command of the peacekeeping contingent for the isolation of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone is announcing recruitment into the ranks of the military stalkers: pork, horilka, endless ammunition, and a free burial are all guaranteed.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Any Any day now...any day Sviatlana
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone seen flying black smoke in the Wild Territory? Fuck me... Is it some kind of new poltergeist?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm pinned down by a bunch of looters, help me out!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Lukash, we've dealt with the mercs. Heading back as we speak.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Lukash, Duty's over at the farmstead again. Why?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Army Warehouses. Apparently, there's not a chunk left of the pilots. Someone totally fucked that helicopter.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I wiped this zone and why did I just come here? Money. Yes, we have fattened with our blood and sweat the cocksuckers in the government, that earn while doing fucking shit, and we are here, obliged to crawl for pathetic crumbs.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Guys, there are some real strange things going on in the Zone. Ever heard stories about top secret experiments?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Bros, any info on the next blowout?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The Swamps are restless today. You can get stuck in the mud, and there are lots of creatures around. They are coming straight from the ground, goddammit.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We're seeing a wave of mutants coming from the northern gorge.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2People! Be careful in the village by the Army Warehouses - a Burnt Fuzz has grown on the pillars!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone been to the Red Forest? I was planning on heading there, seems like there's some good loot to be found.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2People, I'm looking through my binoculars - seems like a new party of soldiers has arrived! I suggest staying out of sight for a couple of days. They're combing the area, but the Zone's gonna chew 'em up anyway.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm in the Swamps, it hurts me... The skin is peeling off, my hair is falling out... What the hell is wrong with me?!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some people do not learn anything and don't want to, have they seen too many American films or are they blinded by greed? You tell them about the anomalies, they tell you about the loot - they don't want to think about anything, 'cept for dosh, until their guts get scattered on the branches.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Trust no-one but the Monolith and your fellow brothers. No-one.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2How many hounds are going to keep running around Rostok? When is Duty gonna deal with them already? Man, fuck this. I'm going to find someone who actually keeps their word.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Handing out an exoskeleton for free! And now that I've got your attention - I offer to sell a Wrenched artefact, price negotiable.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Is it safe to pass through the Garbage?!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Came to the Zone and thought I'd come across new sights to see and lots of mutants to hunt... and what do I get? Guard duty all day long at a stupid checkpoint with jack shit to do!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Seems like the military aren't sending any choppers to the area around Rostok after their last one got shot down.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We've accessed the southern tunnel of the facility, heading downwards into the underground. The Red Forest is visible from the windows. It's quiet here.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Got attacked by a pseudodog, barely made it out!
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2Deck yourselves out, pricks. Brothers, who took care of you at first, who gave you the vodka, eh? Those stubborn scientists? Or uncle Sid? Bring those artefacts to me!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone heard about some new guy at the mercenary base in Pripyat? Seems like he's got some unique equipment you can order.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You heard about one of the sentries shooting himself? I'm having second feelings about joining the patrol.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I overheard some military discussions. Seems like they're planning an op in Yantar.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Death to non-believers!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I feel like sleeping
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Stalkers, Sakharov is paying decent money for loot!... And is looking for someone to send to Lab X-16. I'm not going there, too risky. Full of psy-emissions... and zombies.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A pack of dogs is coming at us, sending coordinates
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You shitheads want a taste of a heat-seeking missile? Who taught you to fire an RPG?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Damn, who emptied my stash?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Time for a commercial! You wanna be a real lad in the Zone? Get some dirt on your boot, earning plenty of loot? Live on the cushion? Join the bandits! We've got the one right perspective on the Zone.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Need to leave the Zone, pronto.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some dude in the Garbage got hold of a pretty rare gizmo.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Sold some mutant parts to Sidorovich, and it seems like I got ripped off, that old fart... People, best you trade with Barman instead.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm leaving the Zone shortly, I'm done with it, I can't stand it any longer.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Ha, how many blockheads have rushed to the North in recent times.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Hemul, head to the Bar. Got some work for you!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Rumour has it that there's a controller dwelling inside X-16, and maybe not even one. Several experienced stalkers ventured there yesterday and haven't returned since.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Who are those bozos near the farm in merc gear? I ain't even thinking of goin' near there!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Damn rifle jamming on me again, and this is happening right after I took it to the technician from Duty in Rostok! What else could I have expected from an alcoholic? If your gear needs repairing, he's the type to stay away from.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Agh, there's a broken tank somewhere in the Red Forest, somewhere in a thicket. They say there's still a PKM left with a few rounds, but I can't look around for it by myself.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Did my pockets grow or something? Seems like it...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I heard that Kremlin sends their own people into the Zone. It'll be interesting to watch them.
$clr_1Arnie\n$clr_2Fighting at midnight tonight. Don't miss it.
$clr_1Ashot\n$clr_2Attention: I am now at Yanov Station. Don't go looking for me in the Warehouses, fellas. I offer you wonderful products at the lowest prices.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2If anyone stumbles upon any documents containing information about the area around the Radar and the Scorcher, let me know.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2I'm going to explain this one more time for the boneheaded. There are no programmers in the back room of the Bar that are responsible for any messages you receive on your PDAs.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2Are you looking for a drink, a good firearm, a lot of money, and a conversation with reliable partners? Come to the 100 Rads Bar!
$clr_1Swamp Doctor\n$clr_2Egh, Strelok... how I need you right now. I don't even know who else to turn to with my problems.
$clr_1Bolt\n$clr_2I ain't feeling good... Had some canned food, apparently from a warehouse. I looked at the expiration date, and I've screwed up bad.
$clr_1Beard\n$clr_2There's work for anyone willing to get their hands dirty. Come to the Skadovsk.
$clr_1Voronin\n$clr_2If I find out that you take bribes from stalkers passing through the Bar, I'm going to print and sign death warrants for each and every individual responsible before I put it in their coffins.
$clr_1Hawaiian\n$clr_2Hola, ese! Got some work for anyone wandering around Jupiter - come visit the Yanov Station!
$clr_1Hermann\n$clr_2A reminder to all stalkers that it is necessary to subscribe to the newsletter regarding any emissions in the Zone. The information is always accurate and up-to-date.
$clr_1Groza\n$clr_2Prophet, I'm heading back to base. Got tons of artefacts!
$clr_1Gromov\n$clr_2I need tools, come to me if you find anything suitable.
$clr_1Gromov\n$clr_2Guys, where did Zulu go? Nobody saw him?
$clr_1Deserter\n$clr_2Selling army goods! I have a lot of stuff, from unique weapons to ammo as well as armour. Everyone who knows where I am, come up. Whoever doesn't know will never learn.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2Need 5-6 stalkers for a raid on the catacombs. As soon as I find my PDA, we'll be on the move.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2Gathering people for a raid on the catacombs.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2We're in need of two more stalkers for a raid in the catacombs.
$clr_1Zhurov\n$clr_2Enough with the harassment at the perimeter already. We'll be covering the entirety of your village with mortar fire if this doesn't cease.
$clr_1Ivan Pisser\n$clr_2Heard some news: someone wants to get through to the Scorcher once again.
$clr_1Snitch\n$clr_2If you need information, go to the Bar.
$clr_1Snitch\n$clr_2Got a little job for an agile newbie, paying well.
$clr_1Kitsenko\n$clr_2Psss, where can I get a little smoke?
$clr_1Kuznetsov\n$clr_2Combat battalion, knock back some good vodka, raid in 3 minutes! Get the squad ready and move out!
$clr_1Kuznetsov\n$clr_2This morning, five privates were missing from the drill... presumably deserters. I will be grateful for anyone who finds these degenerates.
$clr_1Kurgan\n$clr_2I can modify the firmware in the PDA, look for me in the Bar.
$clr_1Leon\n$clr_2That's enough, quit the spamming.
$clr_1Loki\n$clr_2Hey, Duty, how are you doing without Jupiter? Good thing your founder's little backstory got revealed.
$clr_1Baldy\n$clr_2The bandits showed up again in the Dark Valley, not good. We'll eradicate them.
$clr_1Makar\n$clr_2If only I could leave this mess, buy a flat in the city, and get some work in a studio.
$clr_1Maslyak\n$clr_2I heard it again from the speakers at the checkpoint. Someone's laughing louder and louder, laughing more aggressively, like a maniac.
$clr_1Maslyak\n$clr_2I can't do this any more. Every day, the blood in my veins chills.
$clr_1Lukash\n$clr_2Free stalkers! Our men at the Army Warehouses welcome you at any time. Here, you will find true friends and comrades, good attitudes, and much more! The Zone is our home: reflect on whether you see yourself outside the Zone and help us deal with Duty once and for all.
$clr_1Butcher\n$clr_2I always have a job for a good hunter. Come to the flea market.
$clr_1Father Peter\n$clr_2Let us pray, brethren, for the peace of the soul of Yuri Semetsky! Amen!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Third squad, the raid to catch monsters for the arena has not been cancelled! Come on, get out of the Bar! Do you want to be like those anarchist weirdos?!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Everyone! The delivery of ammunition has to be conducted at the specified hours! Do I have to spend the night here?!!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2There is work for the veterans, we pay a considerable sum.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2There's work for free stalkers, adequate payments.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2I'm offering a job to shoot mutants.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2I purchase artefacts for research, come visit the Duty outpost at Rostok. If there's no money, I'll trade for something else.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Everyone on the parade grounds on the double. Whoever misses it will be discharged from Duty immediately.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2We're having temporary difficulties with maintaining the private channel. If you need something, write to me personally.
$clr_1Gunpowder\n$clr_2Sanya, are you seeing this too? What's this dumb fuck doing near the bushes? It's been three freaking days! Can I bust his ass already?
$clr_1Gatekeeper\n$clr_2Once again for those "particularly gifted": do not go to the bridge in the DL, our snipers will calm you down instantly. Limansk is under the Syndicate's control.
$clr_1Limpid\n$clr_2Guys, if you find any toolkit, bring it to me! I got basically nothing.
$clr_1Limpid\n$clr_2Anyone who's out hunting... you grab some PDAs for me, we can deal.
$clr_1Rogovets\n$clr_2Here we go again, the vodka ran out again, that's it. How can I treat the nerves of the guys without it?
$clr_1Romka\n$clr_2I require a stalker, who's a specialist in code locks and with experience in raids in the North of the Zone.
$clr_1Peregrine\n$clr_2Die, scum.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2We require parts of rare mutants for further research. We pay well for every good sample. Those who are interested, come to the mobile bunker in Yantar.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2General, could you send another five of your men? At the agreed price.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2Dear stalkers! Our research requires a large number of new artefacts, as many as you can bring. More than a decent payment guaranteed.
$clr_1Senka\n$clr_2Oh, I'd love me a cold beer right now... Anyone knows where to get some?
$clr_1Sergey\n$clr_2To whoever has tools for basic, fine, and calibration work: bring them to me.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2There's always work, both for the rookies, and for the veterans. Payment as usual, heh.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2Rookies, come to me for work - you can gain experience, earn some money and purchase ammunition.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2The life of an entrepreneur in the Zone is as dangerous as a stalker's. I'll reward everyone who ensures the safety of my business.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2If you want some brand-new, foreign weapon, come to me.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2We've got some good pot. Come and get some, let's chillax for a bit!
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2If you feel like going on a raid, you can stock up at my place. Also got some dirty work, anyone who does it will get a rare artefact.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2I buy PDAs containing any valuable information, bring everything to me, more money has never hurt anyone.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2I got hold of some toilet paper. Those who are tired of burdocks, come quickly, stocks are limited.
$clr_1Sultan\n$clr_2Brothers, when you find Sleeper you can put him down for good... but grab his PDA and bring it to me.
$clr_1Owl\n$clr_2Buying PDAs with any valuable information. Bring everything to me, and I'll give as good as one gets.
$clr_1Cardan:\n$clr_2Ehhhh... Hello everyone. Just woke up, I'm waiting for a drink.
$clr_1Biggie\n$clr_2Anyone else hear that? There's something playing in the Meadow near the factory. At midnight. So creepy, and yet, so horrifyingly familiar. But I can't remember where exactly I've heard it.
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2To anyone who has not yet been in the village - don't miss the unique opportunity of learning the necessary survival skills from me.
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2People, has anyone seen Wolf?
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2Need help in sweeping mutants' lairs, contact me.
$clr_1Hakim\n$clr_2Sanya, I'm heading back to base with Snake.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2I need some more tools for my work. Any mercenaries who aren't out doing any contracts, please help me out. You won't regret the payment.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2Best stay away from the Wild Territory. You won't find anything worthwhile there.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2Soon, I'll be replenishing my rock collection.
$clr_1Trunk\n$clr_2We need stalkers with raiding experience deep into the Zone. Payment is appropriate. If anyone's interested, contact me and we'll discuss the details.
$clr_1Chechnya\n$clr_2Hunting is cool, I gotta say.
$clr_1Six\n$clr_2Lukash, Duty's at the farmstead again. Why?
$clr_1Nimble\n$clr_2Stalkers! I accept all kinds of PDAs with any valuable information, bring everything to me. The money won't hurt
$clr_1Yar\n$clr_2Hey, Ashot, how's Yanov? Must be cosy, you lousy spoon-fed fighter.
$clr_1Yarik Athlete\n$clr_2There's a sucker in the Dark Valley wandering around with a cool shooter. If someone offs him, I'll buy it.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We shall cleanse the world from sin!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2One day the Zone shall purify this sinful world. Join us to live in a peaceful paradise, or perish with the rest.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Misha! Misha, come in! You've been in there too long, are you ok? Misha, pick up! Ok, alright Misha, we're coming in to get you. Alright, the door - now go!
$clr_1Captain Quarterblad\n$clr_2We've had another break in. All soldiers on the checkpoint need to account for their actions for the past 12 hours. This is not a request.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2This is... Pavel. I'm on my last magazine and everyone else is dead. The fanatics have trapped me in here, and they're closing in. Goodbye.
$clr_1Hawk\n$clr_2Alright, shithead! I'm coming for you! I know exactly where you're going and I can tell you where you're going next: into a fucking coffin!
$clr_1Drak\n$clr_2Things are going to be changing around here, suckers! That's right, the king is back! This is my Zone, so bow down and kiss my feet, piggies!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Basil... I'm sorry. I know you're probably dead and that it's probably my fault. I was weak. I know. I just couldn't... I hate myself for it, you know. I'm so sorry Basil, my friend. Please forgive me.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Yeah, that guy's back again - just standing there. Shooting didn't do any good last time, what do we do?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Oh, Anton... you're my best mate, you are. I had, uh... 12 bottles? Or was it 21... We go way back, Anton...
$clr_1Georgian\n$clr_2Don't give me that shit about 250 gram loads again. I'm telling you, 300 is the only way to fly. Maybe when you start reloading your own cartridges, you'll understand.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I had another dream. I was out on the usual patrol, and then my feet kept sinking in the ground and it was harder and harder to keep moving. I was yelling to my buddies ahead of me, but they didn't hear me. Then I was sunk up to my waist and I heard footsteps behind me and I couldn't turn. That's when I woke up.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Today is my birthday.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2There's some dickhead hiding on the factory roof just shooting people as they walk by.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2If anyone's missing a toe, I think I just found it.
$clr_1Argus\n$clr_2This is a message to anyone in the vicinity: did you see the light that was just in the sky? About three minutes ago, there was a greenish light that grew larger and larger and then it just blinked out. Anyone?
$clr_1Walrus\n$clr_2Here, doggy, doggy, doggy...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Not a single shitty artefact... I dragged my ass over a mile of broken metal and wild animals in this stinking sweat-box and I followed ALL of the steps and a big nothing I got for my troubles. Screw you!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Willing to trade a Stone Blood for a pound of real tea. Not kidding.
$clr_1Vincent\n$clr_2He can't get far. Not with that amount of blood loss...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm out! I got my swag and I'm leaving! See you suckers later!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2No matter what we do, we can't get this door to stay shut. It's creeping out the men - they don't like sleeping next to it.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Americans here. I hid as they went by and heard them talking. Up to no good, as usual...
$clr_1Graf\n$clr_2If anyone cares to see Nikita Rocketeer again, they better hurry. He doesn't have many teeth left, and then we're moving on to the eyes. You know where to find us.
$clr_1Popov\n$clr_2Giving away a shooter: SKS in good condition, Soviet manufacture. I can't keep it anymore, it's... tainted.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2And for you, my darling... There's letters to receive... Goodbye, the trumpet sounds...
$clr_1Nabby\n$clr_2What's everyone crying about? This Zone stuff is easy.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Alyosha: I just can't stop thinking about that room. It's just sitting there, undisturbed... waiting for me.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Major Bulgakov is in urgent need of harmonica lessons. He's beginning to damage the hearing capabilities of our soldiers. Direct all applications to the nearest Ukrainian Army post.
$clr_1Sgt. Stefcheck\n$clr_2For the last time, shut the hell up! If you two don't stop chatting on duty, I'm going to come over there and beat your heads into the ground. Every stalker in ten kilometers can hear your racket!
$clr_1Postman\n$clr_2New textile supplies from the outside! Negotiating large-scale purchases for faction quartermasters.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Hate to say it, but Mikhail bit the dust. He was aggravated and took shots at a passing chopper... I think you get the idea.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2This is just inane fucking babble! We got screwed over, guys. Probably, the recording doesn't event exist.
$clr_1Marko\n$clr_2Something got into my sleeping bag while I was away... I'm not going back in there. Hell no.
$clr_1Gritsenko\n$clr_2How can I do my work with all of Hell's demons howling outside? Get a security detail together, or I'm taking the night off.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You don't have to feel bad: the body is already cold. We weren't even close.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The PDA says the stash is buried here, but I can't find shit and it's getting very uncomfortable out here. Dammit...
$clr_1Glum\n$clr_2Bringing you the very first Zone-baked bread! It's pretty good too! Wash it down with some vodka, and it's perfect!
$clr_1Shloss\n$clr_2If you can hear this, Max and Matthias, we're going to wait at the camp for three more days. Then we have to move on. I'm sorry.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Something big just crashed north of Radar. Is the army getting antsy again? Or maybe NATO is just learning the hard way.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Willing to give half my haul to anyone who helps me carry it out of here. My co-ordinates are... well, shit.
$clr_1Wallace\n$clr_2I'm telling you, if you punks don't stay outside of the perimeter, you're going to catch a real bad case of acute lead poisoning.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Whose brilliant idea was the home-made shells? Misfiring while a bloodsucker is staring you in the face is not a good time.
$clr_1Echo 1\n$clr_2Good hit! I saw the tracer: went through the abdomen. Hell of a shot.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Oh hell... no water... I'm dying, man. I can't... just can't. I'm stopping here.
$clr_1Bessant\n$clr_2Not so tough now, you fuck. A whole mag of 9x39 right in its ugly face. The beast is dead.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Galkin! That bastard is still out there! We just got shot at again and there's no sign of him. He must be wearing a camouflage suit or something.
$clr_1#11145\n$clr_2One. Seven. Six. Seven. Eight. One. Nine. Nine. Nine. Four. Seven. One. Three. Nine. Zero. Zero. One. Six. End. End.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Why can't I see anything? Get me the hell out of here! Captain! Can you hear me? Fuck! I can't see! What- I- Help!
$clr_1Loris\n$clr_2I hope you're getting here soon, Swill. I hear all sorts of crazy stuff at night.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The man who just killed the loner is currently sitting around in Yanov station hoping no one will notice. The one with the wounded leg.
$clr_1Marya\n$clr_2Did the message get through?
$clr_1Pigeon\n$clr_2Hungry. Really hungry... If I don't get anything soon, I'm cooking this snork hand.
$clr_1Pyotr Circassian\n$clr_2Alright! I'm out on the market again - electrical and mechanical engineer with 20 years of experience. Contact me and we can negotiate terms.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I thought I ordered someone to get rid of these carcasses? Now the entire complex smells terrible.
$clr_1Natan\n$clr_2It's been a bad day, guys. Really bad. I just need to get this shit out. Just... it's so messed up. Having second thoughts here, guys.
$clr_1Trapper\n$clr_2Will they come back tomorrow? Everyone keeps asking me that. I'm not a prophet, OK? I can tell you how to kill 'em, but they can do what they like.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Haha! Those dumb bastards walked right into the anomalies! That's some poetic justice if I've ever seen it! Enjoy your spoils while you can, you scummy thieves.
$clr_1Cashier\n$clr_2I wouldn't go out there if I were you, guy - it sounds angry. It's not always as dead as it looks, alright?
$clr_1Nilson\n$clr_2Isn't where we left the other guys? At the rusty water tank? Fuck sake, didn't they wait for us? This isn't good. Meet us around back near the hole in the fence. And stay ready.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some sad little punks are trying to sell off fake artefacts made out of clay and electric lights. I don't imagine any of you will be dumb enough to fall for it, but... it is the Zone after all.
$clr_1Churin\n$clr_2I can still remember when this dockyard was offloading containers from the cargo ships... long days of work, pennies for pay... but I remember looking out across the waters right before the sun set... it was like a lake of fire.\n\nNow that place is a gray swamp haunted with monsters.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'll see you guys soon, alright? I've got to run this to a buddy up past the Red Forest. I'll- uh, well just wish me luck. I think I'm going to need it.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I visited the medic this morning, he told me I might have cancer, that I need to go back in normal world, get a proper medical exam... Don't know why I'm telling you this. Probably because I don't really have anyone else to tell that to. No family, and all my friends are gone. Now I either have to spend all my money on therapy... or die. If only there was some artifact to cure it, but I guess it's not for me to find. Don't go into anomaly fields guys, stop wasting your lives on this dead soil. Go home.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Have you ever wondered how is it to be zombified? Like, what's happening in your head?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Dang, when I raise money, I'll buy myself a golden AK. And handgun. Desert Eagle. Then I'll go straight to CNPP, and even if I die, I'll die with style.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Have you ever seen man being sucked into a Vortex? Coolest thing I've ever seen.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Why there is always only one brand of beer in the Bar? I'm sick of drinking that piss, give me a dark one for God's sake!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2To everyone who whines in chat about how hard their life is: you don't know crap. I'm allergic to dust. In the Zone. Allergic to dust.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I was in the swamps lately. Decided to spend night at old church. Suddenly, I woke up in the middle of the night, because I heard strange noise, like someone was digging outside. I took my gun with me and went to investigate what smartass had the brilliant idea to dig dirt in such place. So I approached cemetery fence and then.. I see a coffin with dead man inside, flying around crosses, and zombified men standing alongside road, with scythes in their hands... And then, silence!
$clr_1Barkeep\n$clr_2FREE BEER IN 100 RADS BAR \n\nAnd now that I've got your attention: I'm selling used armor, weapons, and other stuff. Not pricey.
$clr_1Joker\n$clr_2Fellas, someone posted a map that leads to a Snowflake Artifact in public chat: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ\n\n$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Yeah, you're hilarious. Nice song though.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Shit, I found him. Yeah, Leha died. Get back guys, let's bury him at least.
$clr_1 Anonymous\n$clr_2Damn, our team lost. I guess we're used to it by now. Who the hell shoots a penalty like that anyway!\n\n$clr_1 Anonymous\n$clr_2What do you mean "our team"? It's "your team" for everyone else.\n\n$clr_1 Anonymous\n$clr_2Yeah, like I need to ask Ukrainians for an opinion\n\n$clr_1 Anonymous\n$clr_2Hey, Im from Belarus actually. Just saying.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2San7a buymore vodka pls thtee wasnt enoigh.........
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Hey, guys! Anyone here from Podolsk?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Guys, does anyone have fresh movies downloaded on a PDA? If you do, meet me at the Bar, I have a vodka bottle ready for you.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2If only there were women in zone...\n\n$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Well I can borrow you a playboy.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Here I am, sitting soaked in swamp slush, drying my coat. Hell, I could be drinking beer on beach in Yalta now...
$clr_1Kir\n$clr_2You are all fools. You believe in the Wish Granter, the Oasis, the Compass and other rumors. But I I know there is a Time Machine in the Zone. Yes, dont be surprised. Its here. And Im only one who knows where. It was built by the people from the future, back in 84, to freely travel through time. I was just a kid back then.\nThe future its wonderful. Its like an old Soviet sci-fi movie turned real. That machine that I saw in Moscow no longer exists. I spent years, decades to find out other one. Even with access to secret archives it was tough. But one small newspaper article led me to a clue. Turned out some young scientist worked with space-time barriers back in the 70's, for real! This article disappeared from open archives and the names of the scientists were classified, because all of them went to work on secret projects in the Exclusion Zone after CNPP meltdown in '86. But one of them went missing even before Chernobyl disaster! By the method of elimination I found him. Even found out where he lived. For one more year I was searching, where creators hid their invention. Now, the moment of truth. Machine is working. Inventors notes helped me to repair it back to operational state. I send this message to everyone Ive ever known here. To my friends: Im not dead, everything is going to be great. Ill find you someday. Or at least tell your grandchildren who you are and what wonderful people you were to me. For everyone else: good luck.\n\nAlisa, dont cry, I promised Ill be back in no time. I missed you so much wait a second; let me just turn off this thing
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Comrades musicians! Anyone has chords for Tsoy's "Blood Type"?
$clr_1Thompson\n$clr_2Take my advice, never, I repeat NEVER, mix Psy-block with vodka. I'm now in Duty's jail with no money, can't remember a thing from yesterday. My chest hurts, like I had a heart attack. I vomited something yellow that looks like orange juice.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Don't go to the Flea Market. Guy that trades stuff is an absolute cheapskate. You know, the dude with punchable face, that haggles even for a couple roubles?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You, the fiend who wrote what he wrote on a wall of apartment block number 11 in Chistoglavka village, if you, asshole, are reading this right now, I swear to Allah, Ill find you! You got that, bastard? For your words you will answer with blood, shaitan!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Shit, my grandma from Kiev died today. If someone wants to drink some, I'm in the Military Warehouses.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2This channel is hijacked by VSU, Ukrainian army is the strongest!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!\nUkraine number 1!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The strangest thing in my entire life happened today. I was at some apartment block near Limansk, when some dusty old phone in next room started ringing. It became louder and louder, and I just froze in place out of fear. Suddenly it became so loud it felt like my eardrums going to explode and my legs were like spaghetti. I took the phone, trying not to pass out. Young woman's voice on the phone said something like: "Dima, hi, are you going to movies tonight? I heard they're gonna show Courier again and girls saw it and...". Being half-deaf already, I screamed "Wrong number!" and hung up. I felt huge relief and for some reason... guilt. Someone started crying right at the front door of the apartment, I jumped out the window and ran like hell leaving my gun behind. True story.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Hey, low-lifes, you can stop hiding in those bushes. I see you. Say auf wiedersehen to your bandit balls.
$clr_1Prometheus\n$clr_2Don't fear the Monolith. It's natural to be afraid of the unknown, especially something so powerful and mysterious, but there is no need for it. Your enlightenment is near, all you have to do is accept it.\n\n$clr_1Greek\n$clr_2Oh, piss off
$clr_1Prometheus\n$clr_2Monolith is a statement to the humanity: why you try to play gods to achieve riches and wealth when you can just become one? Join us and be a real god amongst the living if you prove yourself worthy to Monolith.\n\n$clr_1Greek\n$clr_2Shut up, will ya?
$clr_1Prometheus\n$clr_2Monolith is something you can't understand. Something you wish to destroy out of primal fear. But we understand it. We know what's it capable of. It can save the world. We need you to help us. Together we can change the future of whole humanity.\n\n$clr_1Greek\n$clr_2FUCK YOU, ONE MORE MESSAGE FROM YOU, AND I SWEAR, I'M GONNA BLOW YOUR STUPID GLOWING ROCK TO FUCKING SMITHEREENS JUST SO YOU WOULD SHUT UP ABOUT IT!
$clr_1Prometheus\n$clr_2Why are you fighting against us? Why do you hate Monolith? Don't you see? Your leaders don't care what you believe in, they don't have values. They think only about themselves. For them all of you are pawns, it's just business. All the things your faction stands for is a lie. They have no goal. No meaning. Only greed. Monolith can show you the way. It can help you achieve your deepest desires. We are not here because we told to by some man that wants to rule the Zone. We are here because it's the Zone who asked us to protect it, in exchange for its infinite wisdom.\n\n$clr_1Greek\n$clr_2Okay, forget the Monolith part, but is this guy actually starting to make sense? Maybe I'm going to sound crazy, but he's got a point.
$clr_1Prometheus\n$clr_2Monolith awaits. Don't try to fool it with lies. Don't wish for wealth or immortality, because It can see what you really want. You want to be respected. You want to be desired. You want to be loved. You want to mean something in this life. People think you are nobody. They will abandon you, steal, lie, cheat, betray, because they don't care. Monolith cares. It cares about its children more than a mother cares about hers. Monolith is here to help you find the way.\n\n$clr_1Greek\n$clr_2You know what? Fuck you guys. I don't give a shit if it's the Monolith or voodoo demons or whatever talking right now. It could be Satan and I couldn't care less. You treated me like shit my whole time here, you really are a bunch of thieves, liars and assholes. You betrayed me in that anomaly field and betrayed me many times before. Maybe I AM going to join FUCKING MONOLITH! I! DON'T! CARE! ANYMORE! Fuck you, I hope you all die, rot in hell, I'm going to become a monolith-loving idiot, but at least I won't have to deal with your shit again, you bastards. GO FUCK YOURSELVES. \n\n$clr_1Hecules\n$clr_2Is he for real? Damn. That's... sad.
$clr_1Lukash\n$clr_2So, any news about that guy who went to Radar? You know, that crazy fella.\n\n$clr_1Hercules\n$clr_2Nope. Guys on Barrier said they haven't seen him going back either. I hope he's okay, but I'm pretty sure he's done for. Shame, what a rotten way to die.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Gosh darn it, all my smokes are wet. Damn Flea Market, not gonna buy another flask from those guys again!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Have you heard about that lieutenant that used to sell ammo to our guys? Do you know hes a goddamn pedophile?! Who couldve guessed, right? I heard from my army pal. The guy is already being transferred to prison.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Im so tired. Goodbye friends. Remember me as a good guy. Im sorry.
$clr_1Pride\n$clr_2Phantom! Come in, this is Pride! We're under attack by Herdsmans men at the Graveyard! Scope, hold the left flank!- Do not trust Herdsman! I say again, do not trust Herdsman!- Scope, get down!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Found two dead guys in Pripyat, near the Ferris Wheel. All ghillied up, both have sniper rifles. Looks like they were going to kill someone. Also they have very strange dog tags. Does anyone know what the hell SAS means?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The hell Ugh, I found a dead guy in the outhouse, dude got stuck in the shithole. I mean, his upper half. Lower half is nowhere to be found. Thats it, Im going to shit only in bushes from now on.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Eww, I got zombie blood in my mouth! Im freaking out, Im freaking out! Do I have AIDS now or something?!
$clr_1Dima\n$clr_2Guys, guys, guess what? Im gay!\nGive it back, moron!\nCrap! I didnt say that, it was Vova he took my PDA I swear!$clr_1Vova\n$clr_2No, I didnt.
$clr_1Ivan\n$clr_2Damn, my head. Sam! Sam you here?! Jobs done! Im sorry I was like, drinking for a week. Forgot to tell you Sam? I hope you alright, those loan-sharks sure were serious. But dont worry I have your money now! Sam? Ohhh That explains severed finger I found in my stash. Oh crap. OH CRAP! IM COMING! DONT SAW OFF HIS HEAD PLEASE!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The fog is coming.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Attentioning of to all Stalker on this channel, I am a wealthy Ethiopian prince of escape country because civil war. Am I looking for to give wealth over so that it will not be traced. Message this reply for further details. Regards.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2This message is for Misha. We know, and we're coming for you.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We've managed to get a few old computers set up and connected in the warehouse next to the bar. There'll be a LAN party this weekend, UT 2000. First come, first serve.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2This hide'll fetch a good price.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Is it true there's an artefact that cures syphilis? Asking for a friend.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Ran into an old babushka on my way into the Zone a few years back, in the outskirts. She was lost and confused, I don't think she even knew where she was. Thankfully I found her, who knows what would've happened if she wandered further in.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I've been thinking... what if the accident back in 86 wasn't an accident?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Watch your asses, just saw a Spetsnaz patrol.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2My wife still thinks I'm on a military deployment. Shit, that'd be nicer than where I am right now.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I hope my children understand why I had to do this.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some guy warned me about a mutant I've never heard of before. What the hell is a bibliotekar?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2My daughter's a year old today. I hope I'll get to meet her one day.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2My son's a year old today. I hope I'll get to meet him one day.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Another day, another penny.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2This place is either Heaven or Hell. It's all about perspective.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Are we sure Freedom's not been infiltrating Rostok? Bathroom in the Bar smells like a weed farm.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Can't believe I survived another Arena fight. Good money, but damn is it risky.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Guess who just quadrupled their money on an Arena bet?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Friendly reminder that garlic, salt, and crucifixes do not, in fact, repel bloodsuckers.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Weirdest thing just happened. I met in an izlom underground, but it didn't attack me. I kept my rifle aimed at it, but it held out its hands and started muttering about cigarettes. It pointed to a pack of smokes on my belt.. I had no idea what it would do, but something told me to give it a smoke. I lit the cig, the izlom took it, grinned its crooked teeth, gave me this PDA, and ran off.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Another weakminded stalker wandered into my cave. Another existence made oblivion. Embrace it.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A traveler told me that there's a whole village up north, beyond the CNPP, full of docile zombies. They shuffle around, sit on their porches, even sleep, mumbling incoherently at each other, like they're pretending to be real people living normal lives. They didn't attack him, but he felt an inexplicable dread being there. Says he'll never go back. I think he's just bullshitting, personally.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Looking to buy girlfriend, 3k.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2If you find a working car, DON'T try to drive it. I've seen cars explode from bumping into rocks around here. That's the Zone for you.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Such is life in the Zone.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2One more artefact, just one more sale, then I'm leaving the Zone for good.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I grew up in a village outside Pripyat. Was just a kid when the first disaster happened. I still remember my mama scrambling to get us all on one of the buses. I'm looking at the house I grew up in, and it's nothing but overgrowth now. Seems like that was a lifetime ago.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Don't underestimate pseudogiants. They may look dumb and they may move pretty slow, but if they get their hands on you, you're done for. I watched a guy decked out exo get too close to one with his shotgun when it jammed. The giant knocked it out of his hands, grabbed him, then ripped him in half like a piece of paper.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Don't go underground.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Another day, another dollar.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I saw something in the tunnels beneath Dead City. Something that wasn't human. It had glowing eyes and moved with an unsettling grace. I barely escaped with my life, but I can still feel its presence lurking in the darkness. Don't go down there. Don't make the same mistake I did.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I stumbled upon a camp deep in the Red Forest. At first, I thought it was abandoned, but then I heard whispers coming from the shadows. Whispers that spoke of ancient curses and forbidden knowledge. I didn't stay to find out more. I ran as fast as I could, but I can't shake the feeling that something followed me out of those woods.
That's just Zone life. Shit happens.

this guy has some sort of fungus growing all over him, it smells terrible
torn apart by something big. Shit, there might be a Chimera around
some sort of awful ritual murder - I'm not going into details
apparent strangulation

teeth marks on vital areas. They look disturbingly human-like
